translated: In the context of the practice of pleasing the Sangha, if one practices the main part, or a serious offense, or a minor offense belonging to the class of partial defeats, it is a minor offense.

translated: It is also when one does not amend the offense, even though the basis exists.🔽When one returns from the stage of non-practice, it is that very state.

original: mi spyod pa'i sa nas phyir 'ongs pa ni de'i gnas skabs nyid yin no zhes bya ba ni gnas skabs gang la spo ba la sogs pa'i spyod pa'i sa bsnyen par ma rdzogs pa la sogs pa thob pa de'i phyir 'chos pa la spo ba dang mgu ba🔽mi spyod @215a * //

translated: When one goes to the stage of non-practice and establishes the stage of practice, it is the state of having an offense. This is the meaning.

original: sbyangs pa'i gzhi la lhag ma rjes su bsgrub po zhes bya ba ni bdag la ltung ba'i ming ni 'di byung rigs ni 'di byung dus ji srid cig tu bcabs pa 'am ma bcabs pa de'i phyir bdag gis spyad pa 'di blangs te 'di ji srid cig ni
analyzed: sbyangs pa'i gzhi la lhag ma rjes su bsgrub po zhes bya ba ni bdag la ltung ba'i ming ni 'di byung rigs ni 'di byung dus ji srid cig tu bcabs pa 'am ma bcabs pa de'i phyir bdag gis spyad pa 'di blangs te 'di ji srid cig ni
translated: For this length of time, I have practiced.

original: spyad zin to //
analyzed: spyad zin to //
translated: The remainder is for as long as it takes.

original: lhag ma ni ji srid lus so zhes spyad pa gang la kun du spyad pa de brten par bya ba'i dge 'dun la de go bas sbyangs pa'i gzhi la lhag ma ma spyad pa ci yod pa bsgrub par bya ste /

translated: Whatever training one has practiced, one should understand that it is to be relied upon by the saṅgha that is the basis of purification. Whatever remainder of training has not been practiced should be practiced.

original: de la lhag ma gang yod pa de spyad par bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: de la lhag ma gang yod pa de spyad par bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that whatever remainder there is, that should be practiced.

original: 'dir gzhung ni yongs su gnas par byed pa'i gang zag gis gzhi ji tsam sbyangs na rnam par 'khyams te /
analyzed: 'dir gzhung ni yongs su gnas par byed pa'i gang zag gis gzhi ji tsam sbyangs na rnam par 'khyams te /
translated: Here, the treatise explains that a person who is undergoing purification should wander for as long as it takes to purify the basis.

original: yang phyir 'ongs nas bsnyen par rdzogs na 'dul ba dang 'gal ba'i bcas pa'i kha na ma tho ba'i nyes byas bshags te /
analyzed: yang phyir 'ongs nas bsnyen par rdzogs na 'dul ba dang 'gal ba'i bcas pa'i kha na ma tho ba'i nyes byas bshags te /
translated: If he returns and is fully ordained, he confesses the fault of a proscribed offense that violates the Vinaya.

original: yongs su gnas pa la yongs su gnas par gyur na /
analyzed: yongs su gnas pa la yongs su gnas par gyur na /
translated: If he becomes fully ordained in the rite of full ordination,

original: yongs su gnas pa la yongs su gnas par 'gyur ro zhes gsungs pa yin no //
analyzed: yongs su gnas pa la yongs su gnas par 'gyur ro zhes gsungs pa yin no //
translated: he becomes fully ordained in the rite of full ordination.🔽If the time of concealment is not ascertained, he should rely on the minimum number of days.

original: bcabs pa'i dus nges par mi shes na nyung ba nyid du mi 'gyur ba la brten par bya'o zhes bya ba ni ltung ba gang la bcabs pa'i dus nges pa nyid du mi shes te /
analyzed: bcabs pa'i dus nges par mi shes na nyung ba nyid du mi 'gyur ba la brten par bya'o zhes bya ba ni ltung ba gang la bcabs pa'i dus nges pa nyid du mi shes te /
translated: If the time of concealment of a downfall is not ascertained,

original: bdag gis ltung ba de dus 'di srid du bcabs pa zhes bya bar bcabs pa'i dus nges par mi shes pa de la ci nas kyang nyung ba nyid du mi 'gyur ba'i dus de srid cig la brten par bya ste /
analyzed: bdag gis ltung ba de dus 'di srid du bcabs pa zhes bya bar bcabs pa'i dus nges par mi shes pa de la ci nas kyang nyung ba nyid du mi 'gyur ba'i dus de srid cig la brten par bya ste /
translated: saying, “I have concealed this downfall for this length of time,” he should rely on the minimum number of days, so that the number of days of concealment is not less than the actual number of days.

original: gang du nyung ba'i dus mi 'gyur ba'i dus de srid du'o //
analyzed: gang du nyung ba'i dus mi 'gyur ba'i dus de srid du'o //
translated: He should rely on the minimum number of days, so that the number of days of concealment is not less than the actual number of days.

original: spyad par bya ba nyid la dag pa'i mtha' can nyid kyi bye brag gi'o zhes bya ba ni yul de la nyung ba nyid du mi 'gyur ba'i dus de lta bu la brten par bya'o zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
analyzed: spyad par bya ba nyid la dag pa'i mtha' can nyid kyi bye brag gi'o zhes bya ba ni yul de la nyung ba nyid du mi 'gyur ba'i dus de lta bu la brten par bya'o zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
translated: The term “in the case of what is to be practiced, in the case of the limit of purification” is to be supplied.

original: 'dir dus der don gnyis la brten te bcabs pa dang spyad par bya ba nyid la'o //
analyzed: 'dir dus der don gnyis la brten te bcabs pa dang spyad par bya ba nyid la'o //
translated: Here, in that time, there are two topics: concealment and what is to be practiced.

original: spyad par bya ba nyid ces bya ba ni dus 'di srid du yongs su gnas par bya ba zhes bya'o //
analyzed: spyad par bya ba nyid ces bya ba ni dus 'di srid du yongs su gnas par bya ba zhes bya'o //
translated: What is to be practiced is what is to be maintained for so long.

original: de la bcabs pa la ni yongs su gnas pa dang mgu bar bya ba gnyis ka'i dus la brten pa'o //
analyzed: de la bcabs pa la ni yongs su gnas pa dang mgu bar bya ba gnyis ka'i dus la brten pa'o //
translated: In that, concealment is based on the time of both maintenance and satisfaction.

original: spyad par bya ba nyid la ni yongs su gnas pa'i dus 'ba' zhig la brten pa'i mgu bar bya ba'i dus la ni mi brten te 'di ltar @215b dus nges pa nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: spyad par bya ba nyid la ni yongs su gnas pa'i dus 'ba' zhig la brten pa'i mgu bar bya ba'i dus la ni mi brten te 'di ltar @215b dus nges pa nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: What is to be practiced is based only on the time of maintenance, not on the time of satisfaction, because the time is definite.

original: ji ltar nyung ba nyid kyi mi 'gyur ba dag pa'i mtha' can gyi bye brag gi dus brten par bya'am zhe na /
analyzed: ji ltar nyung ba nyid kyi mi 'gyur ba dag pa'i mtha' can gyi bye brag gi dus brten par bya'am zhe na /
translated: How can the time of the pure limit be relied upon, which is the time of the few?

original: de'i phyir dag pa'i mtha' can zla ba bzhi la'o zhes bya ba smos te /🔽zla ba bzhi la sogs pa ji ltar nyung ba nyid du mi 'gyur ba'i tshig gi dus la brten nas lhag ma dang bcas pa la de brten pa ste /
analyzed: de'i phyir dag pa'i mtha' can zla ba bzhi la'o zhes bya ba smos te / zla ba bzhi la sogs pa ji ltar nyung ba nyid du mi 'gyur ba'i tshig gi dus la brten nas lhag ma dang bcas pa la de brten pa ste /
translated: Therefore it is said, “The pure limit is four months.”🔽The time of the pure limit is relied upon in terms of the time of the few, such as four months, and so on, in order to understand that the time of practice is just that much, and that the time of practice is definite in that very time.

original: de tsam du spyod par bya ba'i dus de kho nar nges par 'chab pa'i dus spyod par 'gyur ro snyam du don grub pa la mngon par brten nas yid kyis brten par bya ba tsam la ni ma yin no zhes bya bar go bar bya ba'i don du
analyzed: de tsam du spyod par bya ba'i dus de kho nar nges par 'chab pa'i dus spyod par 'gyur ro snyam du don grub pa la mngon par brten nas yid kyis brten par bya ba tsam la ni ma yin no zhes bya bar go bar bya ba'i don du
translated: It is not just in terms of the mere reliance of the mind on the meaning that is accomplished.

original: dag pa'i mtha' can zhes bya ba 'og nas brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: dag pa'i mtha' can zhes bya ba 'og nas brjod par bya'o //
translated: The word “pure limit” will be explained below.

original: 'dir dag pa'i mtha' can gyi don ni tshig gi don 'dis spo ba 'di la yod pas na dag pa'i mtha' can no //
analyzed: 'dir dag pa'i mtha' can gyi don ni tshig gi don 'dis spo ba 'di la yod pas na dag pa'i mtha' can no //
translated: Here, the meaning of the pure limit is that this transference exists in this meaning of the word, therefore it is the pure limit.

original: de yod pas dag pa'i mtha' ste /
analyzed: de yod pas dag pa'i mtha' ste /
translated: Because it exists, there is the limit of purification.

original: ji ltar khyod la 'di sbyin ba dang blang ba zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: ji ltar khyod la 'di sbyin ba dang blang ba zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: How is it that for you there is the meaning of giving and taking?

original: 'o na bcabs pa'i dus nges par mi shes pas nyung ba nyid du mi rung ba'i dus la brten par gang gsungs pa de la ni nyung ba nyid du mi 'gyur ba'i dus yongs su chad pa zhig la brten par bya ba 'am zhe na ma yin te
analyzed: 'o na bcabs pa'i dus nges par mi shes pas nyung ba nyid du mi rung ba'i dus la brten par gang gsungs pa de la ni nyung ba nyid du mi 'gyur ba'i dus yongs su chad pa zhig la brten par bya ba 'am zhe na ma yin te
translated: Now, since the time of concealment is not ascertained, it is not suitable to rely on a time of fewness. But what was said about relying on a time of non-suitability due to fewness? It is not so.

original: / de'i phyir bcabs pa ni dpag tu med pa la'o zhes bya ba smos te brten par bya'o zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
analyzed: / de'i phyir bcabs pa ni dpag tu med pa la'o zhes bya ba smos te brten par bya'o zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
translated: Therefore it is said, Concealment is for an immeasurable time. It should be relied upon.

original: ji ltar zhe na /🔽de'i phyir bsams bzhin du khu ba phyung ba las byung ba dpag tu med par zhes so zhes bya ba smos te /
analyzed: ji ltar zhe na / de'i phyir bsams bzhin du khu ba phyung ba las byung ba dpag tu med par zhes so zhes bya ba smos te /
translated: How is that?🔽Therefore it is said, It arises from the emission of semen as intended, for an immeasurable time.

original: dus bcabs pa go bar bya'i don du 'dir yang dag par 'byung ba brjod pa'i 'og tu dus dpag tu med par bcabs pa zhes bya bar sbyar te /
analyzed: dus bcabs pa go bar bya'i don du 'dir yang dag par 'byung ba brjod pa'i 'og tu dus dpag tu med par bcabs pa zhes bya bar sbyar te /
translated: For the purpose of understanding the time of concealment, here the arising is stated, and after that, Concealment for an immeasurable time is applied.

original: zla ba bzhi bcabs pas ni ma yin zhes bya ba'i don no ;
analyzed: zla ba bzhi bcabs pas ni ma yin zhes bya ba'i don no ;
translated: It does not mean that he conceals it for four months.

original: /'di skad brjod pa na bden pa brjod par mi 'gyur te /🔽'di la ji snyed la sems pa de snyed du gtogs pa nyid rjes su bsgrub po zhes bya ba 'di la zhes bya ba ni yongs su gnas pa dang mgu bar bya ba dag la'o //
analyzed: /'di skad brjod pa na bden pa brjod par mi 'gyur te / 'di la ji snyed la sems pa de snyed du gtogs pa nyid rjes su bsgrub po zhes bya ba 'di la zhes bya ba ni yongs su gnas pa dang mgu bar bya ba dag la'o //
translated: When he says this, he does not tell a lie,🔽because he is committed to the extent that he intends.🔽In this case, “in this” refers to the penance and the pleasing act.

original: 'di la ltung ba ji snyed pa phyir bcos par sems pa de snyed du gtogs ba nyid ces su bsgrub par bya ste /
analyzed: 'di la ltung ba ji snyed pa phyir bcos par sems pa de snyed du gtogs ba nyid ces su bsgrub par bya ste /
translated: He is committed to the extent that he intends to confess the downfalls.

original: ltung ba mang po dag la yang yongs su gnas pa dang mgu bar bya ba gcig rjes su bsgrub par bya ba nyid kyis chog go zhes bstan pa'o //🔽tshad ni rnam pa gnyis te ltung ba'i tshad dang mtshan mo'i tshad do //
analyzed: ltung ba mang po dag la yang yongs su gnas pa dang mgu bar bya ba gcig rjes su bsgrub par bya ba nyid kyis chog go zhes bstan pa'o // tshad ni rnam pa gnyis te ltung ba'i tshad dang mtshan mo'i tshad do //
translated: It is enough that he is committed to one penance and pleasing act for all the downfalls, even though there are many downfalls.

original: de la mtshan mo'i mtshan nges par mi @216a * //
analyzed: de la mtshan mo'i mtshan nges par mi @216a * //
translated: The measure of downfalls is twofold: the measure of downfalls and the measure of nights.

original: shes pa'i cho ga ni bstan zin to /
analyzed: shes pa'i cho ga ni bstan zin to /
translated: The rule for determining the night has already been explained.

original: // / ltung ba'i tshad nges par mi shas pa'i cho ga bstan par bya ste /
analyzed: // / ltung ba'i tshad nges par mi shas pa'i cho ga bstan par bya ste /
translated: The rite for confessing when the measure of downfalls is not known should be taught.

original: nges par mi shes na de dpag tu med pa la brten par bya'o zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: nges par mi shes na de dpag tu med pa la brten par bya'o zhes bya ba la /
translated: If it is not known, then one should rely on the measureless.

original: de zhes bya ba ni dpe tsam yod pa la'o //
analyzed: de zhes bya ba ni dpe tsam yod pa la'o //
translated: The word “that” refers to the mere example.

original: ltung ba'i tshad nges par mi shes na ltung ba de dpag tu med pa byung ngo zhes bya ba de la brten par bya ste /
analyzed: ltung ba'i tshad nges par mi shes na ltung ba de dpag tu med pa byung ngo zhes bya ba de la brten par bya ste /
translated: If the measure of the downfall is not known, then one should rely on the measureless downfalls that have occurred.

original: phyir bcos par bya ba 'dra ba'i phyir de ltar shes par bya'o //
analyzed: phyir bcos par bya ba 'dra ba'i phyir de ltar shes par bya'o //
translated: One should understand it in that way because the confession is similar.🔽In the case of many, it is said to be “endowed with a very great measure.”

original: mang po nyid la ni tshad shin tu mang po dang ldan pa zhes so zhes bya ba ni ltung ba dag mang po yin na che ge mo las byung ba'i dge 'dun lhag ma'i tshad ltung ba shin tu mang po dang ldan pa byung ba la brten par
analyzed: mang po nyid la ni tshad shin tu mang po dang ldan pa zhes so zhes bya ba ni ltung ba dag mang po yin na che ge mo las byung ba'i dge 'dun lhag ma'i tshad ltung ba shin tu mang po dang ldan pa byung ba la brten par
translated: If the downfalls are many, then one should rely on the measure of the saṃghāvaśeṣa downfalls that have occurred, which is very great.

original: bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: This is the meaning.

original: dus rnams ni lhag pas so zhes bya ba ni ltung ba dang bcas pa'i dus tha dad pa rnams dang lhan cig tu yongs su gnas pa dang / mgu bar bya ba sbyin pa de'i tshe na ltung ba gzhan dag gi dus yun ring zhing lhag pa de la brten par bya'o //
analyzed: dus rnams ni lhag pas so zhes bya ba ni ltung ba dang bcas pa'i dus tha dad pa rnams dang lhan cig tu yongs su gnas pa dang / mgu bar bya ba sbyin pa de'i tshe na ltung ba gzhan dag gi dus yun ring zhing lhag pa de la brten par bya'o //
translated: The times are superior means that one should rely on the times of other downfalls that are longer and superior to the time of that act of giving pleasure.

original: ming dag la ni sogs pa dang ldan pa nyid du'o zhes bya ba ni bsams bzhin du khu ba phyung ba las byung ba la sogs pa ni 'dir ming du gsungs bar rig par bya ba ste gal te sde tshan gyi ming de dag la ni sogs pa🔽dang ldan pa nyid du brten par bya'o //
analyzed: ming dag la ni sogs pa dang ldan pa nyid du'o zhes bya ba ni bsams bzhin du khu ba phyung ba las byung ba la sogs pa ni 'dir ming du gsungs bar rig par bya ba ste gal te sde tshan gyi ming de dag la ni sogs pa dang ldan pa nyid du brten par bya'o //
translated: One should rely on the names and so on means that one should rely on the names of other downfalls that are mentioned in the scriptures, understanding that the names of downfalls such as emission of semen through intention are mentioned here.🔽If those are the names of the classes, one should rely on the names of the classes and so on.

original: gang rnams kyis de dang po zhes bya ba don des ltung ba gzhan dag gi ming brjod pa la brten par bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: gang rnams kyis de dang po zhes bya ba don des ltung ba gzhan dag gi ming brjod pa la brten par bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: By which it is first means that one should rely on the names of other downfalls that are mentioned in the scriptures by that meaning.

original: ci bye brag med par dang po gang yin pa nyid la brten par bya ba 'am zhe na /
analyzed: ci bye brag med par dang po gang yin pa nyid la brten par bya ba 'am zhe na /
translated: Is it that one should rely on any first one without distinction?

original: de'i phyir lci ba nyid dang bsam pa drag pos byas pa nyid dag gis dang po nyid du'o zhes bya ba smos te ;
analyzed: de'i phyir lci ba nyid dang bsam pa drag pos byas pa nyid dag gis dang po nyid du'o zhes bya ba smos te ;
translated: Therefore, the root text states, “By the weight of the offense and by the strength of the motivation.”🔽Here, the weight of the offense refers to the fact that a downfall that is committed with a heavy basis is a weighty downfall.

original: 'dir lci ba nyid ces bya ba ni gzhi las ltung ba gang las dngos po las ltung ba du ma yod par 'gyur ba la ltung ba lci ba nyid dang / bsam pa drag pos byas pa nyid ni de la dang po nyid kyang ltung ba'i phyir bcos pa nyid dang phyir brten par bya ba nyid do //
analyzed: 'dir lci ba nyid ces bya ba ni gzhi las ltung ba gang las dngos po las ltung ba du ma yod par 'gyur ba la ltung ba lci ba nyid dang / bsam pa drag pos byas pa nyid ni de la dang po nyid kyang ltung ba'i phyir bcos pa nyid dang phyir brten par bya ba nyid do //
translated: The strength of the motivation refers to the fact that a downfall that is committed with a strong motivation is a weighty downfall.

original: 'dir gzhung ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa nye ba 'khor gyis zhus pa /
analyzed: 'dir gzhung ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa nye ba 'khor gyis zhus pa /
translated: The text states, “The venerable Upāli asked the Lord Buddha,

original: btsun ba dge slong la dge 'dun lhag ma'i ltung ba byung zhing bsams bzhin du khu ba phyung ba las byung ba ni dgung gcig bcabs la 'dzin pa las 'byung ba dgung gnyis bcabs pa nas bka' blo mi bde ba byung ba dgung @216b bcu gsum bcabs pa'i
analyzed: btsun ba dge slong la dge 'dun lhag ma'i ltung ba byung zhing bsams bzhin du khu ba phyung ba las byung ba ni dgung gcig bcabs la 'dzin pa las 'byung ba dgung gnyis bcabs pa nas bka' blo mi bde ba byung ba dgung @216b bcu gsum bcabs pa'i
translated: ‘Reverend, if a fully ordained monk commits a partial defeat that is concealed for one day, and then he commits a partial defeat that is concealed for two days, and then he becomes discontented, and then he conceals that for thirteen days,🔽how should he be made to confess his offenses?’

original: bar du byung na /
analyzed: bar du byung na /
translated: If it occurs in the middle,

original: btsun ba de dag dus gcig dang skad cig la las bgyid pa gcig gi yongs su gnas pa dang / gzhi nas yongs su gnas pa dang mgu bar bgyi ba dang / gzhi nas mgu bar bgyi ba stsal cing dbyung bar bgyi ba dang / las de dag brjod par bgyi bar brjod pa dang des dge 'dun la yang 'gal tshabs can du mi 'gyur bar rung ngam /
analyzed: btsun ba de dag dus gcig dang skad cig la las bgyid pa gcig gi yongs su gnas pa dang / gzhi nas yongs su gnas pa dang mgu bar bgyi ba dang / gzhi nas mgu bar bgyi ba stsal cing dbyung bar bgyi ba dang / las de dag brjod par bgyi bar brjod pa dang des dge 'dun la yang 'gal tshabs can du mi 'gyur bar rung ngam /
translated: is it possible for those bhikṣus to perform the actions of a single formal procedure at the same time and in the same instant, to grant and to lift the probationary fine, the trial period, and the rehabilitation, and to declare the actions of those procedures? And is it possible for them to do so without that becoming a fault for the saṅgha?”🔽“Upāli, it is possible.

original: nye ba 'khor rung ste /🔽bsams bzhin du khu ba phyung ba zhig phyung ba zhag gcig bcabs pa'i ltung ba gang yin pa nas bka' blo mi bde ba las byung ba zhag bcu gsum bcabs pa'i bar gyi ltung ba gang yin pa de dag la dam pa dang rab tu dam pa dang
analyzed: nye ba 'khor rung ste /🔽bsams bzhin du khu ba phyung ba zhig phyung ba zhag gcig bcabs pa'i ltung ba gang yin pa nas bka' blo mi bde ba las byung ba zhag bcu gsum bcabs pa'i bar gyi ltung ba gang yin pa de dag la dam pa dang rab tu dam pa dang
translated: The serious, very serious,

original: lci ba dang zhag gcig tu bcabs pa gang yin pa de'i phyir yongs su gnas pa dang / gzhi nas yongs su gnas pa dang / mgu bar bya ba dang / mgu bar bya ba sbyin zhing dbyung bar bya ste /
analyzed: lci ba dang zhag gcig tu bcabs pa gang yin pa de'i phyir yongs su gnas pa dang / gzhi nas yongs su gnas pa dang / mgu bar bya ba dang / mgu bar bya ba sbyin zhing dbyung bar bya ste /
translated: Because he conceals the heavy and the light for one day, he should be made to stay, he should be made to stay on the basis, he should be made to please, he should be made to give what pleases, and he should be expelled.

original: las de dag kyang byas par brjod par bya la des dge 'dun la yang 'gal tshabs can du mi 'gyur ro zhes gsungs pa yin no //
analyzed: las de dag kyang byas par brjod par bya la des dge 'dun la yang 'gal tshabs can du mi 'gyur ro zhes gsungs pa yin no //
translated: And it is said that those actions should be called done, and that he does not commit an offense against the Saṅgha.

original: gang zhig 'dir mngon par zhen par byas pa ni dam pa yin la mngon par zhen pa shas chen por byas pa ni rab tu dam pa nyid yin par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: gang zhig 'dir mngon par zhen par byas pa ni dam pa yin la mngon par zhen pa shas chen por byas pa ni rab tu dam pa nyid yin par rig par bya'o //
translated: It should be understood that the best is that which is adhered to here, and the very best is that which is adhered to with great force.

original: spyod pa la sngon byung ba gzhan gyi gso bar 'dod pa skyes na tha dad par sbyin zhing cig car spyad do zhes bya ba ni yongs su dag pa dang mgu bar bya ba spyod pa'i gang zag la sngon ltung ba byung ba gzhan gyi gso bar 'dod
analyzed: spyod pa la sngon byung ba gzhan gyi gso bar 'dod pa skyes na tha dad par sbyin zhing cig car spyad do zhes bya ba ni yongs su dag pa dang mgu bar bya ba spyod pa'i gang zag la sngon ltung ba byung ba gzhan gyi gso bar 'dod
translated: If a person who is practicing purification and pleasing wishes to confess another downfall that occurred previously, he should confess it separately and practice together with the other.

original: pa bskyed na ltung ba de'i yongs su gnas pa dang mgu bar bya ba sbyin pa tha dad par sbyin par bya zhing spyad pa ni cig car spyad du rung ba ste /
analyzed: pa bskyed na ltung ba de'i yongs su gnas pa dang mgu bar bya ba sbyin pa tha dad par sbyin par bya zhing spyad pa ni cig car spyad du rung ba ste /
translated: If one generates the other, then the observance of the downfall and the giving of the pleasing thing are given separately, but the observance is suitable to be practiced simultaneously.

original: 'di la ltung ba gzhan yin pas spyad pa yang spyad pa'i cho ga yin no snyam du bsam par mi bya'o //
analyzed: 'di la ltung ba gzhan yin pas spyad pa yang spyad pa'i cho ga yin no snyam du bsam par mi bya'o //
translated: But one should not think that this is another downfall, and that the observance is the rite for observing it.

original: de bcabs pa nyid yin na mgu bar bya ba la mi srid do zhes bya ba ni mgu ba spyod pa dang yongs su gnas pa de cig car spyod par thal ba bzlog pa'i phyir mdo 'di byas so //
analyzed: de bcabs pa nyid yin na mgu bar bya ba la mi srid do zhes bya ba ni mgu ba spyod pa dang yongs su gnas pa de cig car spyod par thal ba bzlog pa'i phyir mdo 'di byas so //
translated: If it is concealed, it is impossible to practice the pleasing thing. This sutra was composed in order to avert the consequence that the practice of the pleasing thing and the observance would be practiced simultaneously.

original: ltung ba bcabs pa bcabs pa nyid dang lhan cig spyod pa 'di la mgu bar bya ba spyad pa ni mi srid de yongs su gnas pa dang / lhan cig tu zhes bya ba'i don gyis go ba'o //
analyzed: ltung ba bcabs pa bcabs pa nyid dang lhan cig spyod pa 'di la mgu bar bya ba spyad pa ni mi srid de yongs su gnas pa dang / lhan cig tu zhes bya ba'i don gyis go ba'o //
translated: It is impossible to practice the pleasing thing in this concealment of the concealed downfall together with the observance, since the meaning of “together with” is understood.

original: mgu bar bya ba ni sems mgu bar @217a * //🔽bya ba'i phyir yin la /
analyzed: mgu bar bya ba ni sems mgu bar @217a * //🔽bya ba'i phyir yin la /
translated: The pleasing thing is for the sake of pleasing the mind.

original: yongs su gnas pa ni bcabs pa'i kha na ma tho ba gzhom pa'i phyir yin no //
analyzed: yongs su gnas pa ni bcabs pa'i kha na ma tho ba gzhom pa'i phyir yin no //
translated: And perfect purity is for the purpose of destroying concealed offenses.

original: de bas na 'di gnyis cig car spyad pa ni mi srid do //
analyzed: de bas na 'di gnyis cig car spyad pa ni mi srid do //
translated: Therefore, it is impossible to practice both simultaneously.🔽Monks, you should give the person two causes of downfalls: first, give perfect purity as he concealed it;

original: dge slong dag khyod kyis gang zag de la ltung ba gnyis pa'i rgyu la snga ma la ni ji ltar bcabs pa'i yongs su gnas pa byin cig / phyi ma la ni zhag drug mgu ba byin cig ces bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa yin pa de
analyzed: dge slong dag khyod kyis gang zag de la ltung ba gnyis pa'i rgyu la snga ma la ni ji ltar bcabs pa'i yongs su gnas pa byin cig / phyi ma la ni zhag drug mgu ba byin cig ces bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa yin pa de
translated: second, give satisfaction for six days.🔽This is stated in the context of practicing satisfaction, but perfect purity should not be taught in that way.

original: ni mgu ba spyod pa'i gnas skabs su yongs su gnas pa la spyad pa yang de ltar bstan par mi bya ste da ni phyir bcol ba tsam bstan pa yin pas na des ni sngar bcabs pa'i phyir yongs su gnas pa byed du bcug la de'i 'og tu
analyzed: ni mgu ba spyod pa'i gnas skabs su yongs su gnas pa la spyad pa yang de ltar bstan par mi bya ste da ni phyir bcol ba tsam bstan pa yin pas na des ni sngar bcabs pa'i phyir yongs su gnas pa byed du bcug la de'i 'og tu
translated: Since it is merely a request, it is stated that he should be made to practice perfect purity for the previous concealment and then🔽he should be made to practice satisfaction for the purpose of being expelled.

original: dbyung ba'i phyir mgu bar byed du bcug cig ces gsungs pa yin gyi mgu ba dang yongs su gnas pa gnyis cig car spyod du gzhug pa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: dbyung ba'i phyir mgu bar byed du bcug cig ces gsungs pa yin gyi mgu ba dang yongs su gnas pa gnyis cig car spyod du gzhug pa ni ma yin no //
translated: It is not that both satisfaction and perfect purity are to be practiced simultaneously.

original: dus dang dus ma yin par bsdus pa'i dbyung ba gzhi'o zhes bya ba ni gzhi 'di la ming du byas pa'o //
analyzed: dus dang dus ma yin par bsdus pa'i dbyung ba gzhi'o zhes bya ba ni gzhi 'di la ming du byas pa'o //
translated: The basis of the arising of the occasion and the non-occasion is the basis that is named.

original: 'di ni ltung ba bcabs pa spyad pa rnams kyi ldang ba'i dus so //
analyzed: 'di ni ltung ba bcabs pa spyad pa rnams kyi ldang ba'i dus so //
translated: This is the occasion of arising for those who have committed a downfall and concealed it.

original: 'di ni dus ma yin no zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
analyzed: 'di ni dus ma yin no zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
translated: This is not the occasion,

original: 'di ni mi shes pa'i dus la brten par bya'o //
analyzed: 'di ni mi shes pa'i dus la brten par bya'o //
translated: one should rely on the occasion of ignorance.

original: bsdus pa 'byung ba zhes bya ba ni ltung ba rnams kyi chog mdor bsdus pa 'di cig car mngon du 'byung ngo zhes bya ba'i tshig gis de rig par bya'o //
analyzed: bsdus pa 'byung ba zhes bya ba ni ltung ba rnams kyi chog mdor bsdus pa 'di cig car mngon du 'byung ngo zhes bya ba'i tshig gis de rig par bya'o //
translated: The arising of the occasion is to be understood by the statement: “This is the summary of the downfalls, which arises all at once.”

original: dus dang dus ma yin par bsdus pa 'byung ba'i gzhi'o //
analyzed: dus dang dus ma yin par bsdus pa 'byung ba'i gzhi'o //
translated: The basis of the arising of the occasion and the non-occasion.🔽The concealment does not arise in the last part of the night and day,

original: / nyin mtshan gyi mtha'i cha ma yin pa la 'chab pa mi 'byung ngo zhes bya ba ni skya rengs shar na ni 'chab pa 'byung ba kho nar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: / nyin mtshan gyi mtha'i cha ma yin pa la 'chab pa mi 'byung ngo zhes bya ba ni skya rengs shar na ni 'chab pa 'byung ba kho nar 'gyur ro //
translated: but when the dawn breaks, the concealment arises.

original: brjod pa'i yan lag med na de'i sems ma yin pa nyid 'chab pa ma yin no zhes bya ba ni brjod pa'i rang bzhin du gyur ba dang rang bzhin du gnas pa dang / lta ba tha mi dad pa dang bsnyen par rdzogs pa dang bcas pa dang /
analyzed: brjod pa'i yan lag med na de'i sems ma yin pa nyid 'chab pa ma yin no zhes bya ba ni brjod pa'i rang bzhin du gyur ba dang rang bzhin du gnas pa dang / lta ba tha mi dad pa dang bsnyen par rdzogs pa dang bcas pa dang /
translated: The basis for expression is the person who is of the nature of expression, who is abiding in his nature, who is not distinct from the view, who is fully ordained,

original: mtshan tha mi dad pa dang / mtshams kyi nang na gnas pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i gang zag gang yin pa de med na /
analyzed: mtshan tha mi dad pa dang / mtshams kyi nang na gnas pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i gang zag gang yin pa de med na /
translated: who is not distinct from the characteristics, who is abiding within the boundary, and so on.🔽If there is no such person, then even in the final part of the day and night, there is no expression of the absence of mind.

original: nyin mtshan gyi tha ma'i cha de la yang de'i sems ma yin pa nyid ces bya ba brjod pa de'i sems ma yin pa nyid ces bya ba yod kyang da 'chab ba ma yin no //

translated: Even if there is the absence of mind, there is no concealment.

original: brjod pa'i yan lag yod pa gal te mi brjod do snyam du mi brjod pa'i bsam @217b pa skye na de'i tshe 'chab pa kho nar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: brjod pa'i yan lag yod pa gal te mi brjod do snyam du mi brjod pa'i bsam @217b pa skye na de'i tshe 'chab pa kho nar 'gyur ro //
translated: If one thinks, “The basis for expression exists, but I will not express it,” and generates the intention not to express it, then at that time there is indeed concealment.

original: brjod pa'i yan lag nye bar gnas su zin kyang rkyen 'ga' zhig gis bdag nyid der brjod du 'gro ba'i skabs med dam bdag nyid gnas de nas gzhan du song bar gyur pa'i dbang dag gis brjod pa'i yan lag med pa na mi brjod pa'i sems gang yin🔽pa de ni 'chab pa ma yin no //
analyzed: brjod pa'i yan lag nye bar gnas su zin kyang rkyen 'ga' zhig gis bdag nyid der brjod du 'gro ba'i skabs med dam bdag nyid gnas de nas gzhan du song bar gyur pa'i dbang dag gis brjod pa'i yan lag med pa na mi brjod pa'i sems gang yin🔽pa de ni 'chab pa ma yin no //

translated: Not only is the inexpressible similar to nonexistence, but also the following is suspected: “It is made by the power of its conditions.”

original: dbang gis te de ltar na yang bcabs par mi 'gyur ba kho na yin no //
analyzed: dbang gis te de ltar na yang bcabs par mi 'gyur ba kho na yin no //
translated: But even so, it is not concealed.

original: song ste ma brjod na bdag la bcabs pa'i nyes par 'gyur ro snyam du dogs pa'i bsam pa gal te brjod pa'i yan lag drung du mi 'gro 'am /
analyzed: song ste ma brjod na bdag la bcabs pa'i nyes par 'gyur ro snyam du dogs pa'i bsam pa gal te brjod pa'i yan lag drung du mi 'gro 'am /
translated: If one does not go to the place of expression and express it, one is suspected of concealing it.

original: gnas de nas gzhan du song bar gyur na /
analyzed: gnas de nas gzhan du song bar gyur na /
translated: If one goes to another place,

analyzed: de ltar na yang brjod pa'i yan lag med pa dang 'dra ba nyid du rig par bya ste de'i tshe yang 'chab par mi bya'o //
translated: then it should be understood that it is similar to the absence of the part of expression, and at that time it is not concealed.

original: 'dir gzhung ni btsun pa re zhig dge slong ltung ba dang bcas pa dge slong mi gnas na mchis shing gang la yang brjod par mi bgyid na bcabs par brjod par bgyi 'am /
analyzed: 'dir gzhung ni btsun pa re zhig dge slong ltung ba dang bcas pa dge slong mi gnas na mchis shing gang la yang brjod par mi bgyid na bcabs par brjod par bgyi 'am /
translated: “Venerable, if a fully ordained monk who has a downfall does not stay with the fully ordained monks and does not speak to anyone, should he declare the downfall?”

original: nye ba 'khor mi bya'o //
analyzed: nye ba 'khor mi bya'o //
translated: “Upāli, he should not.”

original: btsun pa re zhig dge slong ltung ba dang bcas pa dge slong rnams dang lhan cig gdugs yol bar bgyis nas mtshan mo slong mi gnas na mchis shing gang la yang brjod par mi bgyi na bcabs par brjod par mi 'gyi 'am nye ba 'khor mi bya'o zhes🔽gsungs pa yin no //
analyzed: btsun pa re zhig dge slong ltung ba dang bcas pa dge slong rnams dang lhan cig gdugs yol bar bgyis nas mtshan mo slong mi gnas na mchis shing gang la yang brjod par mi bgyi na bcabs par brjod par mi 'gyi 'am nye ba 'khor mi bya'o zhes gsungs pa yin no //
translated: “Venerable, if a fully ordained monk who has a downfall stays with the fully ordained monks, but does not speak to them at night, should he declare the downfall?”🔽“Upāli, he should not.”🔽“If he goes without purpose, he commits an offense of wrong conduct.”🔽“If he goes for some purpose, he commits an offense of wrong conduct.”

original: don med pas ni nyes byas so zhes bya ba ni don cung zad la yang mi ltos par mi 'gro 'am /
analyzed: don med pas ni nyes byas so zhes bya ba ni don cung zad la yang mi ltos par mi 'gro 'am /

analyzed: gal te nus pa nyid na nyi ma brjod pa yang ngo //

analyzed: de'i gtsug lag khang tha mar 'os pa nyid yin no zhes bya ba la //

original: 'dug pa la tha mar 'os pa'i cho ga 'di yin te /
analyzed: 'dug pa la tha mar 'os pa'i cho ga 'di yin te /

original: de bas na de rtsom pa'o //
analyzed: de bas na de rtsom pa'o //

analyzed: rang bzhin du gnas pa rnams las mthar 'os pa'i chog gnyis po 'di yin te /

original: 'dis ni phan tshun du yongs su gnas pa la sogs pa rnams la ji ltar gang gi tshe rigs kyi cho ga la gnod par shes par bya ba ma yin no //

translated: By this, it should be understood that mutual complete reliance, etc., are not to be violated when the proper procedure of the class is known.

original: bslab pa byin pa la yongs su gnas pa dang / mgu bar spyod pa dag gis gzhan nyid ces bya ba shin tu dman pa dang rtsub pa byung ba ma yin par shes par bya zhing 'di rnams thams cad gnas nas phyung ba spang ba nyid kyi phyir shes par bya'o //

translated: It should be understood that another means not a very inferior or harsh person, by means of the complete reliance on one who has given the training and the conduct that pleases. All of these should be known as to be abandoned by the expulsion from the residence.

original: thams cad du rnyed pa dbang ba nyid yin no //
analyzed: thams cad du rnyed pa dbang ba nyid yin no //
translated: Everywhere, it is the right to obtain.

original: dge ba'i phyogs la mi g-yel bar bya'o zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: dge ba'i phyogs la mi g-yel bar bya'o zhes bya ba la /

original: 'di ni dge ba'i phyogs kyi dus ma yin par shes par mi bya ste /
analyzed: 'di ni dge ba'i phyogs kyi dus ma yin par shes par mi bya ste /
translated: One should not think that this is not the time to practice virtue,

original: 'di ltar de'i dus na rtogs pa'i skal ba can ma yin du zin kyang de ltar mod kyis tshogs rjes su bsgrub pa'i phyir mi rigs te /

original: de'i skal ba can ma yin pa de lta bas na 'dir dgongs pa de rig par bya'o //
analyzed: de'i skal ba can ma yin pa de lta bas na 'dir dgongs pa de rig par bya'o //
translated: Therefore, one should understand the intention here.

analyzed: slar skal ba dang ldan pa nyid de'i tshe bsam pas ldang ba las ldang bar smra'i chad pa'i las kyis ni ma yin no zhes gsungs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: It is said that one who is fit again at that time rises by intention, not by the action of being expelled.🔽One who has received training also rises by realization, not by the action of being expelled.

original: bslab pa byin pa yang rtogs pas grags pas des na dgra bcom nyid thob pa na yongs su gnas pa dang mgu ba spyod pa 'di gnyis kyang bslab pa sbyin pa dang 'dra ba rang bzhin @221a * //

translated: Therefore, when one obtains arhatship, these two, abiding and delighting in training, are like one who has received training.

original: thob cing chad pa'i las lhag ma spyad par bya ba mi dgos pa nyid yin te /
analyzed: thob cing chad pa'i las lhag ma spyad par bya ba mi dgos pa nyid yin te /
translated: One who has received the full ordination and has not violated the precepts does not need to perform the remaining actions of receiving the full ordination.

translated: One should understand that it is not necessary to perform the ceremony of leaving the rainy season retreat, etc.🔽Here, the search for the nature of the gift and the search for the nature of the giver of training are similar to that.

translated: The first two of the three mentioned in the sutra, “the practice of complete training, the practice of pleasing others, and the practice of training,” are the first two.

original: yongs su gnas pa spyod pa dang mgu bar bya ba spyod pa gnyis kyis gnas gang du spyad par bya ba yang dag par blangs pa'i gnas de las gzhan pa'i mtshams su skya rengs 'char bar mi bya'o //

translated: The two, the practice of complete training and the practice of pleasing others, do not rise in another place, that is, in another boundary, from the place where one takes up the practice.

analyzed: bslab pa byin pa la ni cho ga ji srid 'tsho'i bar du de la 'jug pa dang bar du gcod par gyur pa 'di med do //
translated: But for one who has been given training, there is no ceremony and as long as one lives, there is no interruption of engagement in it.

original: de ni tshe gcig gis yin pas tshe gcig tu nges pa med pa'i phyir snga rol du ji srid 'tsho ba zhes bya ba mi sbyor ba'o //
analyzed: de ni tshe gcig gis yin pas tshe gcig tu nges pa med pa'i phyir snga rol du ji srid 'tsho ba zhes bya ba mi sbyor ba'o //
translated: Since that is for one lifetime, it is not definite for one lifetime, and therefore, unlike the vow of individual liberation, it is not applied as long as one lives.

original: 'dir las bzhin du thams cad mi 'tshogs na brjod pa mi 'chags pa ma yin te de lta bas na ji snyed pa 'dus pa de snyed pa rnams la nyes pa dang bral bar rig par bya'o //

translated: The Saṅgha that is neither gathered nor not gathered is the one that is neither gathered nor not gathered in the present.
