analyzed: nyes pa bstan te zhes bya ba ni ltung ba bkal zhing zhes bya ba'i rnam grangs gzhan bstan pa'o //
translated: “Having shown the fault” is another way of saying “having laid out the downfall.”

original: rta dmu rgod phur pa dang bcas pa dang 'dra bar de dang dri ma dang bcas par btang ba yin pas de'i phyir phur pa dang bcas pa zhes bya'o //
analyzed: rta dmu rgod phur pa dang bcas pa dang 'dra bar de dang dri ma dang bcas par btang ba yin pas de'i phyir phur pa dang bcas pa zhes bya'o //
translated: Just as a wild horse is released with a stake, so too is one released with a stain. Therefore, it is called “with a stake.”

original: tshul khrims dang lta ba dang @226b cho ga dang 'tsho ba nyams pas gleng ba la sogs pa de dag thams cad byed na gzhi dang bcas pa 'chags so zhes bya ba ni mthong ba dang thos pa dang dogs pa dag gis gzhi dang bcas par tshul khrims
analyzed: tshul khrims dang lta ba dang @226b cho ga dang 'tsho ba nyams pas gleng ba la sogs pa de dag thams cad byed na gzhi dang bcas pa 'chags so zhes bya ba ni mthong ba dang thos pa dang dogs pa dag gis gzhi dang bcas par tshul khrims
translated: If one engages in those, such as discussing the degeneration of ethics, view, rite and livelihood, that are with basis through seeing, hearing or suspecting, then one confesses the basis.

original: dang lta ba dang cho ga dang 'tsho ba nyams pas gleng pa dang dran par bya ba dang skabs 'byed du gzhug pa dang brjod pa dang bcas pa dang / mi gdams pa nyid dang / gso sbyong gzhag pa dang / dgag dbye gzhag pa phur pa dang bcas pas bya ba dag byed na 'chags pa'o //
analyzed: dang lta ba dang cho ga dang 'tsho ba nyams pas gleng pa dang dran par bya ba dang skabs 'byed du gzhug pa dang brjod pa dang bcas pa dang / mi gdams pa nyid dang / gso sbyong gzhag pa dang / dgag dbye gzhag pa phur pa dang bcas pas bya ba dag byed na 'chags pa'o //
translated: If one engages in those, such as discussing the degeneration of ethics, view, rite and livelihood, that are with basis through being reminded, being allowed to speak, speaking, being unrestrained, postponing poṣadha and postponing the lifting of restrictions with a stake, then one confesses.

original: de dag bya ba yang gzhi yod na 'chags kyi gzhi med par tshul khrims la sogs pa nyams pas gleng ba la sogs pa byed pa ni mi 'chags so //
analyzed: de dag bya ba yang gzhi yod na 'chags kyi gzhi med par tshul khrims la sogs pa nyams pas gleng ba la sogs pa byed pa ni mi 'chags so //
translated: If one engages in those, then one confesses the basis. If one engages in those, such as discussing the degeneration of ethics and so on, without a basis, then one does not confess.

original: gzhi legs pa ma yin pas mi bya'o zhes bya ba ni gleng ba la sogs pa de dag legs par ma mthong ba dang / legs par ma thos pa dang / legs par mi dogs par mi bya ba dang / mi gsal bar thos pa ni legs par ma thos pa'o //
analyzed: gzhi legs pa ma yin pas mi bya'o zhes bya ba ni gleng ba la sogs pa de dag legs par ma mthong ba dang / legs par ma thos pa dang / legs par mi dogs par mi bya ba dang / mi gsal bar thos pa ni legs par ma thos pa'o //
translated: Hearing unclearly is not hearing well.

original: snying tha dad cing dad pa zhen pa'i yongs su rtog pa ni legs par mi dogs pa'o //
analyzed: snying tha dad cing dad pa zhen pa'i yongs su rtog pa ni legs par mi dogs pa'o //
translated: Suspicion is the investigation of those who are of different minds and have clinging faith.

original: 'dir gzhi dri ngan pa yod de /
analyzed: 'dir gzhi dri ngan pa yod de /
translated: Here, there is a basis for bad smells.

original: de bas na 'dir mi 'chags pa ma yin par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: de bas na 'dir mi 'chags pa ma yin par rig par bya'o //
translated: Therefore, it should be known that one does not confess here.

original: 'di ni phran tshegs dag las 'byung ngo //
analyzed: 'di ni phran tshegs dag las 'byung ngo //
translated: This is found in the Ksudraka Collection.

original: 'di la dngos po la bden pa nyid ni rgyu ma yin no zhes bya ba ni gzhi 'di la dngos po la bden pa nyid ni rgyu ma yin gyi 'du shes kyi dbang gis 'di rnam par gzhag pa ste /
analyzed: 'di la dngos po la bden pa nyid ni rgyu ma yin no zhes bya ba ni gzhi 'di la dngos po la bden pa nyid ni rgyu ma yin gyi 'du shes kyi dbang gis 'di rnam par gzhag pa ste /
translated: Here, it is said, The reality of things is not the cause, meaning that the reality of things is not the cause in this basis, but it is established by the power of perception.

original: dngos po bden pa nyid yin na yang gal te mthong ba la sogs pa'i 'du shes med par gleng bar byed na gzhi med pa kho nas gleng ba la sogs pa kho nar 'gyur la /
analyzed: dngos po bden pa nyid yin na yang gal te mthong ba la sogs pa'i 'du shes med par gleng bar byed na gzhi med pa kho nas gleng ba la sogs pa kho nar 'gyur la /
translated: If things were real, then if one were to speak without the idea of seeing, etc., then one would speak without a basis, and that is impossible.

original: dngos po mi bden pa nyid yin yang gal te mthong ba la sogs pa'i 'du shes kyis gleng bar byed na gzhi dang bcas pa kho nas gleng pa la sogs par 'gyur ro zhes bstan pa yin no //
analyzed: dngos po mi bden pa nyid yin yang gal te mthong ba la sogs pa'i 'du shes kyis gleng bar byed na gzhi dang bcas pa kho nas gleng pa la sogs par 'gyur ro zhes bstan pa yin no //
translated: If things were unreal, then if one were to speak with the idea of seeing, etc., then one would speak with a basis, and that is impossible.

original: thos pa ni rnam pa gsum ste /
analyzed: thos pa ni rnam pa gsum ste /
translated: Hearing is of three kinds:

original: bya ba'i mtshan ma dang / gzhan phebs par smra ba dang / rang gi rjes su thos pa'o zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: bya ba'i mtshan ma dang / gzhan phebs par smra ba dang / rang gi rjes su thos pa'o zhes bya ba la /
translated: the sign of action, the speech of others, and hearing one’s own voice.

original: bya ba'i mtshan ma zhes bya ba smra ba gang dag gis 'jug par byed pa'i sgra de dag der bya ba de lhan cig byung ba'i rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni bya ba'i mtshan ma'o //
analyzed: bya ba'i mtshan ma zhes bya ba smra ba gang dag gis 'jug par byed pa'i sgra de dag der bya ba de lhan cig byung ba'i rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni bya ba'i mtshan ma'o //
translated: The sign of action is the sound that causes one to engage in action. That which is the nature of the simultaneous arising of that action is the sign of action.

original: gzhan dag gis @227a * //
analyzed: gzhan dag gis @227a * //
translated: The speech of others is the sound that causes one to engage in action.

original: byas par gyur pa la de'i don du gzhan phebs par smra ba la gzhan gyis smras pa nyid do //
analyzed: byas par gyur pa la de'i don du gzhan phebs par smra ba la gzhan gyis smras pa nyid do //
translated: One who is a speaker who is established by another for the purpose of that is one who is spoken of by another.

original: rang gi bdag nyid shes pa po nyid la gang zhig gzhan gyis thos su bcug pa de ni che ge mo zhig gis 'di lta bus byas so zhes gzhan dag logs shig na gtam zer ba rang gis logs shig nas rjes su thos pa gang yin pa'o //
analyzed: rang gi bdag nyid shes pa po nyid la gang zhig gzhan gyis thos su bcug pa de ni che ge mo zhig gis 'di lta bus byas so zhes gzhan dag logs shig na gtam zer ba rang gis logs shig nas rjes su thos pa gang yin pa'o //
translated: One who is a hearer who is established by another for the purpose of that is one who hears from another that “So and so did such and such.”

original: 'dir gzhung ni 'di la dge slong dag gis rnam pa gang dag dang / rtags gang dag dang mtshan ma gang dag gis pham par 'gyur ba'i mtha'i ltung ba 'byin pa'i rnam pa de dag dang rtags de dag dang mtshan ma de dag gis pham par 'gyur ba mtha'i ltung ba 'byin pa de thos pa dang /
analyzed: 'dir gzhung ni 'di la dge slong dag gis rnam pa gang dag dang / rtags gang dag dang mtshan ma gang dag gis pham par 'gyur ba'i mtha'i ltung ba 'byin pa'i rnam pa de dag dang rtags de dag dang mtshan ma de dag gis pham par 'gyur ba mtha'i ltung ba 'byin pa de thos pa dang /
translated: Here the text is: “Monks, if you hear that a monk has committed a downfall that is a fundamental transgression that is a ground for defeat by means of certain aspects, certain signs, and certain marks, and if you hear that he has committed a downfall that is a fundamental transgression that is a ground for defeat by means of those aspects, those signs, and those marks,

original: gtam de yang de las byung zhing de'i rang bzhin gyis nye bar gnas pa yin pa dang / de bzhin du des dge slong de pham par 'gyur ba'i mtha' ltung bar 'byung ngo zhes yid ches pa'i tshig las thos par gyur na gzhi des gnas pa de'am gzhan du de'i gso sbyong 'jog par byed na chos bzhin du gso sbyong 'jog pa yin no zhes gsungs🔽pa yin te /
analyzed: gtam de yang de las byung zhing de'i rang bzhin gyis nye bar gnas pa yin pa dang / de bzhin du des dge slong de pham par 'gyur ba'i mtha' ltung bar 'byung ngo zhes yid ches pa'i tshig las thos par gyur na gzhi des gnas pa de'am gzhan du de'i gso sbyong 'jog par byed na chos bzhin du gso sbyong 'jog pa yin no zhes gsungs pa yin te /
translated: If he posits the purification ceremony on that basis, he posits the purification ceremony in accordance with the Dharma.”🔽The meaning of this passage is summarized here in order.

original: der ji skad gsungs pa de dag go rims bzhin du 'dir bsdus pa yin no yid ma ches pa ni gzhi nyid ma yin no zhes bya ba ni thos kyang yid ma ches pa gang yin pa de ni gzhi ma yin par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: der ji skad gsungs pa de dag go rims bzhin du 'dir bsdus pa yin no yid ma ches pa ni gzhi nyid ma yin no zhes bya ba ni thos kyang yid ma ches pa gang yin pa de ni gzhi ma yin par rig par bya'o //
translated: “ If he does not trust it, it is not a basis” means that if he hears it but does not trust it, it should be understood that it is not a basis.

original: 'dir gzhung ni des yid ches pa'i tshig las thos pa ma yin no zhes gsungs pa yin no //
analyzed: 'dir gzhung ni des yid ches pa'i tshig las thos pa ma yin no zhes gsungs pa yin no //
translated: Here the text says, “He has not heard it from a trustworthy person.”

original: yongs su sbyong ba'i gzhi'o /
analyzed: yongs su sbyong ba'i gzhi'o /
translated: The basis of purification

original: // / shes pa du ma nyid yin na gleng ba la sogs pa la 'dod pas so zhes bya ba ni shes pa'i dge slong du ma nyid yin na de la gleng ba dang dran par bya ba dang skabs 'byed du gzhug pa la sogs pa de dag rgan
analyzed: // / shes pa du ma nyid yin na gleng ba la sogs pa la 'dod pas so zhes bya ba ni shes pa'i dge slong du ma nyid yin na de la gleng ba dang dran par bya ba dang skabs 'byed du gzhug pa la sogs pa de dag rgan
translated: If there are many cognitions of a monk, then in that case, speaking, reminding, and allowing an opportunity, etc. are not to be done in order of seniority.

original: rim gyis 'jug par bya ba ma nges kyis gleng bar bya ba 'dod pas ci dgar 'jug par bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: rim gyis 'jug par bya ba ma nges kyis gleng bar bya ba 'dod pas ci dgar 'jug par bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that one should engage as one wishes, by one who wishes to speak.

original: 'dir gzhung ni brdzun du smra ba'i ltung byed kyi zhu ba las //
analyzed: 'dir gzhung ni brdzun du smra ba'i ltung byed kyi zhu ba las //
translated: Here, the text is from the question on the downfall of lying:

original: btsun pa dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi dbus su bslab pa las 'da' bar bgyid na sus gleng bar bgyi /
analyzed: btsun pa dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi dbus su bslab pa las 'da' bar bgyid na sus gleng bar bgyi /
translated: “Venerable, if one transgresses the training in the midst of the Saṅgha of monks, by whom is one to be spoken to?”

original: gang 'dod pas so zhes bya ba gsungs pa yin no //
analyzed: gang 'dod pas so zhes bya ba gsungs pa yin no //
translated: “By one who wishes.”🔽“That should not be set aside as not a lifting of restrictions.”

original: dgag dbye ma yin par de gzhag par mi bya'o zhes bya ba ni dgag bya'o las kyi dus ma yin pa gzhan du dgag dbye de gzhag @227b par mi bya'o //
analyzed: dgag dbye ma yin par de gzhag par mi bya'o zhes bya ba ni dgag bya'o las kyi dus ma yin pa gzhan du dgag dbye de gzhag @227b par mi bya'o //
translated: That lifting of restrictions should not be set aside at another time that is not the time for the lifting of restrictions.

original: gso sbyong ma yin par de mi bya'o zhes bya ba ni gso sbyong gi las kyi dus ma yin par gzhan du gso sbyong de gzhag par mi bya'o //
analyzed: gso sbyong ma yin par de mi bya'o zhes bya ba ni gso sbyong gi las kyi dus ma yin par gzhan du gso sbyong de gzhag par mi bya'o //
translated: It is not to be postponed, except on the Upoṣadha day.🔽This means that the Upoṣadha ceremony is not to be postponed on another day, except on the Upoṣadha day.🔽If the one who postpones becomes a woman, the postponement is not valid.

original: 'jog par byed pa bud med nyid kyis gzhan skyes pa'i gzhag pa nyid byed dam byas pa nyid na gzhag pa nyid ma yin no zhes bya ba ni de dag 'jog par byed pa nyid dam gzhag par byas pa nyid kyi 'og tu gal te mtshan de bud🔽med du gyur pa nyid kyis 'jog par byed pa bud med yin la /
analyzed: 'jog par byed pa bud med nyid kyis gzhan skyes pa'i gzhag pa nyid byed dam byas pa nyid na gzhag pa nyid ma yin no zhes bya ba ni de dag 'jog par byed pa nyid dam gzhag par byas pa nyid kyi 'og tu gal te mtshan de bud med du gyur pa nyid kyis 'jog par byed pa bud med yin la /
translated: If the one who postpones becomes a woman, the postponement is not valid.🔽If the one who postpones becomes a man, the postponement is valid.🔽If the one who postpones becomes a man, the postponement is valid.

original: cig shos skyes pa yin par gyur na de la 'jog par byed pa gang yin ba de ni gzhag pa nyid ma yin te /🔽de lta na mi 'byung ba kho na yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //🔽skyes pas bud med kyi 'jog pa ni 'byung ba kho na yin no //
analyzed: cig shos skyes pa yin par gyur na de la 'jog par byed pa gang yin ba de ni gzhag pa nyid ma yin te / de lta na mi 'byung ba kho na yin no zhes bya ba'i don to // skyes pas bud med kyi 'jog pa ni 'byung ba kho na yin no //
translated: If the man postpones the postponement of a woman, it is valid.🔽If the man postpones the postponement of a woman, it is valid.🔽If the woman postpones the postponement of a man, it is not valid.

original: mi 'byung bas rjes su 'jug pa med do //
analyzed: mi 'byung bas rjes su 'jug pa med do //
translated: If the woman postpones the postponement of a man, it is not valid.

original: de lta bas na bud med kyis 'jog tu bcug na skyes pa nyid du gyur kyang gzhan pa nyid dgag dbye'i gzhi zhu ba las /
analyzed: de lta bas na bud med kyis 'jog tu bcug na skyes pa nyid du gyur kyang gzhan pa nyid dgag dbye'i gzhi zhu ba las /
translated: Therefore, if a woman is made to be a man, even if she is a man, she should be made to request the basis of the poṣadha ceremony.

original: btsun par zhig dge slong gis dge slong gi dgag dbye 'jog par bgyid cing gang gis bgyi ba de mtshan gyur te dge slong mar gyur na gzhag par bgyi'am /
analyzed: btsun par zhig dge slong gis dge slong gi dgag dbye 'jog par bgyid cing gang gis bgyi ba de mtshan gyur te dge slong mar gyur na gzhag par bgyi'am /
translated: “Reverend, if a monk is making a monk’s poṣadha ceremony, and the one who is making it changes sex and becomes a nun, should it be made?

original: nye ba 'khor gzhag par brjod par bya'o //🔽'jog par bgyi ba gang lags pa de mtshan gyur te /
analyzed: nye ba 'khor gzhag par brjod par bya'o // 'jog par bgyi ba gang lags pa de mtshan gyur te /
translated: “Upāli, it should be made.”

original: dge slong mar gyur na gzhag par brjod par bgyi'am /
analyzed: dge slong mar gyur na gzhag par brjod par bgyi'am /
translated: “If the one who is making it changes sex and becomes a monk, should it be made?”

original: nye ba 'khor gzhag par brjod par mi bya'o //
analyzed: nye ba 'khor gzhag par brjod par mi bya'o //
translated: “Upāli, it should not be made.”

original: btsun pa re zhig dge slong mas dge slong ma'i dgag dbye 'jog par bgyid cing gang gis 'jog par bgyid pa de mtshan gyur te dge slong du gyur na gzhag par brjod par bgyi'am /
analyzed: btsun pa re zhig dge slong mas dge slong ma'i dgag dbye 'jog par bgyid cing gang gis 'jog par bgyid pa de mtshan gyur te dge slong du gyur na gzhag par brjod par bgyi'am /
translated: “Reverend, if a nun is making a nun’s poṣadha ceremony, and the one who is making it changes sex and becomes a monk, should it be made?”

original: nye ba 'khor gzhag par brjod par mi bya'o //
analyzed: nye ba 'khor gzhag par brjod par mi bya'o //
translated: “Upāli, it should not be made.”

original: 'jog par bgyid pa gang lags pa de mtshan gyur te dge slong du gyur na gzhag par brjod par bgyi'am /
analyzed: 'jog par bgyid pa gang lags pa de mtshan gyur te dge slong du gyur na gzhag par brjod par bgyi'am /
translated: If one who is to be established as a monk changes sex and becomes a nun, should he be called a nun?

original: nye ba 'khor gzhag par brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: nye ba 'khor gzhag par brjod par bya'o //
translated: Upagupta, he should be called a nun.

original: de bzhin du dge slong dang dge slong mas dgag dbye byed pa la yang brjod par bya'o zhes gsungs pa yin no //
analyzed: de bzhin du dge slong dang dge slong mas dgag dbye byed pa la yang brjod par bya'o zhes gsungs pa yin no //
translated: The same should be said of a monk or nun who is to be suspended.🔽Nor is it by one who is degenerate by nature,

original: rang bzhin du nyams pas kyang ma yin no zhes bya ba smyon pa la sogs pas gzhag pa nyid kyang gzhag pa nyid ma yin no //
analyzed: rang bzhin du nyams pas kyang ma yin no zhes bya ba smyon pa la sogs pas gzhag pa nyid kyang gzhag pa nyid ma yin no //
translated: that is, by one who is insane, etc.

original: tshul khrims med pa dang gcig pa nyid ma yin pas kyang ma yin no zhes bya ba ni nyams pa'am rnam pa thams cad du gang @228a * //
analyzed: tshul khrims med pa dang gcig pa nyid ma yin pas kyang ma yin no zhes bya ba ni nyams pa'am rnam pa thams cad du gang @228a * //
translated: Nor is it by one who is not a monk,

original: la tshul khrims med pa de ni tshul khrims med pa'o //
analyzed: la tshul khrims med pa de ni tshul khrims med pa'o //
translated: that is, by one who has not received full ordination.🔽Nor is it by one who is not a monk in common with the other,

original: chos dang chos ma yin pa'i phyogs su gyur pa phan tshun blo gcig pa nyid ma yin pa de gnyis kyis gzhag pa nyid kyang gzhag pa nyid ma yin no //
analyzed: chos dang chos ma yin pa'i phyogs su gyur pa phan tshun blo gcig pa nyid ma yin pa de gnyis kyis gzhag pa nyid kyang gzhag pa nyid ma yin no //
translated: that is, by one who is not of the same mind as the other with regard to the side of Dharma and Adharma.

original: gcig pa nyid ma yin pa'i gzhung ni dgag dbye'i zhu ba las /
analyzed: gcig pa nyid ma yin pa'i gzhung ni dgag dbye'i zhu ba las /
translated: The scripture on not being the same is the request for the end of the rainy season retreat:

original: btsun pa re zhig khas blangs pa dag gis khas ma blangs pa dag gi dgag dbye 'jog par bgyid na gzhag par brjod par bgyi'am /
analyzed: btsun pa re zhig khas blangs pa dag gis khas ma blangs pa dag gi dgag dbye 'jog par bgyid na gzhag par brjod par bgyi'am /
translated: Bhagavan, if those who have taken vows set the end of the rainy season retreat for those who have not taken vows, should it be said that it is set?

original: nye ba 'khor gzhag par brjod par mi bya'o //
analyzed: nye ba 'khor gzhag par brjod par mi bya'o //
translated: Upali, it should not be said that it is set.

original: btsun ba re zhig khas ma blangs pa dag gis khas blangs pa dag gi dgag dbye 'jog par bgyid na gzhag par brjod par bgyi 'am /
analyzed: btsun ba re zhig khas ma blangs pa dag gis khas blangs pa dag gi dgag dbye 'jog par bgyid na gzhag par brjod par bgyi 'am /
translated: Bhagavan, if those who have not taken vows set the end of the rainy season retreat for those who have taken vows, should it be said that it is set?

original: nye ba 'khor gzhag par brjod par mi bya'o zhes gsungs pa yin no //
analyzed: nye ba 'khor gzhag par brjod par mi bya'o zhes gsungs pa yin no //
translated: Upali, it should not be said that it is set.

original: de gnyis kyis yang ma yin no zhes bya ba ni rang bzhin nyams pa smyon pa la sogs pa zhes bya ba de dang tshul khrims med pa dang gcig pa nyid ma yin pas gzhag pa nyid kyang gzhag pa nyid ma yin no //
analyzed: de gnyis kyis yang ma yin no zhes bya ba ni rang bzhin nyams pa smyon pa la sogs pa zhes bya ba de dang tshul khrims med pa dang gcig pa nyid ma yin pas gzhag pa nyid kyang gzhag pa nyid ma yin no //
translated: Those two are not said to be the same because those who have impaired natures, such as lunatics, and those who have no ethical discipline are not the same. Therefore, that which is set by those who have impaired natures is not set.

original: yang ci'i phyir gso sbyong gzhag pa'i gzhi 'di'i ming yongs su sbyang ba'i gzhi zhes gzhan du byas she na /
analyzed: yang ci'i phyir gso sbyong gzhag pa'i gzhi 'di'i ming yongs su sbyang ba'i gzhi zhes gzhan du byas she na /
translated: Why is the name of this basis for positing purification and restoration given differently as the basis for purification?

original: gzhi 'dis gdangs ngag gzhag pa dang phur la sogs pas las kyis spyad bar bya ba thams cad pa sdus pa yin gyi /
analyzed: gzhi 'dis gdangs ngag gzhag pa dang phur la sogs pas las kyis spyad bar bya ba thams cad pa sdus pa yin gyi /
translated: This basis includes all that is to be done by the Saṅgha, such as positing purification and restoration, and all that is to be done by the Saṅgha, such as the rites of beating the wooden gong and so on.

original: gso sbyong gzhag pa 'ba' zhig tu ma zad pas zhes bya ba 'di sgrub pas de shes par bya'o //
analyzed: gso sbyong gzhag pa 'ba' zhig tu ma zad pas zhes bya ba 'di sgrub pas de shes par bya'o //
translated: This is not just limited to positing purification and restoration. This should be understood through the proof.

original: rnam pa thams cad du ming du ming du gzhan du byas pa ni bzhi po la yang yongs su sbyang ba'i gzhi zhes bya ba de bar gtogs pa'i don du'o //
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad du ming du ming du gzhan du byas pa ni bzhi po la yang yongs su sbyang ba'i gzhi zhes bya ba de bar gtogs pa'i don du'o //
translated: In all cases, the name is given differently, and the four are included in the meaning of the basis for purification.

original: yongs su sbyang ba'i gzhi zhu ba'i skabs so //
analyzed: yongs su sbyang ba'i gzhi zhu ba'i skabs so //
translated: This concludes the section on the basis for purification.

original: yongs su sbyang ba'i gzhi rdzogs so /
analyzed: yongs su sbyang ba'i gzhi rdzogs so /
translated: The basis for purification is complete.

original: // / dge 'dun tha dad pa nyid du nus pa la mi 'dod par gleng ba dang / gleng bar byed pa na log par mi bya'o //
analyzed: // / dge 'dun tha dad pa nyid du nus pa la mi 'dod par gleng ba dang / gleng bar byed pa na log par mi bya'o //
translated: One should not falsely claim that the Saṅgha is unable to be of one mind, either when it is not so or when it is so.

original: 'da' bar bya ba gang na mi mthun pa yod pa de dang lhan cig tu 'khod par mi bya'o zhes bya ba ni gnas gang du 'da' bar byed pa ni 'da' bar byed pa'o //
analyzed: 'da' bar bya ba gang na mi mthun pa yod pa de dang lhan cig tu 'khod par mi bya'o zhes bya ba ni gnas gang du 'da' bar byed pa ni 'da' bar byed pa'o //
translated: One should not sit together with someone who is not in harmony with one who is passing by.

original: 'thab krol gyi skabs bcad pa'i phyir 'di bca' ba mdzad do //
analyzed: 'thab krol gyi skabs bcad pa'i phyir 'di bca' ba mdzad do //
translated: This rule is made in order to cut off the opportunity for quarrels.

original: gzhan du na go gnyis sam gsum gyi bar du bcad de'o zhes bya ba yang gnas gang na gang zag mi mthun pa yod pa de dang @228b lhan cig tu 'da' bar byed pa las gzhan la go gnyis sam gsum gyi bar du bcad de stan la 'khod
analyzed: gzhan du na go gnyis sam gsum gyi bar du bcad de'o zhes bya ba yang gnas gang na gang zag mi mthun pa yod pa de dang @228b lhan cig tu 'da' bar byed pa las gzhan la go gnyis sam gsum gyi bar du bcad de stan la 'khod
translated: Otherwise, one should sit down on a seat after cutting off the opportunity for two or three moments, even if there is someone who is not in harmony with one who is passing by in a certain place.

original: par bya'o // 'di ni lus kyis pha rol gnon pa dang de dang de reg pa spang ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: par bya'o // 'di ni lus kyis pha rol gnon pa dang de dang de reg pa spang ba'i phyir ro //
translated: This is in order to overcome the body and to avoid touching that person.

original: 'da' bar bya ba la yang langs nas de la pha rol gnon pa'i phyir sbyor ba zhes bya ba der de mi gnang ba'o //
analyzed: 'da' bar bya ba la yang langs nas de la pha rol gnon pa'i phyir sbyor ba zhes bya ba der de mi gnang ba'o //
translated: Even when passing by, one should stand up and not sit down on the seat after cutting off the opportunity for two or three moments, in order to overcome the other.

original: des cig shos dang yang de bzhin no zhes bya ba yang 'dir gang zhig gang la zhes bya ba'i yul nyid kyis smos pa des kyang de dang lhan cig tu 'khod par mi bya ba dang de ni de lta nyid du bsdus pa ste /
analyzed: des cig shos dang yang de bzhin no zhes bya ba yang 'dir gang zhig gang la zhes bya ba'i yul nyid kyis smos pa des kyang de dang lhan cig tu 'khod par mi bya ba dang de ni de lta nyid du bsdus pa ste /
translated: Here, the phrase “one should not live together with him” is stated by the word “object” in “one should not live together with him.”

original: gnyis sam gsum gyis bcad de 'khod par bya'o //
analyzed: gnyis sam gsum gyis bcad de 'khod par bya'o //
translated: One should live by cutting off two or three.

original: 'di ni lus kyi las de mi mthun pa des kyang 'grogs bshes nyid ma yin pa de lta na yang ltung ba spang ba'i phyir /
analyzed: 'di ni lus kyi las de mi mthun pa des kyang 'grogs bshes nyid ma yin pa de lta na yang ltung ba spang ba'i phyir /
translated: This is the physical action. Even though one is not friendly with that person due to that disagreement, in order to abandon the downfall,🔽one should give and take the vihāras of those two, which are separated by the vihara of the other.

original: de gnyis kyi gtsug lag khang bar du chod pa sbyin par bya ba nyid dang mnod pa bya ba nyid do zhes bya ba ni mi mthun pa dang / cig shos de gnyis kyi gtsug lag khang zhes bya ba gnas pa'i gzhi g-yogs pa'am /
analyzed: de gnyis kyi gtsug lag khang bar du chod pa sbyin par bya ba nyid dang mnod pa bya ba nyid do zhes bya ba ni mi mthun pa dang / cig shos de gnyis kyi gtsug lag khang zhes bya ba gnas pa'i gzhi g-yogs pa'am /
translated: The vihāras of those two are the bases of dwelling, the coverings, or the dwellings.

original: ma g-yogs pa bsgrub par bya ba'i don du gnas khang gis bar du chod pa gnas khang bsko bas kyang sbyin bar bya ba nyid yin la rang gis kyang mnod par bya ba nyid yin no //
analyzed: ma g-yogs pa bsgrub par bya ba'i don du gnas khang gis bar du chod pa gnas khang bsko bas kyang sbyin bar bya ba nyid yin la rang gis kyang mnod par bya ba nyid yin no //
translated: It is to be given to the one who is to be provided with a shelter, and it is to be accepted by him, even if the shelter is surrounded by walls.

original: 'dir sbyin pa po dang mnod pa phos kyang gzhan du byed na nyes byas su 'gyur te /
analyzed: 'dir sbyin pa po dang mnod pa phos kyang gzhan du byed na nyes byas su 'gyur te /
translated: Here, if the donor and the one who accepts it are different, there is an offense of wrong conduct.

original: de lta bas na ltung ba dang ldan par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: de lta bas na ltung ba dang ldan par rig par bya'o //
translated: Therefore, it should be understood as a downfall.

original: dge 'dun thams cad kyis gros byas sam las su stsal te der gnas khang sbyin par byed na yang thams cad nyes byas su rig par bya'o //
analyzed: dge 'dun thams cad kyis gros byas sam las su stsal te der gnas khang sbyin par byed na yang thams cad nyes byas su rig par bya'o //
translated: If the entire Saṅgha makes a decision and performs a legal procedure to give a shelter there, then all should be understood to have an offense of wrong conduct.

original: 'dir gnas kyi gzhi g-yogs pa ni gtsug lag khang ngo //
analyzed: 'dir gnas kyi gzhi g-yogs pa ni gtsug lag khang ngo //
translated: Here, the basis for the offense of “shelter” is a temple.

original: chos dang 'dul ba la gal te de dang ldan par shes nas chos ma yin pa la mngon par zhen pa la dge 'dun mthun pa med do zhes bya ba la chos dang zhes bya ba ni dngos por gtogs pa dang spyod par gtogs pa'i cho ga'o //
analyzed: chos dang 'dul ba la gal te de dang ldan par shes nas chos ma yin pa la mngon par zhen pa la dge 'dun mthun pa med do zhes bya ba la chos dang zhes bya ba ni dngos por gtogs pa dang spyod par gtogs pa'i cho ga'o //
translated: What is called Dharma is the ritual belonging to the category of things and the category of conduct.

original: 'dul ba zhes bya ba ni bya ba dang bya ba ma yin pa dag la byas pa dang ma byas pa nyid do //
analyzed: 'dul ba zhes bya ba ni bya ba dang bya ba ma yin pa dag la byas pa dang ma byas pa nyid do //
translated: What is called Vinaya is the done and the not done in regard to what is to be done and what is not to be done.

original: de dang ldan par zhes bya ba ni de ltar chos dang 'dul ba'i rnam pa la mi mthun pa nyid dang ldan pa'o //
analyzed: de dang ldan par zhes bya ba ni de ltar chos dang 'dul ba'i rnam pa la mi mthun pa nyid dang ldan pa'o //
translated: Endowed with that means endowed with that kind of discordance in regard to the aspects of Dharma and Vinaya.

original: gal te shes nas chos ma yin pa la zhes bya ba ni /🔽chos ma yin pa la mngon par byed pa de la dge 'dun @229a * //🔽mthun pa med do //
analyzed: gal te shes nas chos ma yin pa la zhes bya ba ni / chos ma yin pa la mngon par byed pa de la dge 'dun @229a * // mthun pa med do //
translated: If one knows, then in regard to the attachment to what is not Dharma means🔽in regard to the attachment to what is not Dharma, there is no Saṅgha concordance.

original: gang gi phyir chos dang 'dul ba'i phyir dge 'dun mi mthun pa yin gyi /
analyzed: gang gi phyir chos dang 'dul ba'i phyir dge 'dun mi mthun pa yin gyi /
translated: Because of Dharma and Vinaya, there is no Saṅgha discordance.

original: don gzhan gyi phyir ni ma yin pas de'i phyir mi mthun pa la ni dge 'dun mi mthun pa byed par mi rigs so //🔽de'i phyir de las gzhan pa dag dang tshogs te las byas na yang mi 'chags la phan tshun mi mthun pa nyid du yang mi 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni gang gi phyir dge 'dun mthun pa med pa de'i phyir chos ma yin pa la mngon par zhen
analyzed: don gzhan gyi phyir ni ma yin pas de'i phyir mi mthun pa la ni dge 'dun mi mthun pa byed par mi rigs so // de'i phyir de las gzhan pa dag dang tshogs te las byas na yang mi 'chags la phan tshun mi mthun pa nyid du yang mi 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni gang gi phyir dge 'dun mthun pa med pa de'i phyir chos ma yin pa la mngon par zhen
translated: But not for another purpose. Therefore, it is not right to create a schism in the Saṅgha that is harmonious.🔽Therefore, even if one performs an action in a group with others, it is not confessed and they do not become mutually discordant. This is because there is no harmonious Saṅgha. Therefore, those who adhere to what is contrary to the Dharma

original: pa de dag dang de las gzhan pa chos kyi phyogs dang mthun pa gzhan dag la yang bsdus te byas pa la las byas na yang mi 'chags pa dang phan tshun mi mthun pa'i dngos por mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: pa de dag dang de las gzhan pa chos kyi phyogs dang mthun pa gzhan dag la yang bsdus te byas pa la las byas na yang mi 'chags pa dang phan tshun mi mthun pa'i dngos por mi 'gyur ro //
translated: and those who are on the side of the Dharma, even if they perform an action in a group, it is not confessed and they do not become mutually discordant.

original: de dag de'i mi mthun pa'i phyogs dang 'thab par gyur pa nyid na chos 'di pa dag gis phyag mi bya ba nyid yin no zhes bya ba la de dag ces bya ba ni chos ma yin pa la mngon par zhen pa de rnams la de'i mi mthun
analyzed: de dag de'i mi mthun pa'i phyogs dang 'thab par gyur pa nyid na chos 'di pa dag gis phyag mi bya ba nyid yin no zhes bya ba la de dag ces bya ba ni chos ma yin pa la mngon par zhen pa de rnams la de'i mi mthun
translated: When they fight with those who are adverse to them, they should not be bowed to by those who are Dharma practitioners.

original: pa'i phyogs chos dang mthun pa'i phyogs su gtogs pa dang lhan cig 'thab par 'gyur ba nyid na de dag la chos 'di pa dge slong dang dge slong ma dang dge tshul dang dge tshul ma dang dge slob ma dang dge bsnyen dang dge bsnyen ma rnams kyis
analyzed: pa'i phyogs chos dang mthun pa'i phyogs su gtogs pa dang lhan cig 'thab par 'gyur ba nyid na de dag la chos 'di pa dge slong dang dge slong ma dang dge tshul dang dge tshul ma dang dge slob ma dang dge bsnyen dang dge bsnyen ma rnams kyis
translated: Those who are adverse to them are those who adhere to what is not Dharma. When they fight with those who are adverse to them, who belong to the side that is adverse to Dharma, then those who are Dharma practitioners, monks, nuns, male and female novices, female probationers, laymen and laywomen,

original: phyag mi bya ba nyid yin no //
analyzed: phyag mi bya ba nyid yin no //
translated: should not bow down to them.

original: mngon du ldang ba dang stan la bod pa dang / gtam 'dre ba dang / phebs par smra ba dang / kun dga' bar 'gyur ba dang rnam par lta ba dang cung zad lta ba dag kyang mi bya'o //
analyzed: mngon du ldang ba dang stan la bod pa dang / gtam 'dre ba dang / phebs par smra ba dang / kun dga' bar 'gyur ba dang rnam par lta ba dang cung zad lta ba dag kyang mi bya'o //
translated: They should not rise up for them, offer them a seat, converse with them, speak pleasantly to them, be delighted by them, look at them, or look at them a little.

original: lag pa'i tha snyad kyis gnas mal ngan pa rjes su sbyin no //🔽kha cig las ni tshig gis thos pa dang bcas par gzhan la'o zhes bya ba ni gzhung kha cig las ni chos ma yin pa la mngon par zhen pa de dag 'ongs na tshig gis ci nas kyang de dag gis thos pa dang bcas par gang zag gzhan
analyzed: lag pa'i tha snyad kyis gnas mal ngan pa rjes su sbyin no // kha cig las ni tshig gis thos pa dang bcas par gzhan la'o zhes bya ba ni gzhung kha cig las ni chos ma yin pa la mngon par zhen pa de dag 'ongs na tshig gis ci nas kyang de dag gis thos pa dang bcas par gang zag gzhan
translated: The term “bed” refers to a poor bed.🔽Some texts say: “When they come, one should give them a poor bed by means of words, so that they hear.”

original: la brten te de dag 'di tsam thob po zhes bya ba'i tshig gis gnas mal ngan pa rjes su sbyin par bya'o zhes 'byung ngo //
analyzed: la brten te de dag 'di tsam thob po zhes bya ba'i tshig gis gnas mal ngan pa rjes su sbyin par bya'o zhes 'byung ngo //
translated: Some texts say: “When those who are attached to non-Dharma come, one should give them a poor bed by means of words, so that they hear, and by means of another person, so that they hear.”🔽The term “bed” refers to a poor bed.

original: gtsug lag khang mjug tu'o zhes bya ba ni sbyin no zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
analyzed: gtsug lag khang mjug tu'o zhes bya ba ni sbyin no zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
translated: “At the end of the temple” means “one should give.”

original: kho bo cag rgan no zhes zer na khyed cag kyang bdag cag sh'akya'i sras kyi dge slong dag yin no snyam du bdag nyid khas 'che 'am /
analyzed: kho bo cag rgan no zhes zer na khyed cag kyang bdag cag sh'akya'i sras kyi dge slong dag yin no snyam du bdag nyid khas 'che 'am /
translated: If they say, “We are older,” you should say, “You are also monks who are sons of the Śākya.”

original: khyed cag gang @229b dag gi spyod tshul 'di lta bu dang gtam 'di lta bu 'di yang mi thob pa yin na /
analyzed: khyed cag gang @229b dag gi spyod tshul 'di lta bu dang gtam 'di lta bu 'di yang mi thob pa yin na /
translated: You should reply to them, If you do not even have this kind of conduct and this kind of talk,

original: khyed kyi ston pa thugs rje dang ldan pa des na 'di rjes su gang ngo zhes gzhan la lan gdab par bya'o zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: khyed kyi ston pa thugs rje dang ldan pa des na 'di rjes su gang ngo zhes gzhan la lan gdab par bya'o zhes bya ba ni /
translated: how much less could you have the compassionate teacher who is the leader of those who have compassion!

original: de dag la dngos su lan mi gdab par gang zag gzhan la brten te lan 'di skad gdab par bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: de dag la dngos su lan mi gdab par gang zag gzhan la brten te lan 'di skad gdab par bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that you should not reply directly to them, but rather you should reply to them by means of another person, saying, You should say this.

original: spyod tshul 'di lta bu zhes bya ba ni gang zhig de rnams kyis spyad pa'i spyod pa la sogs pa de dag brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: spyod tshul 'di lta bu zhes bya ba ni gang zhig de rnams kyis spyad pa'i spyod pa la sogs pa de dag brjod par bya'o //
translated: This kind of conduct refers to the conduct, etc. that they practice.

original: gtam 'di lta bu la zhes bya ba ni gang zhig spyod tshul de la nyes dmigs gang byung ba ste /
analyzed: gtam 'di lta bu la zhes bya ba ni gang zhig spyod tshul de la nyes dmigs gang byung ba ste /
translated: This kind of talk refers to the disadvantages that arise from that conduct.

original: ston pa gcud du gshegs pa la sogs pa gang yin pa de dag brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: ston pa gcud du gshegs pa la sogs pa gang yin pa de dag brjod par bya'o //
translated: You should say that those disadvantages are the teacher's compassion, etc.

original: dge slong ma la stan las ldang ba dir bar mi bya'o zhes bya ba ni 'thab krol byed pa rnams la'o //
analyzed: dge slong ma la stan las ldang ba dir bar mi bya'o zhes bya ba ni 'thab krol byed pa rnams la'o //
translated: One should not rise from one's seat for a nun, this is for those who are quarrelsome.

original: dge bsnyen gyis bsod snyoms dbul bar bya'o //
analyzed: dge bsnyen gyis bsod snyoms dbul bar bya'o //
translated: The lay devotee should offer alms.

original: bzod par byas pa de dag la mthun pa thob pa med par mthun pa mi 'byung ngo zhes bya ba la de dag la zhes bya ba ni chos ma yin pa la mngon par zhen pa de dag la'o //
analyzed: bzod par byas pa de dag la mthun pa thob pa med par mthun pa mi 'byung ngo zhes bya ba la de dag la zhes bya ba ni chos ma yin pa la mngon par zhen pa de dag la'o //
translated: Those who have been reconciled do not obtain concord without the concord rite, in this regard, those refers to those who are attached to what is contrary to the Dharma.

original: bzod par byas pa rnams la yang bzod pa byas su zin kyang mthun pa sbyin pa thob pa med par mthun pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: bzod par byas pa rnams la yang bzod pa byas su zin kyang mthun pa sbyin pa thob pa med par mthun pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro //
translated: Even though they have been reconciled, concord does not arise without obtaining the concord rite.

original: gso sbyong med par rang bzhin du gnas pa nyid mi thob bo zhes bya ba ni mthun pa thob tu zin kyang ji srid du dge 'dun las mthun pa'i gso sbyong ma gsol zhing mthun pa'i gso sbyong ma thob kyi bar du rang bzhin du gnas pa nyid🔽mi 'thob ste /
analyzed: gso sbyong med par rang bzhin du gnas pa nyid mi thob bo zhes bya ba ni mthun pa thob tu zin kyang ji srid du dge 'dun las mthun pa'i gso sbyong ma gsol zhing mthun pa'i gso sbyong ma thob kyi bar du rang bzhin du gnas pa nyid🔽mi 'thob ste /
translated: Without the purification and restoration, one does not obtain the natural state, even though one has obtained concord, as long as one has not requested the concord purification and restoration from the Saṅgha and has not obtained the concord purification and restoration, one does not obtain the natural state.

original: chos dang zang zing gi longs spyod gnyis kyi 'os nyid ma yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: chos dang zang zing gi longs spyod gnyis kyi 'os nyid ma yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that they are not suitable for either the enjoyment of the Dharma or material things.

original: mthun pa'i gso sbyong zhes bya ba'i don dang mthun pa yin te /
analyzed: mthun pa'i gso sbyong zhes bya ba'i don dang mthun pa yin te /
translated: The meaning of suitable purification is as follows:

original: gso sbyong zhes bya ba'i don ni gang zhig 'di la 'thab krol la mngon par spyod pa nyid kyi phyir des par spyod pa la mngon par gnas pa spang bar bya ba nyid do //
analyzed: gso sbyong zhes bya ba'i don ni gang zhig 'di la 'thab krol la mngon par spyod pa nyid kyi phyir des par spyod pa la mngon par gnas pa spang bar bya ba nyid do //
translated: The meaning of purification is that which is to be abandoned by one who abides in the practice of purification, because of engaging in quarrels.

original: tha dad pa'i dngos po la yang tha dad pa'i blo la mngon par zhen par gnas pas rang bzhin du mi gnas pa nyid do //
analyzed: tha dad pa'i dngos po la yang tha dad pa'i blo la mngon par zhen par gnas pas rang bzhin du mi gnas pa nyid do //
translated: Even in different things, one abides in the attachment to the idea of difference, so one does not abide in the nature.

original: de lta bas na mthun pa rnyed pa dang mthun pa'i gso sbyong dag med par yang mi bya ba nyid la /
analyzed: de lta bas na mthun pa rnyed pa dang mthun pa'i gso sbyong dag med par yang mi bya ba nyid la /
translated: Therefore, even without finding agreement and suitable purification, one should not do it.

original: rang bzhin du gnas pa dag dang de mi 'grub pas de'i phyir de brten pa'o //

original: yid gnyis ni 'du shes pa dang 'dra bar de'i phyir 'di la yid gnyis za ba na yang de mtshams med par 'gyur bar rig par bya'o ;
analyzed: yid gnyis ni 'du shes pa dang 'dra bar de'i phyir 'di la yid gnyis za ba na yang de mtshams med par 'gyur bar rig par bya'o ;

original: /'khor lo bye ba'i gzhi'o /
analyzed: /'khor lo bye ba'i gzhi'o /

original: // / rtsod pa ni rnam pa bzhi ste /

analyzed: tshig gi phyir sems gzhol ba gang yin pa de ni 'dir 'khrug long zhes bya'i khro ba ni ma yin no //

analyzed: 'dir tshig ces bya ba ni dgra bos mi mthun par smra ba yin par dgongs kyi tshig tsam ni ma yin te /
translated: Here, words means the disagreeable speech of an enemy, not just any words.

original: de'i phyir de la @233b 'khrug long nyid du nye bar gdags so //
analyzed: de'i phyir de la @233b 'khrug long nyid du nye bar gdags so //
translated: Therefore, contention is imputed in that context.

original: gtsug lag las de la brten te 'thab pa dang mtshang 'dru ba dang rtsod pa dang 'gyed pa gang yin pa de 'gyed pa'i phyir rtsod pa zhes gsungs te /

analyzed: 'khrug long ni 'di'i 'khor du gyur pa yin pa'i phyir ro //

translated: They are appointed by the Saṅgha for good.

original: gzu bo de dag dge 'dun gnas der gtan tu dge 'dun thams cad kyis bsko ba ni rtsod pa byung ba rnams rnam par zhi bar bya ba'i phyir yin gyi /
analyzed: gzu bo de dag dge 'dun gnas der gtan tu dge 'dun thams cad kyis bsko ba ni rtsod pa byung ba rnams rnam par zhi bar bya ba'i phyir yin gyi /
translated: They are appointed by the Saṅgha for good, because they are appointed by the entire Saṅgha in that place where the dispute has arisen, in order to pacify the dispute.

original: rtsod pa gcig gi phyir 'phral la bsko ba'i phyir ni ma yin zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: rtsod pa gcig gi phyir 'phral la bsko ba'i phyir ni ma yin zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: They are not appointed for a single dispute, in order to settle it.

original: 'dir 'thab mo mi skyed par bsko bar bya ba nyid do zhes bya ba ni gzu bo bsko ba 'dir gang zhig 'di lta bu bsko bar bya ba nyid yin no //
analyzed: 'dir 'thab mo mi skyed par bsko bar bya ba nyid do zhes bya ba ni gzu bo bsko ba 'dir gang zhig 'di lta bu bsko bar bya ba nyid yin no //
translated: Here, they are appointed without causing a dispute. This is the appointment of the impartial.

original: ngo tsha shes shing bslab pa 'dod pa'o zhes bya ba ni 'dir ngo tsha shes pa zhes bya ba bslab pa'i gzhi yang dag par blangs pa thams cad la bag rkyong ba zhum par byed pa yin gyi phan par 'gyur ba tsam nyi tsher ma zad do //
analyzed: ngo tsha shes shing bslab pa 'dod pa'o zhes bya ba ni 'dir ngo tsha shes pa zhes bya ba bslab pa'i gzhi yang dag par blangs pa thams cad la bag rkyong ba zhum par byed pa yin gyi phan par 'gyur ba tsam nyi tsher ma zad do //
translated: Shame is the embarrassment of transgressing the precepts.

original: ma mo las 'di skad gsungs te /
analyzed: ma mo las 'di skad gsungs te /
translated: The mother scripture declares:

original: de dge slong chos nyi shu rtsa gnyis dang ldan pa btsal bar bya ste /
analyzed: de dge slong chos nyi shu rtsa gnyis dang ldan pa btsal bar bya ste /
translated: “You should seek a monk who has twenty-two qualities.🔽What are the twenty-two?

original: nyi shu rtsa gnyis gang zhe na ci tshe dang ldan pa de la tshul khrims dang ldan zhing dang po nas phun sum tshogs pa dang ngo tsha shes shing 'gyod pa dang ldan la sdom pa dang bslab pa 'dod pa dang / @235a * //
analyzed: nyi shu rtsa gnyis gang zhe na ci tshe dang ldan pa de la tshul khrims dang ldan zhing dang po nas phun sum tshogs pa dang ngo tsha shes shing 'gyod pa dang ldan la sdom pa dang bslab pa 'dod pa dang / @235a * //
translated: Venerable, does he have morality? Is he endowed with the perfection of morality from the beginning? Is he ashamed of transgressing the precepts? Does he have regret? Does he desire vows and training?

original: 'dul ba la shin tu rnam par nges shing thos pa 'dzin la thos pa bsags pa dang / lung thon pa dang / rtsod pa la mkhas pa dang / rtsod pa kun nas slong ba la mkhas pa dang / rtsod pa'i bye brag la mkhas pa dang /🔽rtsod pa 'gog pa la mkhas pa dang / rtsod pa 'gags nas phyis mi 'byung ba la mkhas pa dang / bstan bcos la mkhas pa dang / gzhi lhag par spyod pa la mkhas shing nyes rtsom med par smra ba dang / nyes rtsom byed du mi 'dug pa dang /
analyzed: 'dul ba la shin tu rnam par nges shing thos pa 'dzin la thos pa bsags pa dang / lung thon pa dang / rtsod pa la mkhas pa dang / rtsod pa kun nas slong ba la mkhas pa dang / rtsod pa'i bye brag la mkhas pa dang / rtsod pa 'gog pa la mkhas pa dang / rtsod pa 'gags nas phyis mi 'byung ba la mkhas pa dang / bstan bcos la mkhas pa dang / gzhi lhag par spyod pa la mkhas shing nyes rtsom med par smra ba dang / nyes rtsom byed du mi 'dug pa dang /
translated: They are very certain about the Vinaya, they retain what they have heard, they have accumulated learning, they are learned in the scriptures, they are skilled in debate, they are skilled in initiating debates, they are skilled in the categories of debate,🔽they are skilled in ending debates, they are skilled in preventing debates from arising again after they have been ended, they are skilled in the treatises, they are skilled in the special bases, they speak without committing faults, they do not commit faults,

original: lus dang ngag gis mi 'jug pa dang / smra bar byed cing smra ba brda phrad par byed pa dang / go bar byed cing go ba brda phrad par byed pa dang / rnam par rig par byed cing rnam par rig par bya ba brda phrad par byed pa dang /
analyzed: lus dang ngag gis mi 'jug pa dang / smra bar byed cing smra ba brda phrad par byed pa dang / go bar byed cing go ba brda phrad par byed pa dang / rnam par rig par byed cing rnam par rig par bya ba brda phrad par byed pa dang /
translated: they do not engage in body and speech, they speak and communicate, they understand and communicate understanding, they are aware and communicate awareness,

original: nges par rtogs par byed cing nges par brtags pa brda phrad par byed pa dang / 'dun pas 'gro ba ma yin pa dang / zhe sdang gis 'gro ba ma yin pa dang / gti mug gis 'gro ba ma yin pa dang / 'jigs pas 'gro ba ma yin pa ste /🔽gzu bo'i chos nyid nyi shu rtsa gnyis po de dag dang ldan pa'i chos kyi longs spyod dam /
analyzed: nges par rtogs par byed cing nges par brtags pa brda phrad par byed pa dang / 'dun pas 'gro ba ma yin pa dang / zhe sdang gis 'gro ba ma yin pa dang / gti mug gis 'gro ba ma yin pa dang / 'jigs pas 'gro ba ma yin pa ste / gzu bo'i chos nyid nyi shu rtsa gnyis po de dag dang ldan pa'i chos kyi longs spyod dam /
translated: He is not motivated by desire, hatred, ignorance or fear.🔽He is not dependent on either the enjoyment of Dharma or the enjoyment of material things.

original: zang zing gi longs spyod kyi phyogs gnyis ka la mi brten pa yin no zhes gsungs pa de dag 'dir bsdus par shes par bya'o //
analyzed: zang zing gi longs spyod kyi phyogs gnyis ka la mi brten pa yin no zhes gsungs pa de dag 'dir bsdus par shes par bya'o //
translated: These twenty two qualities of a true spiritual teacher are summarized in the following verse.🔽He is a scholar, has a good character, is patient, is not a materialist, is not motivated by desire, hatred, ignorance or fear.

original: 'dul ba la shin tu rnam par nges pa'o zhes bya ba ni ltung ba dang ltung ba ma yin pa la mkhas pa zhes ba ba'i don to //
analyzed: 'dul ba la shin tu rnam par nges pa'o zhes bya ba ni ltung ba dang ltung ba ma yin pa la mkhas pa zhes ba ba'i don to //
translated: He is well versed in the Vinaya, is a scholar of the scriptures, is skilled in the methods of teaching, and is compassionate.

original: rtsod pa'i 'byung ba spyod pa la mkhas pa'o zhes bya ba ni rtsod pa la mkhas pa dang / rtsod pa kun nas slong ba la mkhas pa dang / rtsod pa'i bye brag la mkhas pa dang / rtsod pa 'gog pa la mkhas pa dang /🔽rtsod pa 'gags nas phyir mi 'byung ba la mkhas pa ni 'byung ba spyod pa la mkhas pa'o //
analyzed: rtsod pa'i 'byung ba spyod pa la mkhas pa'o zhes bya ba ni rtsod pa la mkhas pa dang / rtsod pa kun nas slong ba la mkhas pa dang / rtsod pa'i bye brag la mkhas pa dang / rtsod pa 'gog pa la mkhas pa dang / rtsod pa 'gags nas phyir mi 'byung ba la mkhas pa ni 'byung ba spyod pa la mkhas pa'o //
translated: The skill in the origin of disputes is the skill in the origin of disputes, the skill in the origin of the arousal of disputes, the skill in the origin of the classification of disputes, the skill in the origin of the cessation of disputes, and the skill in the origin of the non-recurrence of the cessation of disputes.🔽The skill in the origin of disputes is the skill in the origin of disputes, the skill in the origin of the arousal of disputes, the skill in the origin of the classification of disputes, the skill in the origin of the cessation of disputes, and the skill in the origin of the non-recurrence of the cessation of disputes.

original: spyod pa la mkhas pa zhes bya ba ni 'di rjes su sgrub pa dang 'di byed par 'gyur ba la mkhas pa zhes bya ba'o //🔽thob pa'i gzhi la sogs pa gsum po rang gi rnam par nges pa la ji srid du rnam par zhen pa'i zhes bya ba 'di la rjes su zhugs par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: spyod pa la mkhas pa zhes bya ba ni 'di rjes su sgrub pa dang 'di byed par 'gyur ba la mkhas pa zhes bya ba'o // thob pa'i gzhi la sogs pa gsum po rang gi rnam par nges pa la ji srid du rnam par zhen pa'i zhes bya ba 'di la rjes su zhugs par rig par bya'o //
translated: The skill in the origin of disputes is the skill in the origin of disputes, the skill in the origin of the arousal of disputes, the skill in the origin of the classification of disputes, the skill in the origin of the cessation of disputes, and the skill in the origin of the non-recurrence of the cessation of disputes.🔽The skill in the origin of disputes is the skill in the origin of disputes, the skill in the origin of the arousal of disputes, the skill in the origin of the classification of disputes, the skill in the origin of the cessation of disputes, and the skill in the origin of the non-recurrence of the cessation of disputes.🔽The skill in the origin of disputes is the skill in the origin of disputes, the skill in the origin of the arousal of disputes, the skill in the origin of the classification of disputes, the skill in the origin of the cessation of disputes, and the skill in the origin of the non-recurrence of the cessation of disputes.🔽The skill in the origin of disputes is the skill in the origin of disputes, the skill in the origin of the arousal of disputes, the skill in the origin of the classification of disputes, the skill in the origin of the cessation of disputes, and the skill in the origin of the non-recurrence of the cessation of disputes.🔽The skill in the origin of disputes is the skill in the origin of disputes, the skill in the origin of the arousal of disputes, the skill in the origin of the classification of disputes, the skill in the origin of the cessation of disputes, and the skill in the origin of the non-recurrence of the cessation of disputes.

original: rnam par zhen pa'o zhes bya ba ni don rnam par nges pas mi 'gyur te des ni bstan bcos la mkhas pa bsdus so //
analyzed: rnam par zhen pa'o zhes bya ba ni don rnam par nges pas mi 'gyur te des ni bstan bcos la mkhas pa bsdus so //
translated: The skill in the origin of disputes is the skill in the origin of disputes, the skill in the origin of the arousal of disputes, the skill

original: brtan @235b zhing nyes rtsom med par 'jug pa'o zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: brtan @235b zhing nyes rtsom med par 'jug pa'o zhes bya ba la /
translated: He is steadfast and does not engage in evil deeds.

original: brtan pa ni brten pa'o //🔽lus dang ngag gis mi 'jug pa bsdus so //
analyzed: brtan pa ni brten pa'o // lus dang ngag gis mi 'jug pa bsdus so //
translated: Steadfast means firm.🔽He is included in one who does not engage in evil deeds with body and speech.

original: nyes rtsom med par 'jug pa'o zhes bya ba ni nyes rtsom med par smra ba dang nyes rtsom byed du mi 'jug pa bsdus so snyam pa'o zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: nyes rtsom med par 'jug pa'o zhes bya ba ni nyes rtsom med par smra ba dang nyes rtsom byed du mi 'jug pa bsdus so snyam pa'o zhes bya ba ni /
translated: He does not engage in evil deeds means he is included in one who does not speak or act in evil deeds.

original: 'dun pa dang zhe sdang dang 'jigs pas mi 'gro ba bstan to //
analyzed: 'dun pa dang zhe sdang dang 'jigs pas mi 'gro ba bstan to //
translated: He does not go out of desire, hatred, or fear.

original: brda phrad pa'o zhes bya ba ni gzhan gyis bsgo ba brda phrad par byed pa gang yin pa de ni brda phrad par bya ba ste des ni smra ba brda phrad par byed pa dang zhes bya ba nas nges par rtogs par byed pa zhes bya ba'i tshig
analyzed: brda phrad pa'o zhes bya ba ni gzhan gyis bsgo ba brda phrad par byed pa gang yin pa de ni brda phrad par bya ba ste des ni smra ba brda phrad par byed pa dang zhes bya ba nas nges par rtogs par byed pa zhes bya ba'i tshig
translated: He is one who understands what is said means he is included in one who understands what is said by others.

original: 'og ma bzhi bsdus so //
analyzed: 'og ma bzhi bsdus so //
translated: The next four are included in the one who understands what is said.

original: brda sprod par byed pa'o zhes bya ba ni gang zhig pha rol po la brda phrad par byed nus pa de ni mkhas pa'o //
analyzed: brda sprod par byed pa'o zhes bya ba ni gang zhig pha rol po la brda phrad par byed nus pa de ni mkhas pa'o //
translated: He is one who teaches the language means he is skilled in the language that is able to make others understand.

original: brda sprod par byed nus pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa snga ma'i tshig bzhi po rnams bsdu pa'o //
analyzed: brda sprod par byed nus pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa snga ma'i tshig bzhi po rnams bsdu pa'o //
translated: The four previous words, beginning with “able to expound,” are included in this.

original: mkhas pa zhes bya ba ni rmongs pa med cing mkhas pa ste des ni gti mug gis 'gro ba ma yin pa zhes bya ba yan chad thams cad bsdus par rig par bya'o //🔽de dag gis nye bar ma zhi na dge 'dun la dbul lo zhes bya ba ni gzu bo de dag gis rtsod pa de nye bar ma zhi na dge 'dun la dbul bar bya'o //
analyzed: mkhas pa zhes bya ba ni rmongs pa med cing mkhas pa ste des ni gti mug gis 'gro ba ma yin pa zhes bya ba yan chad thams cad bsdus par rig par bya'o // de dag gis nye bar ma zhi na dge 'dun la dbul lo zhes bya ba ni gzu bo de dag gis rtsod pa de nye bar ma zhi na dge 'dun la dbul bar bya'o //
translated: “Skilled” means not confused and wise. By this, all that follows, beginning with “not going by way of delusion,” should be understood as included.🔽“If they are unable to settle it, they should offer it to the Saṅgha” means that if those elders are unable to settle that dispute, it should be offered to the Saṅgha.

original: des ma nus na gsal ba dag bsko'o zhes bya ba ni dge 'dun des rtsod pa nye bar zhi bar byed ma nus na dge slong gsal ba dag bsko bar bya'o //
analyzed: des ma nus na gsal ba dag bsko'o zhes bya ba ni dge 'dun des rtsod pa nye bar zhi bar byed ma nus na dge slong gsal ba dag bsko bar bya'o //
translated: “If they are unable, they should appoint clear-sighted ones” means that if that Saṅgha is unable to settle the dispute, clear-sighted monks should be appointed.

original: 'di'i bskrad pa'i rnam pa yin te /
analyzed: 'di'i bskrad pa'i rnam pa yin te /
translated: This is the form of expulsion.

original: ji ltar bskrad pa skye bo chen pos sgrub par mi nus na de bzhin du 'dir don sgrub pa'o //
analyzed: ji ltar bskrad pa skye bo chen pos sgrub par mi nus na de bzhin du 'dir don sgrub pa'o //
translated: Just as expulsion cannot be accomplished by a large group, in the same way, here the meaning is accomplished.

original: ji tsam du gsal ba dag bsko bar bya zhe na /
analyzed: ji tsam du gsal ba dag bsko bar bya zhe na /
translated: Up to how many clear-sighted ones should be appointed?

original: de'i phyir dge 'dun gyi tshad las mi nyung ba dag go zhes bya ba smos te /
analyzed: de'i phyir dge 'dun gyi tshad las mi nyung ba dag go zhes bya ba smos te /
translated: Therefore, the text says, “the saṅgha, which is a quorum and more.”

original: mtshams kyi phyi rol du song nas dge 'dun tshang ba ji snyed pa dag bsko'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: mtshams kyi phyi rol du song nas dge 'dun tshang ba ji snyed pa dag bsko'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that one should summon as many as are a quorum of the saṅgha, even if they are outside the boundary.

original: sde tshan des mi nus na rang gis gsal ba dag bsko ba nyid do zhes bya ba ni gzu bo'i sde tshan nam gsal ba'i sde tshan nam /
analyzed: sde tshan des mi nus na rang gis gsal ba dag bsko ba nyid do zhes bya ba ni gzu bo'i sde tshan nam gsal ba'i sde tshan nam /
translated: If the group is unable to do so, then the clear ones should summon the clear ones.

original: gsal pa'i yang gsal ba'i sde tshan gang yang rung bas rtsod pa de nye bar zhi bar ma nus na /🔽sde tshan de rang gis gsal ba dag bsko bar rigs pa nyid yin te chos dang ldan pa de ni mnyam pa ste /
analyzed: gsal pa'i yang gsal ba'i sde tshan gang yang rung bas rtsod pa de nye bar zhi bar ma nus na / sde tshan de rang gis gsal ba dag bsko bar rigs pa nyid yin te chos dang ldan pa de ni mnyam pa ste /
translated: If the group of upright ones, the group of clear ones, or the group of the clear of the clear ones is unable to pacify the dispute,🔽then it is appropriate for the group to summon the clear ones.

original: sde tshan de rnams kyis kyang rang gis gsal ba dag byed pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: sde tshan de rnams kyis kyang rang gis gsal ba dag byed pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that the group of upright ones, the group of clear ones, or the group of the clear of the clear ones should summon the clear ones.

original: dge 'dun @236a * //
analyzed: dge 'dun @236a * //
translated: The saṅgha, which is a quorum and more.

original: gyi tshad las mi nyung ba dag go zhes sngar smos pa'i bdag po'i dbang gis shes par bya'o //
analyzed: gyi tshad las mi nyung ba dag go zhes sngar smos pa'i bdag po'i dbang gis shes par bya'o //
translated: The meaning of the above statement should be understood by the power of the context.

original: 'dir gzhung ni kha cig las gzu bo rnams kyis gsal ba dag bsko bar gsungs te /
analyzed: 'dir gzhung ni kha cig las gzu bo rnams kyis gsal ba dag bsko bar gsungs te /
translated: Some texts say that the pure ones should be appointed by the elders.🔽If the elders cannot pacify the dispute, the elders should appoint the pure ones.

original: gal te dge slong gzu bo dag gis rtsod pa de nye bar zhi bar byed ma nus na dge slong gzu bo rnams kyis dge slong gsal ba dag bsko bar bya'o zhes gsungs pa dang / kha cig las dge 'dun las gsal ba dag bsko bar gsungs te gal te dge 'dun gyis rtsod pa de nye bar zhi bar byed ma nus na dge 'dun gyis dge slong gsal ba dag bsko bar bya'o zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa yin te /
analyzed: gal te dge slong gzu bo dag gis rtsod pa de nye bar zhi bar byed ma nus na dge slong gzu bo rnams kyis dge slong gsal ba dag bsko bar bya'o zhes gsungs pa dang / kha cig las dge 'dun las gsal ba dag bsko bar gsungs te gal te dge 'dun gyis rtsod pa de nye bar zhi bar byed ma nus na dge 'dun gyis dge slong gsal ba dag bsko bar bya'o zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa yin te /
translated: Some texts say that the pure ones should be appointed by the saṅgha. If the saṅgha cannot pacify the dispute, the saṅgha should appoint the pure ones.

original: 'dir de gnyis ka yang sbyar ba'i don grub pa zhes bya ba de gnyis ka yang khongs su bsdu bar bya'o //
analyzed: 'dir de gnyis ka yang sbyar ba'i don grub pa zhes bya ba de gnyis ka yang khongs su bsdu bar bya'o //
translated: Here, both of these are included in the statement, “The meaning of the application is established.”

original: kha cig las 'dir gsal ba dang gsal ba'i gsal ba rnams byed pa 'byung ba yin no //
analyzed: kha cig las 'dir gsal ba dang gsal ba'i gsal ba rnams byed pa 'byung ba yin no //
translated: Some texts say that the pure ones and the pure of the pure ones should be appointed here.

original: gzhan dag ni gsal ba dang gsal ba'i gsal ba 'dir de gnyis ka'i dpe tsam 'dir zhes bya ba des 'di rig par bya'o //
analyzed: gzhan dag ni gsal ba dang gsal ba'i gsal ba 'dir de gnyis ka'i dpe tsam 'dir zhes bya ba des 'di rig par bya'o //
translated: The other is the manifestation of the manifest. Here, the word “here” indicates that both are merely examples.🔽If one is unable to do anything else, one should return to the original basis from which the dispute arose.

original: mi nus shing gzhan mi byed na gang las blangs pa de la dbul lo zhes bya ba ni gang du rang las gzhan gyi tshogs mi byed cing des nye bar zhi bar mi nus na de'i tshe dang po rtsod pa de gang las blangs pa de nyid la
analyzed: mi nus shing gzhan mi byed na gang las blangs pa de la dbul lo zhes bya ba ni gang du rang las gzhan gyi tshogs mi byed cing des nye bar zhi bar mi nus na de'i tshe dang po rtsod pa de gang las blangs pa de nyid la
translated: If one is unable to do anything else, one should return to the original basis from which the dispute arose.

original: phyir dbul bar bya ba ste gsal ba'i yang gsal ba dag gis ni gsal ba dag la'o //
analyzed: phyir dbul bar bya ba ste gsal ba'i yang gsal ba dag gis ni gsal ba dag la'o //
translated: If the dispute is between two individuals, it should be settled by the two of them.

original: gsal ba dag gis ni gzu bo dag gam dge 'dun dag la'o //🔽gzu bo dag gis ni rgol ba dang phyir rgol ba dag la'o //
analyzed: gsal ba dag gis ni gzu bo dag gam dge 'dun dag la'o // gzu bo dag gis ni rgol ba dang phyir rgol ba dag la'o //
translated: If the dispute is between an individual and the saṅgha, it should be settled by the saṅgha.🔽If the dispute is between two groups, it should be settled by the two groups.

original: gnas brtan dag gis rtsod pa sbed pa la'o //🔽des ni dge 'dun la'o //
analyzed: gnas brtan dag gis rtsod pa sbed pa la'o //🔽des ni dge 'dun la'o //
translated: If the dispute is between elders, it should be settled by the elders.🔽If the dispute is between the saṅgha, it should be settled by the saṅgha.

original: phyir 'ongs na dge 'dun gzhi bos rtsod pa sbed pa bsko'o zhes bya ba ni gsal ba dag las rtsod pa de phyir 'ongs na dge 'dun gzhi bos rtsod pa sbed pa bsko bar bya ste /
analyzed: phyir 'ongs na dge 'dun gzhi bos rtsod pa sbed pa bsko'o zhes bya ba ni gsal ba dag las rtsod pa de phyir 'ongs na dge 'dun gzhi bos rtsod pa sbed pa bsko bar bya ste /
translated: This is stated in the clear scriptures. If the monk who was expelled returns, the saṃgha should appoint a monk to settle the dispute.

original: de yang dge 'dun gyis spro bar byas nas gsol ba dang gnyis kyi las kyis bsko bar bya'o //
analyzed: de yang dge 'dun gyis spro bar byas nas gsol ba dang gnyis kyi las kyis bsko bar bya'o //
translated: Moreover, the saṃgha should appoint him through a two-part formal procedure of proposal and approval.🔽Therefore, the saṃgha with the elder and with the pratimokṣa should be offered.

original: des na gnas brtan dang bcas shing so sor thar pa dang bcas pa'i dge 'dun gzhan la dbul lo zhes bya ba ni rtsod pa sbed pa de gnas brtan dang bcas pa so sor thar pa dang bcas pa'i dge 'dun la dbul bar bya'o//
analyzed: des na gnas brtan dang bcas shing so sor thar pa dang bcas pa'i dge 'dun gzhan la dbul lo zhes bya ba ni rtsod pa sbed pa de gnas brtan dang bcas pa so sor thar pa dang bcas pa'i dge 'dun la dbul bar bya'o//
translated: This means that the monk who settles the dispute should be offered to the saṃgha with the elder and with the pratimokṣa.🔽The past should be stated and offered for three months.

original: @236b sngar byung ba brjod de dus zla ba gsum du dbul lo zhes bya ba ni 'dir kha cig ni zla ba drug gi bar du brtan nas zhes bya ba ni 'dir gzhung du smos pa yin ta mdo sde 'dzin pa la sogs pa rnams la lo gcig
analyzed: @236b sngar byung ba brjod de dus zla ba gsum du dbul lo zhes bya ba ni 'dir kha cig ni zla ba drug gi bar du brtan nas zhes bya ba ni 'dir gzhung du smos pa yin ta mdo sde 'dzin pa la sogs pa rnams la lo gcig
translated: Here, some say that he should be offered for six months. This is stated in the text. Those who uphold the sūtras and so forth should be offered for one year.

original: gi bar du brten nas zhes gsungs pa yin no //
analyzed: gi bar du brten nas zhes gsungs pa yin no //
translated: The Blessed One said, It is not proper to accuse the Saṅgha of being defiled by this or that person.

original: shin tu yun ring por 'dir mang po rnams la 'di kun nas nyon mongs par rigs pa ma yin no //
analyzed: shin tu yun ring por 'dir mang po rnams la 'di kun nas nyon mongs par rigs pa ma yin no //
translated: For a long time, many have been defiled here, but not all of them are defiled.

original: de bas na de la ma brten no //
analyzed: de bas na de la ma brten no //
