original: rjes su 'breng na de dag la 'di skad ces tshe dang ldan pa dag khyed cag legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu byung nas 'thab par gyur mtshang 'dru bar gyur /
analyzed: rjes su 'breng na de dag la 'di skad ces tshe dang ldan pa dag khyed cag legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu byung nas 'thab par gyur mtshang 'dru bar gyur /
translated: If they follow him, he should say to them, ‘Venerables, having gone forth in the well-proclaimed Dharma and Vinaya, you are fighting, quarreling, and arguing,

original: rtsod par gyur 'gyed par gyur cing gnas pa ni ma rnyed de rnyed pa ma yin no //
analyzed: rtsod par gyur 'gyed par gyur cing gnas pa ni ma rnyed de rnyed pa ma yin no //
translated: and you are not staying harmonious, unified, and view-unified. That is not a gain for you.

original: nyes pa rnyed kyi legs pa rnyed pa ma yin gyi /
analyzed: nyes pa rnyed kyi legs pa rnyed pa ma yin gyi /
translated: You have gained a fault, not a gain.

original: tshe dang ldan pa dag ma 'thab cig mtshang ma 'dru shig /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa dag ma 'thab cig mtshang ma 'dru shig /
translated: Venerables, do not fight, do not quarrel,

original: ma 'gyed cig 'gyed pa gnyis ka rgyal ba med do //
analyzed: ma 'gyed cig 'gyed pa gnyis ka rgyal ba med do //
translated: and do not argue. In a dispute, there is no victory for either side.

original: rgyug pa gnyis ka rgyal ba med do //
analyzed: rgyug pa gnyis ka rgyal ba med do //
translated: In a dispute, there is no victory for either side.🔽One will be victorious, and the other will be defeated.’

original: gcig rgyal gcig 'pham du 'gyur ro zhes brjod par bya'o zhes bya ba ni gal te rgol ba dang phyir rgol ba'i dge slong de dag gnas brtan de'i rjes su 'brang ba na des de dag la de skad ces brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: gcig rgyal gcig 'pham du 'gyur ro zhes brjod par bya'o zhes bya ba ni gal te rgol ba dang phyir rgol ba'i dge slong de dag gnas brtan de'i rjes su 'brang ba na des de dag la de skad ces brjod par bya'o //
translated: “This is what he should say if the monk challengers and the monk respondents follow the elder.”

original: ches mang ba'i blos legs par gzhag pa ni legs pa sgrub pa'i rnam pa gzhan yin no zhes bya ba ni tshogs par byung ba dag gis rgyud gcig tu bya'o zhes bya ba la sogs pa ji skad bstan pa'i rnam pa de dag las 'di lta ste /
analyzed: ches mang ba'i blos legs par gzhag pa ni legs pa sgrub pa'i rnam pa gzhan yin no zhes bya ba ni tshogs par byung ba dag gis rgyud gcig tu bya'o zhes bya ba la sogs pa ji skad bstan pa'i rnam pa de dag las 'di lta ste /
translated: The most numerous mind is well-established is another aspect of accomplishing the good.

original: ches mang ba'i blos legs par gzhag pa zhes bya ba 'di ni legs par sgrub pa'i rnam pa gzhan yin par shes par bya'o //
analyzed: ches mang ba'i blos legs par gzhag pa zhes bya ba 'di ni legs par sgrub pa'i rnam pa gzhan yin par shes par bya'o //
translated: This is to be understood as another aspect of accomplishing the good, which is called the most numerous mind is well-established.

original: 'di ni chos kyi rnam par gtan la dbab pa la srid kyi tshul khrims rnam par gtan la dbab pa mi srid do zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: 'di ni chos kyi rnam par gtan la dbab pa la srid kyi tshul khrims rnam par gtan la dbab pa mi srid do zhes bya ba la /
translated: This is possible in the ascertainment of phenomena, but not in the ascertainment of ethics.

original: 'di ni zhes bya ba ni ches mang ba'i blos legs par gzhag pa 'di ni zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
analyzed: 'di ni zhes bya ba ni ches mang ba'i blos legs par gzhag pa 'di ni zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
translated: This refers to the most numerous mind is well-established.

original: chos rnam par gtan la dbab pa'i zhes bya ba ni ci 'di chos ma yin nam 'on te yin 'dul ba yin nam 'on te 'dul ba ma yin zhes bya ba la sogs pas chos rnam par gtan la dbab pa la yin gyi tshul khrims rnam par gtan
analyzed: chos rnam par gtan la dbab pa'i zhes bya ba ni ci 'di chos ma yin nam 'on te yin 'dul ba yin nam 'on te 'dul ba ma yin zhes bya ba la sogs pas chos rnam par gtan la dbab pa la yin gyi tshul khrims rnam par gtan
translated: It is not determining morality,

original: la dbab pa la ni ma yin no //
analyzed: la dbab pa la ni ma yin no //
translated: because it is not the domain of the two disputes.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: de'i phyir de'i skabs kyis shes pa ni 'gyed pa gnyis dang 'brel ba yin pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba smos te /
analyzed: de'i phyir de'i skabs kyis shes pa ni 'gyed pa gnyis dang 'brel ba yin pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba smos te /
translated: Therefore it is said, “Because it is related to the two disputes.”🔽The term “determining morality” refers to determining whether something is based on that or not.

original: tshul khrims rnam par gtan la dbab pa zhes bya ba ni 'dis gzhi byas sam 'on te ma byas zhes bya ba la sogs pas gtan la phebs @237b pa yin pas de ni 'gyed pa gnyis las gzhan pa dag gis shes pa'i yul ma yin pas de'i phyir
analyzed: tshul khrims rnam par gtan la dbab pa zhes bya ba ni 'dis gzhi byas sam 'on te ma byas zhes bya ba la sogs pas gtan la phebs @237b pa yin pas de ni 'gyed pa gnyis las gzhan pa dag gis shes pa'i yul ma yin pas de'i phyir
translated: Since that is not the domain of knowledge through the other two disputes,🔽therefore it is said, “Because it is related to the two disputes.”

original: rtog pa po nyid kyis bsten par bya ba med par shin tu mang ba 'di dang gnas pa zhes bya ba bsten pa'i rnam pa gzhan ni med do //
analyzed: rtog pa po nyid kyis bsten par bya ba med par shin tu mang ba 'di dang gnas pa zhes bya ba bsten pa'i rnam pa gzhan ni med do //
translated: The one who conceives does not rely on the non-existent, and there is no other mode of reliance called “endurance.”

original: ci 'di la de bzhin du brten par bya ba 'am zhe na /
analyzed: ci 'di la de bzhin du brten par bya ba 'am zhe na /
translated: Is it to be relied upon in that way?

original: de'i phyir rgol ba dag gis gces par gzung ba nyid dang / rab tu dam pa nyid dang mi zad pa nyid yin zhing de dag bye bar dogs pa nyid kyis de la brten par bya'o zhes bya ba smos te /
analyzed: de'i phyir rgol ba dag gis gces par gzung ba nyid dang / rab tu dam pa nyid dang mi zad pa nyid yin zhing de dag bye bar dogs pa nyid kyis de la brten par bya'o zhes bya ba smos te /
translated: Therefore, it is said that it is to be relied upon because of the fear of their division, since it is cherished by the disputants, it is most excellent, and it is inexhaustible.

original: gal te rgol ba dang phyir rgol ba dag mngon par zhen pa rnon pos rtsod pa gces par gzung ba nyid dang ; mngon par zhen pa mi phyed pas gal te rtsod pa de yal bar bor na de dag rnon pos phye ba dogs pa nyid shes kyang bsam pa khyad par can dang /
analyzed: gal te rgol ba dang phyir rgol ba dag mngon par zhen pa rnon pos rtsod pa gces par gzung ba nyid dang ; mngon par zhen pa mi phyed pas gal te rtsod pa de yal bar bor na de dag rnon pos phye ba dogs pa nyid shes kyang bsam pa khyad par can dang /
translated: If the disputants and opponents, through sharp adherence, cherish the dispute, and if the dispute is abandoned because of indivisible adherence, then it is to be relied upon because of the fear of their division by the sharp.

original: mngon par zhen pas mi zad pa nyid du 'gyur zhing mdo sde dang 'dul ba dang ma mo 'dzin pa nyid rnam par gnon pa nyid kyis so ;
analyzed: mngon par zhen pas mi zad pa nyid du 'gyur zhing mdo sde dang 'dul ba dang ma mo 'dzin pa nyid rnam par gnon pa nyid kyis so ;
translated: Since they are attached to their own position, they become inexhaustible, and they are bearers of the sūtras, the vinaya, and the mātṛkā, since they are victorious.

original: / gal te rtsod pa de ya la bar bor na de dag bye bar dogs pa nyid kyang yod na de'i tshe dge 'dun bye bar gyur na mi rung ngo snyam pa'i bsam pas ches mang ba'i blos legs par gzhag pa'i zhes bya ba legs par sgrub pa'i
analyzed: / gal te rtsod pa de ya la bar bor na de dag bye bar dogs pa nyid kyang yod na de'i tshe dge 'dun bye bar gyur na mi rung ngo snyam pa'i bsam pas ches mang ba'i blos legs par gzhag pa'i zhes bya ba legs par sgrub pa'i
translated: If the dispute is abandoned, then there is the fear that they will split, and at that time, thinking, “It is not suitable for the saṅgha to split,” the majority of the saṅgha should be of the same mind and well-established.

original: rnam pa gzhan la brten par bya zhing gzhan du mi bya'o //
analyzed: rnam pa gzhan la brten par bya zhing gzhan du mi bya'o //
translated: They should rely on another aspect and not do it another way.

original: bsdam par bya ba ma yin pa'i don la'o zhes bya ba ni 'di la ltung ba yin nam ma yin rnam par gtan la dbab pa'i don to //
analyzed: bsdam par bya ba ma yin pa'i don la'o zhes bya ba ni 'di la ltung ba yin nam ma yin rnam par gtan la dbab pa'i don to //
translated: The meaning of not being bound is the meaning of determining whether or not this is a downfall.

original: gal te ltung ba las bsdam par bya ba'i bdag nyid ma yin gyi bshags par bya ba'i bdag nyid yin na des kyang don de la ches mang ba'i blos legs par gzhag pa zhes bya ba'i legs par sgrub pa'i rnam pa gzhan la brten par bya'i bsdam par
analyzed: gal te ltung ba las bsdam par bya ba'i bdag nyid ma yin gyi bshags par bya ba'i bdag nyid yin na des kyang don de la ches mang ba'i blos legs par gzhag pa zhes bya ba'i legs par sgrub pa'i rnam pa gzhan la brten par bya'i bsdam par
translated: If it is not the nature of restraint from downfalls, but the nature of confession, then one should rely on another method of proper practice called “proper establishment” that is more extensive in meaning.

original: bya ba'i don yin na de la ni rnam pa 'di la brten par mi bya ste phran tshegs tsam du zad pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: bya ba'i don yin na de la ni rnam pa 'di la brten par mi bya ste phran tshegs tsam du zad pa'i phyir ro //
translated: If it is the meaning of restraint, then one should not rely on this method, because it is merely a minor point.

original: ci dang po nyid nas 'di la brten par bya 'am zhe na /
analyzed: ci dang po nyid nas 'di la brten par bya 'am zhe na /
translated: Should one rely on this method from the very beginning?

original: de'i phyir gnas brten gyi mthar thug pa dag yongs su nyon mongs par gyur pa dag la'o zhes bya ba smos te /
analyzed: de'i phyir gnas brten gyi mthar thug pa dag yongs su nyon mongs par gyur pa dag la'o zhes bya ba smos te /
translated: Therefore it is said, “For those who are afflicted, up to the most senior monks.”

original: dge 'dun gzhi po dang gsal ba la sogs pa'i rim gyis gnas brtan gyi mthar thug pa'i bar dag gis nyon mongs pa brtsal kyang nye bar ma zhi bar gyur pa ni yid @238a * //
analyzed: dge 'dun gzhi po dang gsal ba la sogs pa'i rim gyis gnas brtan gyi mthar thug pa'i bar dag gis nyon mongs pa brtsal kyang nye bar ma zhi bar gyur pa ni yid @238a * //
translated: Those who are afflicted, even though they search for afflictions, but do not pacify them, are the most senior monks, in order of the saṅgha’s basis, clarity, and so on.

original: yin na 'di la brten par bya'o //
analyzed: yin na 'di la brten par bya'o //
translated: If they are afflicted, one should rely on this method.

original: gang gis 'di la brten par bya zhe na /
analyzed: gang gis 'di la brten par bya zhe na /
translated: If one asks, “By whom is this to be done?”

original: de'i phyir dge 'dun gzhi bos so zhes bya ba smos so //
analyzed: de'i phyir dge 'dun gzhi bos so zhes bya ba smos so //
translated: the text says, “The Saṅgha is the basis.”

original: don 'di la ches mang po dag la bgrang bar ji ltar bya zhe na /
analyzed: don 'di la ches mang po dag la bgrang bar ji ltar bya zhe na /
translated: If one asks, “How can one count so many people in this matter?”

original: de'i phyir 'di la tshul shing brim pas blo gzung bar bya ba nyid do ;
analyzed: de'i phyir 'di la tshul shing brim pas blo gzung bar bya ba nyid do ;
translated: the text says, “Here, one should understand by means of a voting ticket.”

original: / tshul shing 'drim pa bsko bar bya'o //
analyzed: / tshul shing 'drim pa bsko bar bya'o //
translated: One should appoint a ticket distributor.

original: des tshul shing rnam pa gnyis dag nye bar gzhag go //
analyzed: des tshul shing rnam pa gnyis dag nye bar gzhag go //
translated: He should set out two kinds of tickets:

original: chos kyi tshul shing dag ni ya yo med pa dang khyar khyor med pa dang chas chus med pa dang / kha dog bzang ba dang dri zhim pa dang reg pa 'jam pa dag yin la //
analyzed: chos kyi tshul shing dag ni ya yo med pa dang khyar khyor med pa dang chas chus med pa dang / kha dog bzang ba dang dri zhim pa dang reg pa 'jam pa dag yin la //
translated: The Dharma tickets are without warp and woof, without holes, without stains, with good color, good smell, and soft to the touch.

original: cig shos kyi ni de las bzlog pa'o //🔽dge 'dun la 'du bar gsol lo //
analyzed: cig shos kyi ni de las bzlog pa'o // dge 'dun la 'du bar gsol lo //
translated: The other kind is the opposite of that.🔽One should request the Saṅgha to assemble.

original: tshul shing 'drim par 'gyur gyi thams cad kyis 'du bar bya'o //
analyzed: tshul shing 'drim par 'gyur gyi thams cad kyis 'du bar bya'o //
translated: The ticket distributor should distribute the tickets. Everyone should assemble.

original: gal te 'di ltar 'dun pa sbyin bas tshogs pa dang chos ma yin pa'i tshul shing lhag par 'gyur ba sems na brim par mi bya'o //
analyzed: gal te 'di ltar 'dun pa sbyin bas tshogs pa dang chos ma yin pa'i tshul shing lhag par 'gyur ba sems na brim par mi bya'o //
translated: If you think that by giving this, the Dharma-voting stick will be in the majority, then do not distribute it.

original: 'drim pa'i tshe na lag pa g-yas pas chos kyi tshul shing dag bzung zhing g-yon pas cig shos dag go //
analyzed: 'drim pa'i tshe na lag pa g-yas pas chos kyi tshul shing dag bzung zhing g-yon pas cig shos dag go //
translated: When distributing, hold the Dharma-voting sticks in the right hand, the others in the left.

original: de dag g-yogs te snga ma dag snang bar byas nas brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: de dag g-yogs te snga ma dag snang bar byas nas brjod par bya'o //
translated: Covering them up, make them appear to be the former, and announce,

original: gnas brtan 'di dag ni chos kyi tshul shing ya yo med pa khyar khyor med pa chas chus med pa kha dog bzang ba dri zhim pa reg na 'jam pa dag yin gyi long shig ces so //
analyzed: gnas brtan 'di dag ni chos kyi tshul shing ya yo med pa khyar khyor med pa chas chus med pa kha dog bzang ba dri zhim pa reg na 'jam pa dag yin gyi long shig ces so //
translated: “Sthavira, these are Dharma-voting sticks, without warp or woof, without flaw, of good color, good smell, and good touch. Take them.”

original: cig shos tshol na tshig gnyis kyi bar du mi dbul lo zhes bya ba smos te /
analyzed: cig shos tshol na tshig gnyis kyi bar du mi dbul lo zhes bya ba smos te /
translated: If you seek the other, do not distribute it until after the second announcement.

original: cig shos ces bya ba ni chos ma yin pa'i tshul shing ngo //
analyzed: cig shos ces bya ba ni chos ma yin pa'i tshul shing ngo //
translated: The other is the non-Dharma-voting stick.

original: g-yogs sam phye ba gang gis chos kyi mang bar 'gyur ba de ltar brim par bya'o zhes bya ba ni gal te g-yogs te brim na chos kyi tshul shing mang ba lta na yang g-yogs te brim par bya'o //
analyzed: g-yogs sam phye ba gang gis chos kyi mang bar 'gyur ba de ltar brim par bya'o zhes bya ba ni gal te g-yogs te brim na chos kyi tshul shing mang ba lta na yang g-yogs te brim par bya'o //
translated: If it is covered and distributed, and if it is seen that there will be more Dharma, it should be distributed covered.🔽If it is uncovered and distributed, and if it is seen that there will be more Dharma, it should be distributed uncovered.

original: ji ste phye ste brim na chos kyi tshul shing mang bar 'gyur ba lta na yang phye ste brim par bya'o //
analyzed: ji ste phye ste brim na chos kyi tshul shing mang bar 'gyur ba lta na yang phye ste brim par bya'o //
translated: If it is uncovered and distributed, and if it is seen that there will be more Dharma, it should be distributed uncovered.

original: tshe dang ldan pa khyod kyi mkhan po dang slob dpon dang mkhan po gcig pa dang slob dpon cig pa dang gtam 'dres pa dang phebs par smra ba dang smos 'drin dang 'grogs pa shes kyi chos kyi tshul shing blangs kyis khyod kyis kyang chos kyi tshul shing
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa khyod kyi mkhan po dang slob dpon dang mkhan po gcig pa dang slob dpon cig pa dang gtam 'dres pa dang phebs par smra ba dang smos 'drin dang 'grogs pa shes kyi chos kyi tshul shing blangs kyis khyod kyis kyang chos kyi tshul shing
translated: Venerable, your preceptor, teacher, co-student, or companion in the life of purity has taken up the Dharma banner.

original: long shig / khyod de dag lhan cig rtsod par gyur na ma legs @238b so zhes rna drung du bshub bo zhes bya ba ni brda sprad pa'i phyir rna drung du bshub cing de skad yang dang yang du brjod par bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: long shig / khyod de dag lhan cig rtsod par gyur na ma legs @238b so zhes rna drung du bshub bo zhes bya ba ni brda sprad pa'i phyir rna drung du bshub cing de skad yang dang yang du brjod par bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: You should not quarrel with them together.  This is the meaning: You should whisper in his ear and repeat this again and again.

original: chos ma yin pa'i tshul shing blang bar mi bya'o zhes bya ba ni len na 'dul ba dang 'gal ba'i nyes byas kyi ltung ba bshags par bya'o zhes bya ba de'i 'di bsdus pa'o //
analyzed: chos ma yin pa'i tshul shing blang bar mi bya'o zhes bya ba ni len na 'dul ba dang 'gal ba'i nyes byas kyi ltung ba bshags par bya'o zhes bya ba de'i 'di bsdus pa'o //
translated: One should not take a voting ticket for an unrighteous procedure.  This is the summary of the statement: If one takes it, one should confess the fault of a downfall of wrong conduct that violates the monastic code.

original: mdo sde dang 'dul ba dang ma mo 'dzin pa dag la ma dris par mi bya'o zhes bya ba ni tshul shing blang bar bya zhes bya bar sbyar te /
analyzed: mdo sde dang 'dul ba dang ma mo 'dzin pa dag la ma dris par mi bya'o zhes bya ba ni tshul shing blang bar bya zhes bya bar sbyar te /
translated: One should not do it without asking the upholders of the discourses, the upholders of the monastic code, and the upholders of the mātṛkā.  This is connected to the statement: One should take a voting ticket.

original: 'di ni thams cad kyi dbang du byed pa'o //
analyzed: 'di ni thams cad kyi dbang du byed pa'o //
translated: This is from the perspective of all cases.

original: mdo sde 'dzin pa la sogs pa la dri ba ni chos yongs su shes par bya ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: mdo sde 'dzin pa la sogs pa la dri ba ni chos yongs su shes par bya ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Asking the upholders of the discourses and so on is for the sake of understanding the Dharma.

original: de la rang gi ma yin pa shin tu rnam par gtan la dbab pa nyid la sde snod 'dzin pa rnams la dri ba 'di byas pa nyid do //
analyzed: de la rang gi ma yin pa shin tu rnam par gtan la dbab pa nyid la sde snod 'dzin pa rnams la dri ba 'di byas pa nyid do //
translated: The question is asked of the upholders of the scriptures themselves, in order to determine what is not their own.

original: chos kyi don shes par gyur nas /
analyzed: chos kyi don shes par gyur nas /
translated: Having understood the meaning of the Dharma,

original: de'i tshe tshig dang don blang bar bya ba nyid ma yin zhes bya bar shes par bya'o //🔽dbyen du 'gyur ba'i bzod pas mi bya'o zhes bya ba ni ae ma'o bye bar gyur na ci ma rung snyam pa'i mngon par 'dod pas kyang zhes bya ba'i don to //🔽chos ma yin pas mi bya'o zhes bya ba ni byung bar gyur na ci ma rung snya pa tshul shing blang bar mi bya ste /
analyzed: de'i tshe tshig dang don blang bar bya ba nyid ma yin zhes bya bar shes par bya'o // dbyen du 'gyur ba'i bzod pas mi bya'o zhes bya ba ni ae ma'o bye bar gyur na ci ma rung snyam pa'i mngon par 'dod pas kyang zhes bya ba'i don to // chos ma yin pas mi bya'o zhes bya ba ni byung bar gyur na ci ma rung snya pa tshul shing blang bar mi bya ste /
translated: one should understand that at that time, the words and meanings are not to be accepted.🔽One should not accept the voting ticket with the thought, Oh, what if there were a schism?🔽One should not accept it with the thought, What if unrighteousness were to occur?

original: chos ma yin pa 'byung bar 'dod pas kyang blang bar mi bya'o //
analyzed: chos ma yin pa 'byung bar 'dod pas kyang blang bar mi bya'o //
translated: One should not accept it with the desire for unrighteousness to occur.

original: de gnyis 'byung bar 'gyur ba nyid dogs par shes na mi bya'o zhes bya ba 'di ltar ae ma'o bye bar gyur na ci ma rung snyam pa'i dang / ae ma'o chos ma yin pa byung bar gyur na ci ma rung snyam pa med du zin kyang de gnyis 'byung bar 'gyur ba nyid du shes pa ste /
analyzed: de gnyis 'byung bar 'gyur ba nyid dogs par shes na mi bya'o zhes bya ba 'di ltar ae ma'o bye bar gyur na ci ma rung snyam pa'i dang / ae ma'o chos ma yin pa byung bar gyur na ci ma rung snyam pa med du zin kyang de gnyis 'byung bar 'gyur ba nyid du shes pa ste /
translated: Even if one does not think, “Alas, how could it be that the Saṅgha splits?” or “Alas, how could it be that unrighteousness occurs?” if one knows that those two will occur,

original: don ji lta bu dang 'di na dge slong gang dag dbyen la mngon par zhen par byed pa de lta bu dag yod pas ston pa nyid kyang 'ga' zhig 'byung bar 'gyur ro snyam du shes na /
analyzed: don ji lta bu dang 'di na dge slong gang dag dbyen la mngon par zhen par byed pa de lta bu dag yod pas ston pa nyid kyang 'ga' zhig 'byung bar 'gyur ro snyam du shes na /
translated: and if one knows that the Teacher himself will appear in the world,

original: de ltar yang tshul shing dag blang bar mi bya'o //
analyzed: de ltar yang tshul shing dag blang bar mi bya'o //
translated: then one should not take the voting tickets.

original: mnyam pa nyid na nyan thos chen po'i phyir chos kyi tshul shing gcig blang ngo zhes bya ba ni chos dang chos ma yin pa'i tshul shing grangs mnyam pa nyid yin na nyan thos chen po la gcig bsdos te chos kyi tshul shing blang bar bya ste /🔽de ltar na rtsod pa de chos kyis nye bar zhi bar 'gyur ba yin no //🔽chos ma @239a * //
analyzed: mnyam pa nyid na nyan thos chen po'i phyir chos kyi tshul shing gcig blang ngo zhes bya ba ni chos dang chos ma yin pa'i tshul shing grangs mnyam pa nyid yin na nyan thos chen po la gcig bsdos te chos kyi tshul shing blang bar bya ste / de ltar na rtsod pa de chos kyis nye bar zhi bar 'gyur ba yin no // chos ma @239a * //
translated: When the votes for Dharma and non-Dharma are equal, the great śrāvaka should take the Dharma token.

original: yin pa'i tshul shing lhag na ni rtsod pa de chos ma yin pas nye bar zhi bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: yin pa'i tshul shing lhag na ni rtsod pa de chos ma yin pas nye bar zhi bar 'gyur ro //
translated: If the non-Dharma tokens are in excess, that dispute is settled by non-Dharma.🔽One should not dispute a settlement by Dharma.

original: chos ma yin pas nye bar zhi ba la skyo sngogs mi bya'o zhes bya ba ni chos kyis nye bar zhi ba la skyo sngogs byed du 'gyur ba la 'di ni nyes byas su gsungs so //
analyzed: chos ma yin pas nye bar zhi ba la skyo sngogs mi bya'o zhes bya ba ni chos kyis nye bar zhi ba la skyo sngogs byed du 'gyur ba la 'di ni nyes byas su gsungs so //
translated: This is said to be a minor fault.

original: 'gyed pa'i phyir rtsod pa de chos kyis nye bar zhi ba'i cho ga bshad zin to //
analyzed: 'gyed pa'i phyir rtsod pa de chos kyis nye bar zhi ba'i cho ga bshad zin to //
translated: The procedure for settling a dispute by Dharma has been explained.

original: mi gdams pa'i phyir rtsod pa ni rgyud gcig tu bya ba dang / dag pa sbyin pa zhes bya ba gnyis kyis nye bar zhi bar bstan pa de la rgyud gcig tu bya ba ni bstan zin pas dag pa sbyin par brjod par bya ste /
analyzed: mi gdams pa'i phyir rtsod pa ni rgyud gcig tu bya ba dang / dag pa sbyin pa zhes bya ba gnyis kyis nye bar zhi bar bstan pa de la rgyud gcig tu bya ba ni bstan zin pas dag pa sbyin par brjod par bya ste /
translated: Making them one in mindstream has already been explained, so granting purification should be stated.

original: de'i phyir gleng ba'i kha na ma tho ba med pa la ni dag ba sbyin no zhes bya ba smos te /
analyzed: de'i phyir gleng ba'i kha na ma tho ba med pa la ni dag ba sbyin no zhes bya ba smos te /
translated: Therefore, it is said: Purification is granted to one without fault to be discussed.

original: gal te dge slong de la ltung ba gang gis gleng bar bya ba'i ltung ba de ni kha na ma tho ba med par gyur na de'i phyir /
analyzed: gal te dge slong de la ltung ba gang gis gleng bar bya ba'i ltung ba de ni kha na ma tho ba med par gyur na de'i phyir /
translated: If the fault by which that monk is to be discussed becomes faultless, then

original: de la dran pas 'dul ba dang / ma smyos pas 'dul ba'i bdag nyid kyis dag pa sbyin par bya'o//
analyzed: de la dran pas 'dul ba dang / ma smyos pas 'dul ba'i bdag nyid kyis dag pa sbyin par bya'o//
translated: for that reason, purification is granted by the nature of being disciplined by recollection and disciplined by not being insane.

original: gleng ba ni rnam pa bzhi ste /
analyzed: gleng ba ni rnam pa bzhi ste /
translated: Discussion is of four types:

original: gzhi med pa dang gzhan rjes su sgrub pa'i dbang gis dang phyir bcos pa la ma ltos pa'i phyir dang smyos pas byas pas so zhes bya ba ni gleng ba'i kha na ma tho ba med pa ni rnam pa bzhi ste /
analyzed: gzhi med pa dang gzhan rjes su sgrub pa'i dbang gis dang phyir bcos pa la ma ltos pa'i phyir dang smyos pas byas pas so zhes bya ba ni gleng ba'i kha na ma tho ba med pa ni rnam pa bzhi ste /
translated: The four types of unchastisable offences are:

original: gzhi med pa ni ltung ba ma byung ba nyid la gleng ba gang yin pa'o //🔽gzhan rjes su bsgrub pa pa'i dbang gis ni de gzhan rjes su bsgrubs la gzhan gyis gleng bar byed pa ste /
analyzed: gzhi med pa ni ltung ba ma byung ba nyid la gleng ba gang yin pa'o // gzhan rjes su bsgrub pa pa'i dbang gis ni de gzhan rjes su bsgrubs la gzhan gyis gleng bar byed pa ste /
translated: Unfounded, when one is accused of a downfall that one has not committed.

original: ltung byed la dge 'dun lhag ma la sogs pas gleng bas so //
analyzed: ltung byed la dge 'dun lhag ma la sogs pas gleng bas so //
translated: By the power of following another, when one is accused by another who is following the example of still another.🔽Not dependent on amendment, when one is accused of a downfall that has already been properly amended.

original: phyir bcos pa la mi ltos pa'i phyir ni 'di la ltung ba byung bar gyur to zhes bya ba de des chos bzhin du phyir bcos pa nyid na phyir bcos pa nyid la ma ltos bar gleng ba'o //
analyzed: phyir bcos pa la mi ltos pa'i phyir ni 'di la ltung ba byung bar gyur to zhes bya ba de des chos bzhin du phyir bcos pa nyid na phyir bcos pa nyid la ma ltos bar gleng ba'o //
translated: By insanity, when one is accused by one who is insane.

original: smyos pas bya ba ni smyos pa'i gnas skabs su des rung ba ma yin pa kun du spyad pa des gleng bar byed pa'o //
analyzed: smyos pas bya ba ni smyos pa'i gnas skabs su des rung ba ma yin pa kun du spyad pa des gleng bar byed pa'o //
translated: The one who is insane is the one who is insane at the time of the offense. The one who is insane is the one who is insane at the time of the offense.

original: dang po gsum la ni dran pas 'dul ba sbyin no zhes bya ba ni gzhi med pa dang gzhan rjes su bsgrub pa'i dbang gis dang / phyir bcos pa la mi ltos pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba gsum gyis gleng bar bya ba de dag la ni dge 'dun gyi dran pas 'dul ba sbyin par bya ste /
analyzed: dang po gsum la ni dran pas 'dul ba sbyin no zhes bya ba ni gzhi med pa dang gzhan rjes su bsgrub pa'i dbang gis dang / phyir bcos pa la mi ltos pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba gsum gyis gleng bar bya ba de dag la ni dge 'dun gyi dran pas 'dul ba sbyin par bya ste /
translated: The first three are given the training of mindfulness, which means that the one who is insane is given the training of mindfulness by the Saṅgha because of the three reasons: the basis does not exist, the other is accomplished, and it does not depend on correction.

original: de byin pa na dge slong de la dge slong dag gis dran pa dang ldan par 'dzin gyi ltung ba dang bcas par mi 'dzin te /
analyzed: de byin pa na dge slong de la dge slong dag gis dran pa dang ldan par 'dzin gyi ltung ba dang bcas par mi 'dzin te /
translated: When that is given, the monks do not hold that monk to be with a downfall, but hold him to be mindful.

original: @239b de ltar na de'i rtsod pa nye bar zhi ba brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: @239b de ltar na de'i rtsod pa nye bar zhi ba brjod par bya'o //
translated: In that way, the dispute of that one should be said to be pacified.

original: tha ma la ni ma smyos pas 'dul ba sbyin pa'o zhes bya ba ni smyos pas byas pa gleng ba la ni dge 'dun gyi ma smyos pas 'dul ba sbyin par bya ba ste /
analyzed: tha ma la ni ma smyos pas 'dul ba sbyin pa'o zhes bya ba ni smyos pas byas pa gleng ba la ni dge 'dun gyi ma smyos pas 'dul ba sbyin par bya ba ste /
translated: The last is given the training of not being insane, which means that the one who is insane is given the training of not being insane by the Saṅgha in the case of the one who is insane bringing up the offense.

original: de sbyin na dge 'dun de la dge slong gis rang bzhin du gnas pa nyid du 'dzin gyi ltung ba dang bcas par mi 'dzin te /
analyzed: de sbyin na dge 'dun de la dge slong gis rang bzhin du gnas pa nyid du 'dzin gyi ltung ba dang bcas par mi 'dzin te /
translated: If one gives that, then the monk does not hold that Saṅgha to be naturally abiding, but holds it to be fallen.

original: mi gdams pa la rtsod pa nye bar zhi bar bya ba'i phyir chog bshad zin to //
analyzed: mi gdams pa la rtsod pa nye bar zhi bar bya ba'i phyir chog bshad zin to //
translated: The explanation of the rite for pacifying disputes without instruction has been explained.🔽The explanation of the classification of that has been taught:

original: ltung ba'i phyir rtsod pa ni phyir bcos pas nye bar zhi bar bya'o zhes bstan pa de'i rab tu dbye ba bstan pa'i phyir ltung ba dang bcas pa nyid kyi phyir 'khrug long rnam pa gsum ste ;
analyzed: ltung ba'i phyir rtsod pa ni phyir bcos pas nye bar zhi bar bya'o zhes bstan pa de'i rab tu dbye ba bstan pa'i phyir ltung ba dang bcas pa nyid kyi phyir 'khrug long rnam pa gsum ste ;
translated: “There are three types of disputes due to downfalls.

original: phyir 'phros pa med pa dang phyir 'phros pa dang bcas pas rnam pa gnyis so //
analyzed: phyir 'phros pa med pa dang phyir 'phros pa dang bcas pas rnam pa gnyis so //
translated: There are two types: without reproof and with reproof.

original: nyi tshe ba dang / dge 'dun mtha' dag dang 'brel pa'o zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: nyi tshe ba dang / dge 'dun mtha' dag dang 'brel pa'o zhes bya ba ste /
translated: There are two types: limited and related to the entire Saṅgha.”

original: gal te ltung ba dang bcas pa nyid kyi rgyus 'khrug long gi phyir dge 'dun mtha' dag phyogs dang gzhan gyi phyogs su gnas par gyur na 'di ni dge 'dun mtha' dag gi khongs su gtogs pa kha cig la yang 'khrug long 'byung ba'o //
analyzed: gal te ltung ba dang bcas pa nyid kyi rgyus 'khrug long gi phyir dge 'dun mtha' dag phyogs dang gzhan gyi phyogs su gnas par gyur na 'di ni dge 'dun mtha' dag gi khongs su gtogs pa kha cig la yang 'khrug long 'byung ba'o //
translated: If the entire Saṅgha is divided into factions, with some on one side and some on the other, because of a dispute that is accompanied by a downfall, this is a dispute within the entire Saṅgha.🔽The first is remedied by the performance of an act of acknowledgment.

original: dang po las ni khas blangs pa'i bya ba phyir bcos so zhes bya ba ni phyir 'phros pa med par 'khrug long du gyur pa'i 'og tu ltung ba'i phyir rtsod pa ni khas blangs pa'i bya bas phyir bcos par bya ste /
analyzed: dang po las ni khas blangs pa'i bya ba phyir bcos so zhes bya ba ni phyir 'phros pa med par 'khrug long du gyur pa'i 'og tu ltung ba'i phyir rtsod pa ni khas blangs pa'i bya bas phyir bcos par bya ste /
translated: A dispute that is accompanied by a downfall is remedied by the performance of an act of acknowledgment, because it is a dispute that does not require an extension.

original: khas blangs pa tsam gyi dbang gis byed pa ni bya ba ste de'i phyir bcos pa'i ming ngo //
analyzed: khas blangs pa tsam gyi dbang gis byed pa ni bya ba ste de'i phyir bcos pa'i ming ngo //
translated: The performance of an act of acknowledgment is called an act because it is done by the power of an acknowledgment.🔽The second is remedied by a legal procedure of reconciliation.

original: gnyis pa las ni mngon sum gyis 'dul bas so zhes bya ba ni phyir 'phros pa dang bcas pa nyi tshe ba'i 'khrug long du gyur pa gang gi 'og tu ni mngon sum gyis 'dul bas phyir bcos te /
analyzed: gnyis pa las ni mngon sum gyis 'dul bas so zhes bya ba ni phyir 'phros pa dang bcas pa nyi tshe ba'i 'khrug long du gyur pa gang gi 'og tu ni mngon sum gyis 'dul bas phyir bcos te /
translated: A dispute that is accompanied by an extension is remedied by a legal procedure of reconciliation.

original: 'di la rgol ba dang lan gyi tshig dag mngon sum du byung gi gleng ba pos dang dam bcas pa tsam gyis 'di la rnam par nges par sbyin pa ma yin par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: 'di la rgol ba dang lan gyi tshig dag mngon sum du byung gi gleng ba pos dang dam bcas pa tsam gyis 'di la rnam par nges par sbyin pa ma yin par rig par bya'o //
translated: Here, the words of the opponent and the reply are directly stated. But it should be understood that the one who is to be disciplined is not given certainty by the mere discussion and assertion.

original: phyir 'chos par byed pa gang yin pa de ni mngon sum gyis 'dul bar brjod do //
analyzed: phyir 'chos par byed pa gang yin pa de ni mngon sum gyis 'dul bar brjod do //
translated: That which is the amendment is called the discipline by direct recognition.

original: de ltar yang gang zag la gang zag gis gleng bar byed na chos 'dul bas mngon sum du srung ba thob pa zhes bya ba la sogs pas so //
analyzed: de ltar yang gang zag la gang zag gis gleng bar byed na chos 'dul bas mngon sum du srung ba thob pa zhes bya ba la sogs pas so //
translated: Thus, when one person is discussing with another person, it is said that “the one who is to be disciplined obtains protection by the discipline of the teaching. ”🔽In the third, it is like spreading grass.

original: gsum pa la ni rtsva bkram ba lta bus so zhes bya ba ni dge 'dun du gtogs pa thams cad phyogs su rnam par gnas pa'i dge 'dun du gyur pa'i dge slong @240a * //
analyzed: gsum pa la ni rtsva bkram ba lta bus so zhes bya ba ni dge 'dun du gtogs pa thams cad phyogs su rnam par gnas pa'i dge 'dun du gyur pa'i dge slong @240a * //
translated: All those belonging to the Saṅgha are the Saṅgha that is situated in all directions. All the monks who have been expelled

original: thams cad phyir 'phros pa dang bcas pas 'khrug long gi 'og tu ste /
analyzed: thams cad phyir 'phros pa dang bcas pas 'khrug long gi 'og tu ste /
translated: are under the dispute.

original: phyir bcos pa ni rtsva bkram ba'o //
analyzed: phyir bcos pa ni rtsva bkram ba'o //
translated: The amendment is like spreading grass.

original: rtsa bkram na rtsva thams cad phan sun nas rtse sprod du nyal ba dang 'dra bas 'di'i ming de yin no //
analyzed: rtsa bkram na rtsva thams cad phan sun nas rtse sprod du nyal ba dang 'dra bas 'di'i ming de yin no //
translated: It is like when grass is spread out, all the grass is spread out, and when grass is rolled up, all the grass is rolled up.🔽Here, for the sake of many people, those things that are to be confessed to the Saṅgha are to be restored by one person.

original: 'di la mang po dag gi don du dge 'dun ma yin pa la bshags par bya ba dag ni gcig gis phyir bcos par bya'o zhes bya ba ni nyes pa sbom po dang / dge 'dun lhag mar gtogs pa'i nyes pa sbom por dor nas dge 'dun la bshags par bya ba nyid do //
analyzed: 'di la mang po dag gi don du dge 'dun ma yin pa la bshags par bya ba dag ni gcig gis phyir bcos par bya'o zhes bya ba ni nyes pa sbom po dang / dge 'dun lhag mar gtogs pa'i nyes pa sbom por dor nas dge 'dun la bshags par bya ba nyid do //
translated: This means that after a grave offense and a grave offense belonging to the class of offenses entailing suspension have been reduced to the status of things to be confessed to the Saṅgha, they are to be restored by one person.

original: de'i phyir ltung ba gzhan rnams la 'di gang zag mang po dag gi don gang zag gi rtsva bkram pa lta bus phyir bcos par byar rung ba zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: de'i phyir ltung ba gzhan rnams la 'di gang zag mang po dag gi don gang zag gi rtsva bkram pa lta bus phyir bcos par byar rung ba zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: Therefore, in the case of other downfalls, it is suitable for them to be restored by one person, like grass spread out for the sake of many people.

original: du ma dag cig car du yang zhes bya ba ni 'dir mang po dag gi don du ltung ba du ma dag cig car du phyir 'chos su yang rung ba'o //
analyzed: du ma dag cig car du yang zhes bya ba ni 'dir mang po dag gi don du ltung ba du ma dag cig car du phyir 'chos su yang rung ba'o //
translated: This means that it is suitable for many downfalls to be restored simultaneously.

original: gang yin pa zhes smos pa dang shes pa snang bar byas pas so zhes bya ba ni gzhi 'di las khyed cag la ltung ba byung ba gang yin pa dang / kho bo cag la ltung ba byung ba gang yin pa de dag ltung ba'i ming dang rigs smos pas gzhan la ltung ba'i ming dang rigs smos pas gzhan la ltung ba'i rigs shes pa snang bar go bar byas pas phyir bcos par bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to

original: // phyogs gzhan gyis kyang mthun pa de dag la'o zhes bya ba ni gzhan gyis kyang blo gcig tu gyur pa de dag la de phyir bcos par bya'i gzhan gang la yang ma yin no //
