original: gang zag gnyis kyis gang zag la dang / ji srid @240b dge 'dun gyis gang zag mang po la dang / dge 'dun gyis dge 'dun la gleng bar byed na zhes bya ba'i bar du gleng bar byed pa'i skabs lhan cig gi dngos por bstan pa de dag bsdu'o //
analyzed: gang zag gnyis kyis gang zag la dang / ji srid @240b dge 'dun gyis gang zag mang po la dang / dge 'dun gyis dge 'dun la gleng bar byed na zhes bya ba'i bar du gleng bar byed pa'i skabs lhan cig gi dngos por bstan pa de dag bsdu'o //
translated: and two persons speak to the Saṅgha.

original: gleng ba po nyid kyang de bzhin no //
analyzed: gleng ba po nyid kyang de bzhin no //
translated: The speaker is also like that.

original: 'di la grangs kyi bye brag ni nges pa med do zhes bya ba ni gleng bar bya ba dang gleng ba po gnyis la gleng bar bya ba ji snyed pa de snyed pa kho na'i gleng ba po dag gis bya bar ma nges pa'o //
analyzed: 'di la grangs kyi bye brag ni nges pa med do zhes bya ba ni gleng bar bya ba dang gleng ba po gnyis la gleng bar bya ba ji snyed pa de snyed pa kho na'i gleng ba po dag gis bya bar ma nges pa'o //
translated: There is no fixed number here means that the number of speakers is not fixed as being the same as the number of those to whom they speak.

original: gleng ba po lus dang ngag dag gis bsdams pa nyid dang / sde snod dag shes pa nyid dang / dge 'dun gyi nang du bsams bzhin du chos dang 'dul ba log pa dang / de bzlog pa dag mi ston pa nyid ces bya ba gsum dang ldan pa la gus par bya'o zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: gleng ba po lus dang ngag dag gis bsdams pa nyid dang / sde snod dag shes pa nyid dang / dge 'dun gyi nang du bsams bzhin du chos dang 'dul ba log pa dang / de bzlog pa dag mi ston pa nyid ces bya ba gsum dang ldan pa la gus par bya'o zhes bya ba la /
translated: One should respect the accuser who has three qualities: he is restrained in body and speech, he is learned in the scriptures, and he does not teach what is contrary to the Dharma and Vinaya in the midst of the Saṅgha.

original: de las bzlog par zhes bya ba ni chos dang 'dul ba ma yin pa las te /
analyzed: de las bzlog par zhes bya ba ni chos dang 'dul ba ma yin pa las te /
translated: Here, “contrary” means contrary to the Dharma and Vinaya.

original: chos kyang shes bya rnam par gzhag pa las rig par bya'o //
analyzed: chos kyang shes bya rnam par gzhag pa las rig par bya'o //
translated: The Dharma should be understood from the presentation of objects of knowledge.

original: 'dul ba ni tshul khrims rnam par dag pa'i cho ga'o //
analyzed: 'dul ba ni tshul khrims rnam par dag pa'i cho ga'o //
translated: The Vinaya is the procedure for purifying morality.

original: gleng ba po gang zhig lus dang ngag dag gis bsdams pa nyid dang / sde snod dag la mkhas pa nyid dang / dge 'dun gyi nang du bsams bzhin du chos dang chos ma yin par mi ston /
analyzed: gleng ba po gang zhig lus dang ngag dag gis bsdams pa nyid dang / sde snod dag la mkhas pa nyid dang / dge 'dun gyi nang du bsams bzhin du chos dang chos ma yin par mi ston /
translated: The accuser who is restrained in body and speech, learned in the scriptures, and does not teach what is contrary to the Dharma and Vinaya in the midst of the Saṅgha,

original: chos ma yin pa chos su mi ston pa dang / 'dul ba 'dul ba ma yin par mi ston pa dang / 'dul ba ma yin pa 'dul bar mi ston pa'i gleng ba po 'di lta bu la gus par bya'o //
analyzed: chos ma yin pa chos su mi ston pa dang / 'dul ba 'dul ba ma yin par mi ston pa dang / 'dul ba ma yin pa 'dul bar mi ston pa'i gleng ba po 'di lta bu la gus par bya'o //
translated: One should respect a plaintiff who does not teach what is not Dharma as Dharma, who does not teach what is not Vinaya as Vinaya, and who does not teach what is not Vinaya as Vinaya.

original: tshul khrims 'chal ba dang log par ston pa la mi bya'o zhes bya ba ni gleng ba po tshul khrims 'chal ba dang / chos dang 'dul ba chos ma yin pa dang / 'dul ba ma yin par log par ston pa la ni mthun par mi bya ste /
analyzed: tshul khrims 'chal ba dang log par ston pa la mi bya'o zhes bya ba ni gleng ba po tshul khrims 'chal ba dang / chos dang 'dul ba chos ma yin pa dang / 'dul ba ma yin par log par ston pa la ni mthun par mi bya ste /
translated: One should not respect a plaintiff who has broken the precepts or teaches falsely.

original: mi bgrang zhing smad pa dang tshig gis cung zad kyang bsgrub par mi bya'o //
analyzed: mi bgrang zhing smad pa dang tshig gis cung zad kyang bsgrub par mi bya'o //
translated: One should not count, despise, or establish even the slightest thing by words.

original: dgos pa dang ldan pa nyid kyis gleng ba la rnam pa gzhan gyis der 'di la gleng ba la 'jug pa zhes bya ba nges par shes pa la mthun par bya ba'o //
analyzed: dgos pa dang ldan pa nyid kyis gleng ba la rnam pa gzhan gyis der 'di la gleng ba la 'jug pa zhes bya ba nges par shes pa la mthun par bya ba'o //
translated: By the very fact that it is necessary, in that case, this is called engaging in the plaintiff's statement. One should agree with the definite knowledge there.

original: nges par shes pa med pa la 'di la gus par mi bya ba nyid do //
analyzed: nges par shes pa med pa la 'di la gus par mi bya ba nyid do //
translated: Without definite knowledge, one should not respect it at all.

original: kha cig ni log par ston pa la snang ba dang / rab tu snang ba de dpyad par bya zhes zer ba ste /
analyzed: kha cig ni log par ston pa la snang ba dang / rab tu snang ba de dpyad par bya zhes zer ba ste /
translated: Some say: The light and the radiance of the one who teaches falsely should be analyzed.🔽Others say: The light and the radiance of the one who teaches correctly should be analyzed.🔽Still others say: The light and the radiance of the one who teaches falsely and the one who teaches correctly should be analyzed.

original: 'joms pa dang rab tu 'joms pa ma yin par zhes bya bar smra ste de ni mi rigs so //
analyzed: 'joms pa dang rab tu 'joms pa ma yin par zhes bya bar smra ste de ni mi rigs so //
translated: But it is not correct to say that the light and the radiance of the one who teaches falsely should be analyzed, nor is it correct to say that the light and the radiance of the one who teaches correctly should be analyzed, nor is it correct to say that the light and the radiance of the one who teaches falsely and the one who teaches correctly should be analyzed.

original: 'di lta bu'i don rnams la tshul @241a * //
analyzed: 'di lta bu'i don rnams la tshul @241a * //
translated: What is correct to say?🔽It is correct to say: The light and the radiance of the one who teaches falsely should be destroyed, and the light and the radiance of the one who teaches correctly should be increased.🔽Why is it not correct to say that the light and the radiance of the one who teaches falsely should be analyzed?🔽Because the one who teaches falsely is not worthy of respect due to the degeneration of morality and the degeneration of view.🔽It is correct to say: The light and the radiance of the one who teaches falsely should be destroyed.🔽Why is it not correct to say that the light and the radiance of the one who teaches correctly should be analyzed?🔽Because the one who teaches correctly is worthy of respect due to the non-degeneration of morality and the non-degeneration of view.🔽It is correct to say: The light and the radiance of the one who teaches correctly should be increased.🔽Why is it not correct to say that the light and the radiance of the one who teaches falsely and the one who teaches correctly should be analyzed?

original: khrims nyams pa dang / lta ba nyams pa las gus par bya ba ma yin pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: khrims nyams pa dang / lta ba nyams pa las gus par bya ba ma yin pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: Because the one who teaches falsely and the one who teaches correctly are not worthy of respect due to the degeneration of morality and the degeneration of view, and due to the non-degeneration of morality and the non-degeneration of view.🔽It is correct to say: The light and the radiance of the one who teaches falsely should be destroyed, and the light and the radiance of the one who teaches correctly should be increased.🔽Why is it correct to say that the light and the radiance of the one who teaches falsely should be destroyed?🔽Because the one who teaches falsely is not worthy of respect due to the degeneration of morality and the degeneration of view.

original: rnam pa de lta bu ma yin pa ste snod dag 'dzin cing mi shes pa la ni blon gdab par bya'o zhes bya ba ni gleng ba po log par ston pa'i rnam pa de lta bu ma yin pa lus dang ngag dag gis bsdams pa de la sde🔽snod 'dzin pa po ste mi shes pa la blon gdab par bya'o //
analyzed: rnam pa de lta bu ma yin pa ste snod dag 'dzin cing mi shes pa la ni blon gdab par bya'o zhes bya ba ni gleng ba po log par ston pa'i rnam pa de lta bu ma yin pa lus dang ngag dag gis bsdams pa de la sde🔽snod 'dzin pa po ste mi shes pa la blon gdab par bya'o //
translated: It is correct to say: The light and the radiance of the one who teaches falsely should be destroyed

original: mi shes pa nyid kyis gleng bar byed pa la zhes bya ba gang du nges par shes par bya ba la der lan gdab pa nges par bya'i shes pa la gus par mi bya ba nyid do //
analyzed: mi shes pa nyid kyis gleng bar byed pa la zhes bya ba gang du nges par shes par bya ba la der lan gdab pa nges par bya'i shes pa la gus par mi bya ba nyid do //
translated: One should reply to a question only when one is certain of the answer, not out of respect for the one who asks.

original: gang zhig gleng ba po yon tan gsum dang ldan pa la gus par bya'o zhes ji skad bstan pa de la brtag pa tsam yang mi bya'am zhe na /
analyzed: gang zhig gleng ba po yon tan gsum dang ldan pa la gus par bya'o zhes ji skad bstan pa de la brtag pa tsam yang mi bya'am zhe na /
translated: One should respect the one who asks if he is endowed with three qualities. But should one not even consider the one who asks?

original: de'i phyir / de la bsam pa rtogs par bya ba'i phyir brgal zhing brtag par bya'o zhes bya ba smos te /
analyzed: de'i phyir / de la bsam pa rtogs par bya ba'i phyir brgal zhing brtag par bya'o zhes bya ba smos te /
translated: Therefore, it is said, One should question and examine in order to understand his intention.

original: sems kyi spyod pa ni g-yo ba yin pas sngar sdig pa la ma zhugs su zin kyang phyis 'jug srid pas de'i phyir sems kyi spyod pa bsgom pa'i phyir brgal zhing brtag par bya'o //
analyzed: sems kyi spyod pa ni g-yo ba yin pas sngar sdig pa la ma zhugs su zin kyang phyis 'jug srid pas de'i phyir sems kyi spyod pa bsgom pa'i phyir brgal zhing brtag par bya'o //
translated: Since the activity of the mind is fickle, it is possible that one may later engage in evil, even though one did not previously engage in it. Therefore, one should question and examine in order to understand the activity of the mind.

original: bsam pa rtogs par bya ba ni 'dir bsam pa rtogs par bya ba ste //
analyzed: bsam pa rtogs par bya ba ni 'dir bsam pa rtogs par bya ba ste //
translated: Understanding the intention is understanding the intention here.

original: 'di'i bsam pa ji lta bus zhes bya ba de'i don du'o //
analyzed: 'di'i bsam pa ji lta bus zhes bya ba de'i don du'o //
translated: What is his intention? is the meaning of that.

original: ji ltar brgal zhing brtag par bya zhe na /
analyzed: ji ltar brgal zhing brtag par bya zhe na /
translated: How should one question and investigate?

original: de'i phyir gnas su mi gzhag pas so zhes bya ba smos te /
analyzed: de'i phyir gnas su mi gzhag pas so zhes bya ba smos te /
translated: Therefore, it is said, “because one does not posit a locus.”

original: 'di ni log pa'i bsam pa rjes su brtsal ba yin gyi /
analyzed: 'di ni log pa'i bsam pa rjes su brtsal ba yin gyi /
translated: This is the investigation of a false intention.

original: yang dag pa'i bsam pa rjes su brtsal bar bya ba ni ma yin no //
analyzed: yang dag pa'i bsam pa rjes su brtsal bar bya ba ni ma yin no //
translated: It is not the investigation of a correct intention.

original: dus las sogs pa'i gnas su gleng pa'i tshig gis 'jog par mi phyed na log par gleng ba la zhugs par nges pa yin pas de'i phyir /
analyzed: dus las sogs pa'i gnas su gleng pa'i tshig gis 'jog par mi phyed na log par gleng ba la zhugs par nges pa yin pas de'i phyir /
translated: If one does not posit a locus by means of the words of the discussion of time, etc., then one is certainly engaged in a false discussion. Therefore,

original: gnas su mi 'jog na bsam pa log par shes par bya'o //
analyzed: gnas su mi 'jog na bsam pa log par shes par bya'o //
translated: if one does not posit a locus, one should understand that the intention is false.

original: gal te gang zag de la brgal zhing brtags pa na dus la sogs pa'i gleng ba'i tshig 'jig par mi byed na zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: gal te gang zag de la brgal zhing brtags pa na dus la sogs pa'i gleng ba'i tshig 'jig par mi byed na zhes bya ba'o //
translated: If one questions and investigates that person, and if he does not destroy the words of the discussion of time, etc.,

original: gang du mi 'jog na bsam pa log par mtshon par bya ba'i gnas de dag gang zhe na de'i phyir /
analyzed: gang du mi 'jog na bsam pa log par mtshon par bya ba'i gnas de dag gang zhe na de'i phyir /
translated: Where should one not posit? What are those loci which are to be indicated as false intentions? Therefore, it is said,

original: gnas su ni dus dang yul dang spyod lam dang rjes su sgrub pa dag go zhes bya ba smos te /
analyzed: gnas su ni dus dang yul dang spyod lam dang rjes su sgrub pa dag go zhes bya ba smos te /
translated: “The loci are time, place, conduct, and practice.”

original: dus zhes smos pas ni mtshan mo byas pas gleng ba dang nyin mo byas pas gleng ba la sogs pa bsdus so //
analyzed: dus zhes smos pas ni mtshan mo byas pas gleng ba dang nyin mo byas pas gleng ba la sogs pa bsdus so //
translated: The word time includes those that are brought up at night and those that are brought up during the day, and so on.

original: yul zhes smos pas ni lkog tu byas pa dang gsal @241b bar byas pa dang lam du byas pa dang lam gol bar byas pa dang grong du byas pa dang dgon par byas pa la sogs pa bsdus so //
analyzed: yul zhes smos pas ni lkog tu byas pa dang gsal @241b bar byas pa dang lam du byas pa dang lam gol bar byas pa dang grong du byas pa dang dgon par byas pa la sogs pa bsdus so //
translated: The word place includes those that are brought up in private and those that are brought up in public, those that are brought up on the road and those that are brought up off the road, those that are brought up in the village and those that are brought up in the wilderness, and so on.

original: spyod lam zhes smos pa ni 'gro ba dang 'grel ba dang 'dug pa dang nyal bas byas pas gleng ba bsdus so //
analyzed: spyod lam zhes smos pa ni 'gro ba dang 'grel ba dang 'dug pa dang nyal bas byas pas gleng ba bsdus so //
translated: The word conduct includes those that are brought up by going, those that are brought up by standing, those that are brought up by sitting, and those that are brought up by lying down.

original: rjes su bsgrub pa zhes smos pas ni pham par 'gyur ba dang dge 'dun lhag ma dang ltung byed dang so sor bshags par bya ba dang nyes byas su bsgrub pas gleng ba bsdus so //
analyzed: rjes su bsgrub pa zhes smos pas ni pham par 'gyur ba dang dge 'dun lhag ma dang ltung byed dang so sor bshags par bya ba dang nyes byas su bsgrub pas gleng ba bsdus so //
translated: The word accomplishment includes those that are brought up by accomplishing a defeating offense, a serious offense, a downfall, an offense that should be confessed individually, or an offense of wrong conduct.

original: gnas gzhan du 'pho ba dang / rnyog pa can du gyur na gleng ba mi 'chags so zhes bya ba ni gal te gleng ba po de la gal te de ltar brgal zhing brtags pa na gnas nas gzhan du 'pho ba dang 'khrug pa'i rnyog pa can du gyur na de'i tshe /
analyzed: gnas gzhan du 'pho ba dang / rnyog pa can du gyur na gleng ba mi 'chags so zhes bya ba ni gal te gleng ba po de la gal te de ltar brgal zhing brtags pa na gnas nas gzhan du 'pho ba dang 'khrug pa'i rnyog pa can du gyur na de'i tshe /
translated: If the defendant, when questioned in this way, moves to another place or if the matter becomes confused with agitation, then

original: de la gleng ba mi 'chags pa nyid yin te /
analyzed: de la gleng ba mi 'chags pa nyid yin te /
translated: the accusation is not established.

original: gleng ba'i bya ba ma byas pa nyid dang / ma byung ba nyid dang mi skyed pa nyid yin no //
analyzed: gleng ba'i bya ba ma byas pa nyid dang / ma byung ba nyid dang mi skyed pa nyid yin no //
translated: The action of accusing is not done, does not occur, and is not produced.

original: de yod pa na gleng ba nyid dang gleng ba po med pa nyid yin te /
analyzed: de yod pa na gleng ba nyid dang gleng ba po med pa nyid yin te /
translated: When that exists, the accusation itself and the accuser do not exist.

original: de nyid kyis 'dir dgos pa 'grub par 'gyur te /
analyzed: de nyid kyis 'dir dgos pa 'grub par 'gyur te /
translated: By that very fact, the purpose here is accomplished.

original: de yod na rtsod pa nye bar zhi ba nyid 'grub par 'gyur ba yin no //
analyzed: de yod na rtsod pa nye bar zhi ba nyid 'grub par 'gyur ba yin no //
translated: When that exists, the complete pacification of the dispute is accomplished.

original: de bas na de la gleng ba la mi 'chags so zhes smos so //
analyzed: de bas na de la gleng ba la mi 'chags so zhes smos so //
translated: Therefore, it is said that the accusation is not established in that case.

original: gleng bas khas blangs na mthar thug pa yin no zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: gleng bas khas blangs na mthar thug pa yin no zhes bya ba ni /
translated: If the defendant admits the accusation, the matter is concluded.

original: gang zag gang la glengs pa des ltung ba de khas blangs na de ni 'dir rtsod pa'i mthar thug pa yin te /
analyzed: gang zag gang la glengs pa des ltung ba de khas blangs na de ni 'dir rtsod pa'i mthar thug pa yin te /
translated: If the person who is being accused admits the downfall, then this is the final step in the dispute.

original: khas blangs na rtsod pa de nye bar zhi bar 'gyur ro //🔽smra ba po bden pa mthong ba nyid dang / yon tan las ches mchog tu gyur pa khyim pa yang rung ba gzhan tshad mar bya'o zhes bya ba ni 'dir thams cad nyid de don tshol ba dang don brjod pa'i dbang po gleng bar bya ba dang /
analyzed: khas blangs na rtsod pa de nye bar zhi bar 'gyur ro // smra ba po bden pa mthong ba nyid dang / yon tan las ches mchog tu gyur pa khyim pa yang rung ba gzhan tshad mar bya'o zhes bya ba ni 'dir thams cad nyid de don tshol ba dang don brjod pa'i dbang po gleng bar bya ba dang /
translated: If he admits it, the dispute is settled.

original: gleng bar byed pa smra ba po nyid kyis gzung bar rig par bya'i che ba zhir gyur pa nyid kyis ni ma yin no //
analyzed: gleng bar byed pa smra ba po nyid kyis gzung bar rig par bya'i che ba zhir gyur pa nyid kyis ni ma yin no //
translated: If the accused does not admit the downfall, then the dispute is settled by a majority decision of the assembly.🔽The meaning of this verse is as follows: The one who is to be the judge should be someone who is not a friend of either party, nor an enemy, nor someone who is greedy, nor someone who is insane, nor someone who is ignorant of the subject under dispute.🔽The judge should be someone who is the opposite of these.

original: rab tu byung ba 'ba' zhig tu ma zad kyi smra ba po bden pa mthong ba nyid dam khyim pa yang rung ba gzhan dag tshad mar byas te /
analyzed: rab tu byung ba 'ba' zhig tu ma zad kyi smra ba po bden pa mthong ba nyid dam khyim pa yang rung ba gzhan dag tshad mar byas te /
translated: The one who is to be the judge should be someone who is a layperson, not a renunciant, who has seen the truths, or who is another person who is authoritative.

original: 'di ni mi g-yo ba'i chos dang ldan pa nyid la dpe tsam du rig par bya ste /
analyzed: 'di ni mi g-yo ba'i chos dang ldan pa nyid la dpe tsam du rig par bya ste /
translated: This verse should be understood as a mere example of the quality of being unmoved.

original: yon tan gzhan gyis kyang gang zhig bden pa las mi g-yo ba de yang 'dir bsdus pa nyid do //
analyzed: yon tan gzhan gyis kyang gang zhig bden pa las mi g-yo ba de yang 'dir bsdus pa nyid do //
translated: Also included here are those who do not waver from the truth by any other virtue.

original: mi g-yo ba'i chos byed pa las gzhan gang yin pa de la yon tan las chos mchog tu gyur pa nyid tshad mar bya ste /
analyzed: mi g-yo ba'i chos byed pa las gzhan gang yin pa de la yon tan las chos mchog tu gyur pa nyid tshad mar bya ste /
translated: One should take as authoritative the one who is superior in virtue to any other who does not waver in the Dharma.

original: de dag che bzhir dri'o zhes bya ba'i don @242a * //
analyzed: de dag che bzhir dri'o zhes bya ba'i don @242a * //
translated: The meaning of the passage is that one should ask the four great ones.🔽Here, the text is from the scattered texts:

original: to ; /'dir gzhung ni sil bu dag las btsun ba re zhig dge slong gnyis la tha dad par smra ba dang 'gal bar smra ba dang mi mthun par smra ba dag byung ba na /
analyzed: to ; /'dir gzhung ni sil bu dag las btsun ba re zhig dge slong gnyis la tha dad par smra ba dang 'gal bar smra ba dang mi mthun par smra ba dag byung ba na /
translated: “Venerable, when two monks arise who speak separately, speak in contradiction, and speak in disagreement,

original: gang gi tshig gzung bar bgyi /🔽gang tshul khrims dang ldan pa'i 'o //
analyzed: gang gi tshig gzung bar bgyi / gang tshul khrims dang ldan pa'i 'o //
translated: whose word should be accepted?🔽The one who is ethical.

original: gnyis ka tshul khrims dang ldan na gang mang du thos pa'o 'o //
analyzed: gnyis ka tshul khrims dang ldan na gang mang du thos pa'o 'o //
translated: If both are ethical, the one who has heard much.

original: gnyis ka mang du thos pa lags na gang yang dag par bsdams pa'i 'o //
analyzed: gnyis ka mang du thos pa lags na gang yang dag par bsdams pa'i 'o //
translated: If both have heard much, the one who is well restrained.

original: gnyis ka yang dag par bsdams pa lags na gang ches yang dag par bsdams pa'i 'o //
analyzed: gnyis ka yang dag par bsdams pa lags na gang ches yang dag par bsdams pa'i 'o //
translated: If both are well restrained, the one who is more well restrained.

original: gnyis ka ches yang dag par bsdams pa lags na de ni gnas ma yin skabs ma yin te /
analyzed: gnyis ka ches yang dag par bsdams pa lags na de ni gnas ma yin skabs ma yin te /
translated: If both are well restrained, that is not possible.

original: gal te gnyis ka ches yang dag par bsdams pa la tha dad par smra ba dang 'gal bar smra ba dang mi mthun par smra ba dag 'byung ba de ni gnas med do zhes gsungs pa yin no //
analyzed: gal te gnyis ka ches yang dag par bsdams pa la tha dad par smra ba dang 'gal bar smra ba dang mi mthun par smra ba dag 'byung ba de ni gnas med do zhes gsungs pa yin no //
translated: If it is said that for both well restrained, there would be disagreement, contradiction, and disharmony, that is not possible.🔽If there is another, one should consult with him.

original: gzhan dang bcas pa nyid na tshig bstun par bya'o zhes bya ba ni che bzhi de la gal te gzhan pha rol po nye bar gnas par gyur na gzhan de la dri bar bya ba yin zhing de dang lhan cig de'i tshig go bar bya'o //🔽mi g-yo ba rnyed pa 'di dag gis 'khrul ba med pa shes par bya ba'i phyir de bsko'o //
analyzed: gzhan dang bcas pa nyid na tshig bstun par bya'o zhes bya ba ni che bzhi de la gal te gzhan pha rol po nye bar gnas par gyur na gzhan de la dri bar bya ba yin zhing de dang lhan cig de'i tshig go bar bya'o // mi g-yo ba rnyed pa 'di dag gis 'khrul ba med pa shes par bya ba'i phyir de bsko'o //
translated: If there is another person nearby, one should ask him and consult with him.🔽This is the turning of the wheel for the purpose of knowing non-error by those who have attained immovability.

original: ma rnyed pa mi g-yo ba'i chos dang ldan pa la ma shes pa shes pa'i don du bsko ba 'di'o //
analyzed: ma rnyed pa mi g-yo ba'i chos dang ldan pa la ma shes pa shes pa'i don du bsko ba 'di'o //
translated: This is the turning of the wheel for the purpose of knowing what is not known by one who possesses the immovable Dharma but has not yet attained it.

original: 'dir gzhung ni btsun pa dge bsnyen ma dad pa can dge slong rnams kyi drung du mchis te /
analyzed: 'dir gzhung ni btsun pa dge bsnyen ma dad pa can dge slong rnams kyi drung du mchis te /
translated: Here, the text is as follows: A faithful laywoman approached the monks

original: 'di skad ces btsun pa dag bdag gis dge slong zhig rgyal rigs mo dang lhan cig mi tshangs par spyod pas nyams par bgyid pa mthong ngo zhes mchi na /
analyzed: 'di skad ces btsun pa dag bdag gis dge slong zhig rgyal rigs mo dang lhan cig mi tshangs par spyod pas nyams par bgyid pa mthong ngo zhes mchi na /
translated: and said, “Venerables, I saw a monk degenerate due to having sexual intercourse with a kṣatriya woman.”

original: bgyid du stsal cing de la de'i ngo bo nyid tshol ba dang mthun pa bstsal bar bgyi 'am nye ba 'khor mi bya ste /
analyzed: bgyid du stsal cing de la de'i ngo bo nyid tshol ba dang mthun pa bstsal bar bgyi 'am nye ba 'khor mi bya ste /
translated: “Upāli, do not act on that, but investigate the nature of that and act in accordance with what is appropriate.”

original: dri bar bya zhing gal te de na sring mo gzhan gang zhig kyang yod do zhes zer na gnyis ka dri bar bya'o //
analyzed: dri bar bya zhing gal te de na sring mo gzhan gang zhig kyang yod do zhes zer na gnyis ka dri bar bya'o //
translated: “If she says, ‘There is another sister there,’ then both should be questioned.

original: gal te mthun na dge bsnyen ma dad pa can gyi tshig gis byed du gzhug cing de la de'i ngo bo nyid tshol ba dang mthun pa yang sbyin par bya'o //
analyzed: gal te mthun na dge bsnyen ma dad pa can gyi tshig gis byed du gzhug cing de la de'i ngo bo nyid tshol ba dang mthun pa yang sbyin par bya'o //
translated: If they agree, then act on the faithful laywoman’s words and investigate the nature of that and act in accordance with what is appropriate.

original: gal te 'dis rgyal rigs mo dang mi tshangs par spyod pa ma byas kyi /
analyzed: gal te 'dis rgyal rigs mo dang mi tshangs par spyod pa ma byas kyi /
translated: If she says, ‘This did not have sexual intercourse with a kṣatriya woman,’

original: 'dis bram ze mo dang lhan cig mi tshangs par spyod pa byas so zhes zer na dge slong gis dam bcas pas byed du gzhug go zhes gsungs pa yin no //
analyzed: 'dis bram ze mo dang lhan cig mi tshangs par spyod pa byas so zhes zer na dge slong gis dam bcas pas byed du gzhug go zhes gsungs pa yin no //
translated: If someone says, He had sexual intercourse with the brahman woman, the monk should be made to confess by the declaration of the saṃgha.

original: @242b the tshom nyid du gyur na shes pa nyid ma yin no zhes bya ba 'di don gang la the tshom nyid du gyur pa des don de shes pa nyid ma yin te /
analyzed: @242b the tshom nyid du gyur na shes pa nyid ma yin no zhes bya ba 'di don gang la the tshom nyid du gyur pa des don de shes pa nyid ma yin te /
translated: If there is doubt, there is no knowledge. This means that if there is doubt about a certain object, that object is not known by that person.

original: 'di ltar des pa'i shes pa ma bskyed pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'di ltar des pa'i shes pa ma bskyed pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it does not produce the knowledge of that object.

original: gang la brjod pa gzhan la gleng bar byas pa la dus ma yin par li kha ra'i chu 'thung ba la sogs pa mthong nas dbang po dang gleng ba po dag gis cig shos byas par the tshom za ba nyid du thob par gyur pa la des brjod
analyzed: gang la brjod pa gzhan la gleng bar byas pa la dus ma yin par li kha ra'i chu 'thung ba la sogs pa mthong nas dbang po dang gleng ba po dag gis cig shos byas par the tshom za ba nyid du thob par gyur pa la des brjod
translated: When one sees the untimely drinking of liquor and so on by another person who is speaking, the faculties and the speaker themselves become doubtful as to whether the other person has done it.

original: par gyur pa la des shes pa dang bral ba nyid skye bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: par gyur pa la des shes pa dang bral ba nyid skye bar 'gyur ro //
translated: When that is expressed, the absence of knowledge by that person arises.

original: des rtsod pa de la rnam par gzhag pa med par de bas na 'di la don gyis byas pa'o //
analyzed: des rtsod pa de la rnam par gzhag pa med par de bas na 'di la don gyis byas pa'o //
translated: Since there is no establishment of that dispute by that person, it is done by implication in this case.

original: 'dir the tshom za bar gyur pa nyid 'di ni dpe yin te g-yo ba'i dbang gis brjod pa la'o //
analyzed: 'dir the tshom za bar gyur pa nyid 'di ni dpe yin te g-yo ba'i dbang gis brjod pa la'o //
translated: This very doubt is an example, because of the power of movement in speech.

original: ngag gi rnam par 'gyur ba ni rnyog pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: ngag gi rnam par 'gyur ba ni rnyog pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: The change of speech is agitation, etc.

original: lus kyi rnam par 'gyur ba ngal ba ni rmya ba nyid las so //
analyzed: lus kyi rnam par 'gyur ba ngal ba ni rmya ba nyid las so //
translated: The change of body is fatigue, because of emaciation.🔽The change of many is fatigue, because of finding an opportunity and remaining in dispute.

original: du ma'i rnam par 'gyur ba ngal ba ni glags rnyed cing gnas pa la rtsod pa'o zhes bya ba su zhig gis gleng ba la rang nyid kyis g-yo bar gyur ba khas len pa bsgrub pa de la yang de shes pa nyid ma yin par rig par bya'o🔽// 'dir gzhung ni dge bsnyen ma dad pa can gyis dge slong dus ma yin par li kha ra'i chu 'thung ba mthong nas /
analyzed: du ma'i rnam par 'gyur ba ngal ba ni glags rnyed cing gnas pa la rtsod pa'o zhes bya ba su zhig gis gleng ba la rang nyid kyis g-yo bar gyur ba khas len pa bsgrub pa de la yang de shes pa nyid ma yin par rig par bya'o // 'dir gzhung ni dge bsnyen ma dad pa can gyis dge slong dus ma yin par li kha ra'i chu 'thung ba mthong nas /
translated: Who has said this? One who accepts the establishment of one's own movement. Even for him, it should be understood that there is no knowledge of that.🔽Here is the text: A faithful upāsikā saw a bhikṣu drinking wine at an improper time.

original: des dge slong rnams la 'di skad ces bdag gis dge slong dus ma lags par skyo ma 'thung ba mthong ngo zhes mchi na /
analyzed: des dge slong rnams la 'di skad ces bdag gis dge slong dus ma lags par skyo ma 'thung ba mthong ngo zhes mchi na /
translated: She said to the bhikṣus, I saw a bhikṣu drinking wine at an improper time.

original: chos bzhin du bgyid du stsal cing de'i ngo bo nyid tshol ba dang mthun par bstsal par bgyi 'am nye ba 'khor mi bya ste /
analyzed: chos bzhin du bgyid du stsal cing de'i ngo bo nyid tshol ba dang mthun par bstsal par bgyi 'am nye ba 'khor mi bya ste /
translated: One should say, I will act in accordance with the Dharma and seek its nature, or I will not act in accordance with the Dharma and seek its nature.

original: je dge slong la dri bar bya zhing gal te 'di skad ces bdag gis li kha ra'i chu 'thungs so zhes zer na dge slong gis dam bcas pas byed du gzhug go zhes gsungs pa yin no //
analyzed: je dge slong la dri bar bya zhing gal te 'di skad ces bdag gis li kha ra'i chu 'thungs so zhes zer na dge slong gis dam bcas pas byed du gzhug go zhes gsungs pa yin no //
translated: If he says, I drank the water of the betel nut, the monk should make him act in accordance with his vow.🔽 As for certainty, it is like a promise,

original: de la nges par gyur pa ni khas blangs pa dang 'dra'o zhes bya ba ni de ltar rang gis khas blangs pa dang 'dra ste /
analyzed: de la nges par gyur pa ni khas blangs pa dang 'dra'o zhes bya ba ni de ltar rang gis khas blangs pa dang 'dra ste /
translated: because it is like a promise by oneself.

original: de las cho ga nges par blta bar bya'o //
analyzed: de las cho ga nges par blta bar bya'o //
translated: The rite should be observed in that way.

original: de'i ngo bo nyid tshol ba ni gang la sgrub pa de la sbyin par bya ba nyid ma yin no //
analyzed: de'i ngo bo nyid tshol ba ni gang la sgrub pa de la sbyin par bya ba nyid ma yin no //
translated: Seeking its nature means that it is not to be given to one who is not practicing.

original: de'i rgyu mtshan brjod pas bstan par bya ste /
analyzed: de'i rgyu mtshan brjod pas bstan par bya ste /
translated: This should be taught by stating its reason.

original: de'i phyir / ltung ba'i phyir rtsod pa 'di la de'i ngo bo nyid tshol ba dang mthun pa sbyin par bya ba nyid do zhes bya ba smos te /
analyzed: de'i phyir / ltung ba'i phyir rtsod pa 'di la de'i ngo bo nyid tshol ba dang mthun pa sbyin par bya ba nyid do zhes bya ba smos te /
translated: Therefore, it is said, “This dispute is for the purpose of downfall. It is suitable to search for its nature and to give it.”

original: dge 'dun la khas blangs nas yang khyad du gsod par @243a * //
analyzed: dge 'dun la khas blangs nas yang khyad du gsod par @243a * //
translated: If one promises to the Saṅgha and then disrespects it,

original: byed na de ni de'i ngo bo nyid tshol ba dang mthun pa sbyin pa'i rgyu yin te /
analyzed: byed na de ni de'i ngo bo nyid tshol ba dang mthun pa sbyin pa'i rgyu yin te /
translated: that is the cause for giving it, which is suitable for searching for its nature.

original: de la khas blangs pas ni yod pa bstan pa yin la khyad du gsod pa ni med pa ston pa yin pa'i phyir nges pa dang bral ba ni khyad du gsod pa yin no zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: de la khas blangs pas ni yod pa bstan pa yin la khyad du gsod pa ni med pa ston pa yin pa'i phyir nges pa dang bral ba ni khyad du gsod pa yin no zhes bya ba la /
translated: Because by promising it, existence is shown, and by disrespecting it, nonexistence is shown, the absence of certainty is disrespect.

original: khyad du gsod pa zhes bya ba ni gus pa ma yin pa'i tshig gis khyad par rnam pa gzhan gyis nye bar bsdu ba brjod pa ni nye bar bsdu ba brjod pa'o //
analyzed: khyad du gsod pa zhes bya ba ni gus pa ma yin pa'i tshig gis khyad par rnam pa gzhan gyis nye bar bsdu ba brjod pa ni nye bar bsdu ba brjod pa'o //
translated: Disrespect is a word of lack of respect. The expression of a different type of distinction is the expression of a distinction.

original: 'di ni ma mthong ba la brjod pa yin te /
analyzed: 'di ni ma mthong ba la brjod pa yin te /
translated: This is said to be the unseen.

original: de la yang gnas nas dbyung ba'i las byed pa ste 'on kyang nges pa'o //
analyzed: de la yang gnas nas dbyung ba'i las byed pa ste 'on kyang nges pa'o //
translated: There, the action of ejecting from the site is done, but it is uncertain.

original: 'di la rtsod pa sgrub pa ni khyad du gsod pa'o //
analyzed: 'di la rtsod pa sgrub pa ni khyad du gsod pa'o //
translated: In this case, the argument is a disparagement.

original: de lta na 'di khas blangs nas yang khyad du gsod par byed na rgyu yod pa'i phyir de'i ngo bo nyid tshol ba dang mthun pa sbyin par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de lta na 'di khas blangs nas yang khyad du gsod par byed na rgyu yod pa'i phyir de'i ngo bo nyid tshol ba dang mthun pa sbyin par 'gyur ro //
translated: Thus, if one accepts this and then disparages it, the giving of a search for its nature is appropriate because of the existence of a cause.🔽If one disparages after accepting from the Saṅgha, one should give a probationary penance in order to definitely hold it.

original: dge 'dun la khas blangs nas khyad du gsod na nges par 'dzin du gzhug pa'i phyir nges par sbyor ba sbyin no zhes bya ba ni gang zhig dge 'dun la ltung ba khas blangs nas yang khyad du gsod par byed na de nges par ltung ba de 'dzin🔽du gzhug pa'i phyir nges par sbyor ba sbyin par bya ste 'dzin du gzhug go zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: dge 'dun la khas blangs nas khyad du gsod na nges par 'dzin du gzhug pa'i phyir nges par sbyor ba sbyin no zhes bya ba ni gang zhig dge 'dun la ltung ba khas blangs nas yang khyad du gsod par byed na de nges par ltung ba de 'dzin du gzhug pa'i phyir nges par sbyor ba sbyin par bya ste 'dzin du gzhug go zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: This means that if one disparages after accepting a downfall from the Saṅgha, one should give a probationary penance in order to definitely hold that downfall.

original: mngon sum du dge 'dun mthun pa la de rang gis khas blangs pa'i de gang gis rang bzhin nyams pa la zhugs pa skyes pa zhes bya ba de'i ngo bo tshol ba nyid las rgyu rig par bya'o //
analyzed: mngon sum du dge 'dun mthun pa la de rang gis khas blangs pa'i de gang gis rang bzhin nyams pa la zhugs pa skyes pa zhes bya ba de'i ngo bo tshol ba nyid las rgyu rig par bya'o //
translated: The cause of this should be understood from the very search for its nature, which is that it is generated by the entry into the degeneration of its nature.🔽In the presence of the Saṅgha, one accepts it oneself. That which is accepted by oneself is a downfall. The cause of this is the entry into the degeneration of its nature. The entry into the degeneration of its nature is the generation of the thought to disparage. The generation of the thought to disparage is the giving of a probationary penance. The giving of a probationary penance is the search for its nature. The search for its nature is the cause.

original: ci'i phyir / 'di'i ming de'i ngo bo nyid tshol ba dang mthun pa zhes bya zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir / 'di'i ming de'i ngo bo nyid tshol ba dang mthun pa zhes bya zhe na /
translated: Why is this called the investigation of its nature?

original: de'i phyir / de ni de'i ngo bo nyid tshol ba la phan pa yin pa'i phyir de'i ngo bo nyid tshol ba dang mthun pa nyid do zhes bya ba smos te /
analyzed: de'i phyir / de ni de'i ngo bo nyid tshol ba la phan pa yin pa'i phyir de'i ngo bo nyid tshol ba dang mthun pa nyid do zhes bya ba smos te /
translated: Therefore, it is said, “Because it is beneficial for the investigation of its nature, it is called the investigation of its nature.”

original: tshol bar byed pas na tshol ba'o //
analyzed: tshol bar byed pas na tshol ba'o //
translated: It is an investigation because it investigates.

original: ltung ba des de'i ngo bo nyid tshol ba ni de'i ngo bo nyid tshol ba'o //
analyzed: ltung ba des de'i ngo bo nyid tshol ba ni de'i ngo bo nyid tshol ba'o //
translated: The investigation of its nature is the investigation of that nature by that downfall.

original: de la phan pa nyid ni rjes su mthun pa nyid kyi phyir de'i ngo bo nyid tshol ba nyid do //
analyzed: de la phan pa nyid ni rjes su mthun pa nyid kyi phyir de'i ngo bo nyid tshol ba nyid do //
translated: It is beneficial for that because it is suitable for the investigation of its nature.

original: de ni bslab pa byin pa dang yongs su gnas pa dang mgu ba sbyin pa la sogs pas sa gzhan na gnas pa khas blangs pa'i tshul yang yin par blta bar bya ste /
analyzed: de ni bslab pa byin pa dang yongs su gnas pa dang mgu ba sbyin pa la sogs pas sa gzhan na gnas pa khas blangs pa'i tshul yang yin par blta bar bya ste /
translated: It should be seen that this is also the method for accepting the other stages by means of the gift of training, the gift of full ordination, the gift of satisfaction, and so forth.

original: gang gi phyir 'di blangs pas de'i ngo bo nyid tshol bar byed pa /
analyzed: gang gi phyir 'di blangs pas de'i ngo bo nyid tshol bar byed pa /
translated: Because it is accepted, it investigates its nature.

original: ltung ba de'i ngo bo nyid yongs su shes na dge 'dun gyis de la bzod par byas shing de'i 'og tu rang bzhin du gnas pa nyid du 'gyur ba yin no //
analyzed: ltung ba de'i ngo bo nyid yongs su shes na dge 'dun gyis de la bzod par byas shing de'i 'og tu rang bzhin du gnas pa nyid du 'gyur ba yin no //
translated: If the nature of that downfall is fully understood, then the Saṅgha grants him forbearance and he will subsequently remain in his natural state.🔽Some say: This is taught as a method of coercion, just as the Saṅgha performs the act of coercion of threatening and so on, which is not desired.

original: kha cig gis 'di nan tur gyi tshul du bstan to zhes bya ba @243b ni ji ltar bsdigs pa la sogs pa'i nan tur gyi las mi 'dod bzhin du dge 'dun gyis byed pa de bzhin du 'di yang dge 'dun gyis sbyin pa yin pas /
analyzed: kha cig gis 'di nan tur gyi tshul du bstan to zhes bya ba @243b ni ji ltar bsdigs pa la sogs pa'i nan tur gyi las mi 'dod bzhin du dge 'dun gyis byed pa de bzhin du 'di yang dge 'dun gyis sbyin pa yin pas /
translated: So too, this is a gift of the Saṅgha.

original: kha cig gis nan tur gyi las kyi ngo bo 'di ston cing 'dod pa la sogs pa'i ngo bos ni ma yin no zhes zer te /
analyzed: kha cig gis nan tur gyi las kyi ngo bo 'di ston cing 'dod pa la sogs pa'i ngo bos ni ma yin no zhes zer te /
translated: Some say: This is taught as the nature of the act of coercion and not as the nature of desire and so on.

original: dge 'dun thams cad 'dug cing mthun par grub pa'i 'og tu dge slong gcig gis gsol ba byas te las bya ba /
analyzed: dge 'dun thams cad 'dug cing mthun par grub pa'i 'og tu dge slong gcig gis gsol ba byas te las bya ba /
translated: After all the Saṅgha is seated and agrees, a single monk makes a proposal and the act is performed.

original: dge 'dun btsun pa rnams dgongs su gsol /
analyzed: dge 'dun btsun pa rnams dgongs su gsol /
translated: Venerable Saṅgha, please listen.

original: dge slong shi ri ka 'di dge 'dun gyi dbus su zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa yin gyi /
analyzed: dge slong shi ri ka 'di dge 'dun gyi dbus su zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa yin gyi /
translated: This monk Śṛgāla is in the midst of the Saṅgha and so on.

original: dge slong shi ri ka nyid kyis rgan pa'i mthar 'dug ste /
analyzed: dge slong shi ri ka nyid kyis rgan pa'i mthar 'dug ste /
translated: The monk Śṛīra himself should sit at the end of the senior monks.

original: dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol /🔽bdag dge slong shi ri ka dge 'dun gyi dbus su zhes bya ba nas /
analyzed: dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol / bdag dge slong shi ri ka dge 'dun gyi dbus su zhes bya ba nas /

original: thugs brtse ba'i slad du bdag la de'i ngo bo nyid tshol ba dang mthun pa stsal du gsol zhes de ltar lan gnyis lan gsum du yang gsol ba bya'o zhes bya ba'i 'og tu de dag byas nas so //🔽sngags 'di las sngar khyad du gsod na zhes bya ba nas /
analyzed: thugs brtse ba'i slad du bdag la de'i ngo bo nyid tshol ba dang mthun pa stsal du gsol zhes de ltar lan gnyis lan gsum du yang gsol ba bya'o zhes bya ba'i 'og tu de dag byas nas so // sngags 'di las sngar khyad du gsod na zhes bya ba nas /
translated: I, the monk Śṛīra, in the midst of the saṅgha... up to Please grant me the search for its nature out of compassion. This should be requested like this two or three times.

original: gal te de'i 'og tu dge 'dun la gnang ba thob pa zhes bya ba dge slong shi ri ka 'di dge 'dun las de'i ngo bo nyid tshol ba dang mthun pa stsal du gsol zhes bya ba gsungs pa'i phyir ro zhes zer ro //
analyzed: gal te de'i 'og tu dge 'dun la gnang ba thob pa zhes bya ba dge slong shi ri ka 'di dge 'dun las de'i ngo bo nyid tshol ba dang mthun pa stsal du gsol zhes bya ba gsungs pa'i phyir ro zhes zer ro //
translated: After that, having done those, If he previously disrespected this mantra... up to If he obtains permission from the saṅgha afterwards, because it is stated, This monk Śṛīra requests the saṅgha to grant him the search for its nature.

original: de ni mi bzang ste mdo sde dang 'gal ba'i phyir ro zhes bya ba ni mdo sde las kun dga' bo 'di ni dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi dbus su ltung ba khyad du gsod par byed cing /
analyzed: de ni mi bzang ste mdo sde dang 'gal ba'i phyir ro zhes bya ba ni mdo sde las kun dga' bo 'di ni dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi dbus su ltung ba khyad du gsod par byed cing /
translated: “Ananda, this monk is in the midst of the Sangha of monks, and he is disparaging his downfall.🔽If he disparages it and then accepts it,

original: ci khyad du bsad nas khas len par byed pa de ni dge slong rnams kyis 'di skad ces brjod par bya ste /
analyzed: ci khyad du bsad nas khas len par byed pa de ni dge slong rnams kyis 'di skad ces brjod par bya ste /

original: tshe dang ldan pa khyod dge 'dun gyi dbus su ltung ba khyad du gsod par byed cing /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa khyod dge 'dun gyi dbus su ltung ba khyad du gsod par byed cing /
translated: ‘Venerable, you are in the midst of the Sangha of monks, and you are disparaging your downfall.

original: khyad du bsad nas khas len par byed la /
analyzed: khyad du bsad nas khas len par byed la /
translated: If you disparage it and then accept it,

original: khas blangs nas yang khyad du gsod par byed pa gang yin pa de ni khyod kyis ma rnyed de rnyed pa ma yin no //
analyzed: khas blangs nas yang khyad du gsod par byed pa gang yin pa de ni khyod kyis ma rnyed de rnyed pa ma yin no //
translated: you will not find what you have not found.🔽You will not find what is good, but you will find what is bad.🔽Venerable, go to the Sangha and seek what is compatible with the search for its nature.’

original: nyes pa rnyed kyis legs pa rnyed pa ma yin gyi tshe dang ldan pa khyod dge 'dun gyi gan du song la de'i ngo bo nyid tshol ba dang mthun pa legs par tshol cig / des dge 'dun gyi gan du song ste /
analyzed: nyes pa rnyed kyis legs pa rnyed pa ma yin gyi tshe dang ldan pa khyod dge 'dun gyi gan du song la de'i ngo bo nyid tshol ba dang mthun pa legs par tshol cig / des dge 'dun gyi gan du song ste /
translated: He goes to the Sangha and says,🔽‘Venerables, I have committed such and such a downfall.

original: de'i ngo bo nyid tsho ba dang mthun pa gsol bar bya'o //
analyzed: de'i ngo bo nyid tsho ba dang mthun pa gsol bar bya'o //
translated: The Saṅgha should grant him a search for his essential nature that is consistent with his request.

original: dge 'dun gyis kyang chos dang 'dul bas de la de'i ngo bo nyid tshol ba dang mthun pa sbyin @244a * //
analyzed: dge 'dun gyis kyang chos dang 'dul bas de la de'i ngo bo nyid tshol ba dang mthun pa sbyin @244a * //
translated: The Saṅgha should grant him a search for his essential nature that is consistent with his request.🔽Some say: This contradicts a sutra that states:

original: par bya'o zhes gsungs pa'i mdo sde 'di dang 'gal bas kha cig 'di nan tur gyi tshul du ston pa de ni mi bzang ste /
analyzed: par bya'o zhes gsungs pa'i mdo sde 'di dang 'gal bas kha cig 'di nan tur gyi tshul du ston pa de ni mi bzang ste /
translated: If a monk is accused of a downfall, he should confess it if he has committed it.🔽If he has not committed it, he should say, I have not committed it.🔽If he is accused of a downfall but does not confess it, he should be expelled.

original: 'di ltar gang gsol ba byed pa de ni bdag nyid dag par byed pa'i phyir yin gyi nan tur gyi las ni ma yin no //
analyzed: 'di ltar gang gsol ba byed pa de ni bdag nyid dag par byed pa'i phyir yin gyi nan tur gyi las ni ma yin no //
translated: This is not good because the purpose of requesting a search for one’s essential nature is to purify oneself, it is not a procedure of censure.🔽The Vaibhasikas say: It is not correct to say that the Buddha did not include the search for one’s essential nature in the class of procedures of censure because he did include it in the class of procedures of censure.

original: nye bar zhi ba nyid kyi sde tshan las logs shig tu mdzad pa ni mi bzhed do zhes bya ba ni gang 'di nan tur gyi las kyi sde tshan las logs shig tu mdzad cing de dag gi nang du ma gsungs so zhe na de ni de ltar🔽mi rung ste /
analyzed: nye bar zhi ba nyid kyi sde tshan las logs shig tu mdzad pa ni mi bzhed do zhes bya ba ni gang 'di nan tur gyi las kyi sde tshan las logs shig tu mdzad cing de dag gi nang du ma gsungs so zhe na de ni de ltar🔽mi rung ste /
translated: The Buddha did not include it in the class of procedures of censure because it is not a procedure of censure.

original: 'di ltar de nan tur gyi las nyid yin na nan tur gyi las kyi sde tshan gyi nang du gsung bar 'gyur bar rigs pa las de ma gsungs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'di ltar de nan tur gyi las nyid yin na nan tur gyi las kyi sde tshan gyi nang du gsung bar 'gyur bar rigs pa las de ma gsungs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: If it were a rite of censure, it would be mentioned in the category of rites of censure, but it is not mentioned.

original: nye bar ma zhi ba nyid yin pa'i phyir ni logs shig tu bzhag ste /
analyzed: nye bar ma zhi ba nyid yin pa'i phyir ni logs shig tu bzhag ste /
translated: It is posited separately because it is not pacification.

original: nan tur gyi las kyi nang du ma bzhag pas de'i phyir 'di ni nan tur gyi tshul du bstan pa ma yin no //🔽de la yang 'dir med pa rung ba yin te /
analyzed: nan tur gyi las kyi nang du ma bzhag pas de'i phyir 'di ni nan tur gyi tshul du bstan pa ma yin no // de la yang 'dir med pa rung ba yin te /
translated: Since it is not included in the rite of censure, it is not taught as a rite of censure.

original: nye bar zhi ba nyid kyis nan tur gyi las las de'i nang nas tha dad par byed pa mi rigs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: nye bar zhi ba nyid kyis nan tur gyi las las de'i nang nas tha dad par byed pa mi rigs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Here, it is suitable that it does not exist because it is not logical to differentiate it from the rite of censure since it is pacification.

original: 'di ltar mi bzhed pa de gang las shes she na /
analyzed: 'di ltar mi bzhed pa de gang las shes she na /
translated: If it is asked, “How is that known?”

original: de'i phyir / bsdigs pa la sogs pa ni de nyid yin pas rnam par ma bzhag pa'i phyir zhes bya ba smos te /
analyzed: de'i phyir / bsdigs pa la sogs pa ni de nyid yin pas rnam par ma bzhag pa'i phyir zhes bya ba smos te /
translated: Therefore it says, “Because it is not posited as a rite of censure and so on.”

original: bsdigs pa la sogs pa'i ni 'thab mo la sogs pa nye bar gyur pa nyid kyi phyir nye bar zhig ba nyid yod mod kyi de dag ni de nyid kyis nan tur gyi las kyi sde tshan dag las logs shig tu rnam par ma bzhag pa'i phyir te
analyzed: bsdigs pa la sogs pa'i ni 'thab mo la sogs pa nye bar gyur pa nyid kyi phyir nye bar zhig ba nyid yod mod kyi de dag ni de nyid kyis nan tur gyi las kyi sde tshan dag las logs shig tu rnam par ma bzhag pa'i phyir te
translated: Since fighting and so on are imminent, there is indeed pacification, but they are not posited separately from the class of disciplinary actions because they are included in that class.

original: / des na nye bar zhi ba nyid kyis nan tur gyi las kyi sde tshan las logs shig tu mdzad par mi bzhed do //
analyzed: / des na nye bar zhi ba nyid kyis nan tur gyi las kyi sde tshan las logs shig tu mdzad par mi bzhed do //
translated: Therefore, it is not asserted that pacification is made separately from the class of disciplinary actions.

original: de shes bzhin du khyad du gsod do snyam na /
analyzed: de shes bzhin du khyad du gsod do snyam na /
translated: If one thinks, I know this but disregard it,🔽it is generated by the knowledge that one does not see it even though it exists.🔽If one thinks, I know this but disregard it, it is generated by the knowledge that one does not see it even though it exists.

original: yod bzhin du ma mthong ba nyid kyis shes pa skyes ba nyid kyi phyir ro zhes bya ba ni de shes bzhin du khyad du gsod do snyam na zhes bya ba yod par gyur pa la nan tur gyi las nyid kyis 'di byas pa nyid do //
analyzed: yod bzhin du ma mthong ba nyid kyis shes pa skyes ba nyid kyi phyir ro zhes bya ba ni de shes bzhin du khyad du gsod do snyam na zhes bya ba yod par gyur pa la nan tur gyi las nyid kyis 'di byas pa nyid do //
translated: This is done by the action of censure itself.

original: de yod bzhin du ma mthong ngo zhes zer ba de lta bu'i blo dge slong rnams la skye bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de yod bzhin du ma mthong ngo zhes zer ba de lta bu'i blo dge slong rnams la skye bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Since such a mind arises in monks, they say, I do not see it even though it exists.

original: de la ltung ba ma mthong ba la nan tur gyi las bca' ba mdzad zin pas de bas na ma mthong bas gnas nas dbyung ba zhes bya ba 'di'i gnang ba'i skabs med pa nyid du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de la ltung ba ma mthong ba la nan tur gyi las bca' ba mdzad zin pas de bas na ma mthong bas gnas nas dbyung ba zhes bya ba 'di'i gnang ba'i skabs med pa nyid du 'gyur ro //
translated: Since the procedure of censure has already been performed on one who has not seen his offense, therefore, there is no occasion for this procedure called ejection for not seeing, which is similar to the procedure of censure.

original: de ltar bas na kha cig de'i ngo bo nyid tshol ba dang mthun pa de @244b nan tur gyi las kyi tshul du ston pa de mi bzang ngo //
analyzed: de ltar bas na kha cig de'i ngo bo nyid tshol ba dang mthun pa de @244b nan tur gyi las kyi tshul du ston pa de mi bzang ngo //
translated: Therefore, it is not good for anyone to teach this procedure of censure as if it were similar to the search for his nature.🔽One should not fail to make an effort to pacify. This is included in the sutra that states:

original: nye bar zhi bar bya ba'i phyir 'bad pa mi skyed par mi bya'o zhes bya ba ni dge 'dun du gyur pa'i dge slong dag gis dge slong dag bya ba'i phyir rtsod pa dge 'dun mthun pas nye bar zhi bar bya'o zhes gang gsungs pa de mdo 'dir
analyzed: nye bar zhi bar bya ba'i phyir 'bad pa mi skyed par mi bya'o zhes bya ba ni dge 'dun du gyur pa'i dge slong dag gis dge slong dag bya ba'i phyir rtsod pa dge 'dun mthun pas nye bar zhi bar bya'o zhes gang gsungs pa de mdo 'dir

original: bsdus pa yin no //

original: gzhan gyi dag la ni bsnyen par rdzogs pa dang bcas pa rnams kyi dbang du bya'o zhes bya ba ni bsnyen par ma rdzogs pa dge 'dun la sogs pa gzhan gyi rtsod pa dag la ni bsnyen par rdzogs pa dang bcas pa rnams kyi dbang du bya ste
analyzed: gzhan gyi dag la ni bsnyen par rdzogs pa dang bcas pa rnams kyi dbang du bya'o zhes bya ba ni bsnyen par ma rdzogs pa dge 'dun la sogs pa gzhan gyi rtsod pa dag la ni bsnyen par rdzogs pa dang bcas pa rnams kyi dbang du bya ste
translated: In the case of others, it should be done according to those who have completed the novitiate. This means that in the case of disputes of others such as the Saṅgha who have not completed the novitiate, it should be done according to those who have completed the novitiate.

original: de dag gi de nye bar zhi bar bya'o //
analyzed: de dag gi de nye bar zhi bar bya'o //
translated: Their dispute should be settled.

original: bud med rnams kyi ni skyes pas rigs pa nyid do zhes bya ba ni bud med rnams kyi rtsod pa gang yin pa de ni de nyid du nye bar zhi bar bya ba'i rigs pa nyid yin no //
analyzed: bud med rnams kyi ni skyes pas rigs pa nyid do zhes bya ba ni bud med rnams kyi rtsod pa gang yin pa de ni de nyid du nye bar zhi bar bya ba'i rigs pa nyid yin no //
translated: For women, it is proper for men to do so.

original: 'dir gzhung ni dge slong rnams kyi rtsod pa gang yin pa de dag dge slong ma rnams kyis spang du rung ngam nye ba 'khor mi rung ste /
analyzed: 'dir gzhung ni dge slong rnams kyi rtsod pa gang yin pa de dag dge slong ma rnams kyis spang du rung ngam nye ba 'khor mi rung ste /
translated: Here, the text says, “Is it proper for nuns to resolve disputes of monks? Upāli, it is not proper.

original: dge slong rnams kyi rtsod pa ni dge slong rnams kyis nye bar zhi bar bya'o //🔽de bzhin du dge slong ma rnams kyi rtsod pa yang dge slong rnams kyis nye bar zhi bar bya'o //
analyzed: dge slong rnams kyi rtsod pa ni dge slong rnams kyis nye bar zhi bar bya'o // de bzhin du dge slong ma rnams kyi rtsod pa yang dge slong rnams kyis nye bar zhi bar bya'o //
translated: Disputes of monks should be resolved by monks.🔽Similarly, disputes of nuns should be resolved by nuns.

original: de bzhin du dge slob ma rnams dang / dge tshul dang dge tshul ma rnams kyi rtsod pa yang dge slong rnams kyis nye bar zhi bar bya'o zhes gsungs pa yin no //
analyzed: de bzhin du dge slob ma rnams dang / dge tshul dang dge tshul ma rnams kyi rtsod pa yang dge slong rnams kyis nye bar zhi bar bya'o zhes gsungs pa yin no //
translated: Similarly, disputes of probationary nuns, novice monks, and novice nuns should be resolved by monks.”

original: srog gam bsnyen par rdzogs pa las nyams na nye bar zhi ba nyid yin no zhes bya ba ni srog las nyams sam bsnye par rdzogs pa las nyams na rtsod pa nye bar zhi ba nyid yin pa'o //
analyzed: srog gam bsnyen par rdzogs pa las nyams na nye bar zhi ba nyid yin no zhes bya ba ni srog las nyams sam bsnye par rdzogs pa las nyams na rtsod pa nye bar zhi ba nyid yin pa'o //
translated: If there is a transgression of life or of full ordination, there is pacification of the dispute.🔽If there is a transgression of the object of abandonment up to the opponent,

original: spang ba nyid nas gzhan gyi phyogs nyid kyi bar du gyur na yang ngo zhes bya ba ni @245b 'dir bar du'i sgra bri bar bya'o //
analyzed: spang ba nyid nas gzhan gyi phyogs nyid kyi bar du gyur na yang ngo zhes bya ba ni @245b 'dir bar du'i sgra bri bar bya'o //
translated: In this case, the word “up to” should be written.

original: spang bar bya ba nyid nas phyogs na phyogs ma yin pa tha dad par gnas pa'i bar du gyur na de dag thams cad la yang ltung ba dang rtsod pa nye bar zhi ba nyid yin pa'o //
analyzed: spang bar bya ba nyid nas phyogs na phyogs ma yin pa tha dad par gnas pa'i bar du gyur na de dag thams cad la yang ltung ba dang rtsod pa nye bar zhi ba nyid yin pa'o //
translated: If there is a transgression of the object of abandonment up to the opponent, all of them have downfalls and pacification of disputes.

original: dge 'dun du gyur pa dang 'brel pa dag la 'khrug long gi rtsod pa dag gis rnam par gzhag pa'i ltung ba nyid ni dge 'dun du gyur pa gsal ba nyid do //
analyzed: dge 'dun du gyur pa dang 'brel pa dag la 'khrug long gi rtsod pa dag gis rnam par gzhag pa'i ltung ba nyid ni dge 'dun du gyur pa gsal ba nyid do //
translated: In the case of those connected with the Saṅgha, the establishment of disputes by quarrels is the clarity of the Saṅgha itself.

original: gzhan du song ngan nad kyi rnam pas yun ring por btab na yang ngo zhes bya ba yang rtsod pa nye bar zhi ba nyid yin pa'o //
analyzed: gzhan du song ngan nad kyi rnam pas yun ring por btab na yang ngo zhes bya ba yang rtsod pa nye bar zhi ba nyid yin pa'o //
translated: If it is otherwise, then even if a dispute is settled for a long time by the form of a disease, it is said it is settled.

original: gang zhig srog las 'das pa nas na nad kyi rnam pas yun ring por btab pa'i bar du gyur na rtsod pa nye bar zhi ba nyid yin no //
analyzed: gang zhig srog las 'das pa nas na nad kyi rnam pas yun ring por btab pa'i bar du gyur na rtsod pa nye bar zhi ba nyid yin no //
translated: If someone dies, up to it is settled by the form of a disease.

original: de'i phyir / don sbyin par byed pa'am mngon par brtson pa'o zhes bya ba smos te don sbyin par byed pa ni gleng ba'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir / don sbyin par byed pa'am mngon par brtson pa'o zhes bya ba smos te don sbyin par byed pa ni gleng ba'o //
translated: Therefore, it is said to give the meaning or to strive. Giving the meaning is to speak.

original: 'dir nyams pa la sogs pa'i gzhung ni btsun pa rtsod pa bzhi po dag las rtsod pa gang yang rung ba byung ba rtsod pa zhi bar bgyid pa'i chos bdun po dag las gang yang rung bar nye bar zhi bar mi 'gyid cing /
analyzed: 'dir nyams pa la sogs pa'i gzhung ni btsun pa rtsod pa bzhi po dag las rtsod pa gang yang rung ba byung ba rtsod pa zhi bar bgyid pa'i chos bdun po dag las gang yang rung bar nye bar zhi bar mi 'gyid cing /
translated: Here, the text on degeneration and so on is: Venerable, if any of the four disputes arise, and if they are not pacified by any of the seven dharmas for pacifying disputes,

original: nye bar zhi bar yang brjod par bgyi ba mchis sam /
analyzed: nye bar zhi bar yang brjod par bgyi ba mchis sam /
translated: is there a way to say it is pacified?

original: yod de sbyin par byed pa'i dge slong dus byed dam byin pa'i dge slong dus byed dam dge slong sbyin par byed pa'i dge slong byin pa nyid du dam 'cha' 'am //🔽dge tshul nyid dam dge slong ma sun phyung ba nyid dam /🔽rku thabs su gnas pa nyid dam ma ning nyid dam /
analyzed: yod de sbyin par byed pa'i dge slong dus byed dam byin pa'i dge slong dus byed dam dge slong sbyin par byed pa'i dge slong byin pa nyid du dam 'cha' 'am // dge tshul nyid dam dge slong ma sun phyung ba nyid dam / rku thabs su gnas pa nyid dam ma ning nyid dam /
translated: It exists, if the monk who is the giver dies, or the monk who is the recipient dies, or the monk who is the giver vows to become the recipient,🔽or if he vows to become a novice, or a monk who has committed an defeating offense,

original: mu stegs can zhugs pa nyid dam ma bsad pa nyid dam /🔽pha bsad pa nyid dam /
analyzed: mu stegs can zhugs pa nyid dam ma bsad pa nyid dam / pha bsad pa nyid dam /
translated: or a monk who is a hermaphrodite, or a monk who is a paṇḍaka,🔽or a monk who has gone over to another philosophical school, or a monk who has killed his mother,🔽or a monk who has killed his father,

original: dgra bcom pa bsad pa nyi dam /
analyzed: dgra bcom pa bsad pa nyi dam /
translated: or a monk who has killed an arhat,

original: dge 'dun gyi dbyen byas pa nyid dam /
analyzed: dge 'dun gyi dbyen byas pa nyid dam /
translated: or a monk who has caused a schism in the saṅgha,

original: de bzhin gshegs pa la nang sems kyis khrag phyung ba nyid dam /🔽gnas par mi bya ba nyid dam /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa la nang sems kyis khrag phyung ba nyid dam / gnas par mi bya ba nyid dam /
translated: or a monk who has maliciously drawn blood from a tathāgata,🔽or a monk who has committed an action that is an obstruction,

original: tha dad du gnas pa nyid du dam 'char bar byed dam /
analyzed: tha dad du gnas pa nyid du dam 'char bar byed dam /
translated: or a monk who has vowed to live separately,

original: de bzhin du byin pa'i dge slong de dag tu dam 'cha' bar byed dam /
analyzed: de bzhin du byin pa'i dge slong de dag tu dam 'cha' bar byed dam /
translated: or if the monk who is the recipient vows to become one of those.🔽Or if the monk who is the giver is sick, or has gone away for a long time,

original: sbyin par byed pa'i dge slong nad kyi rnam pas yun ring du thebs sam gzhan du song ngam /
analyzed: sbyin par byed pa'i dge slong nad kyi rnam pas yun ring du thebs sam gzhan du song ngam /
translated: or if the monk who is the recipient is sick, or has gone away for a long time,

original: de bzhin du byin pa'i dge slong de ltar gyur na rtsod pa de nye bar zhi bar brjod par bya'o zhes gsungs pa yin no //
analyzed: de bzhin du byin pa'i dge slong de ltar gyur na rtsod pa de nye bar zhi bar brjod par bya'o zhes gsungs pa yin no //
translated: Likewise, if the monk who is the adjudicator is like that, the dispute should be declared settled.

original: rtsod pa'i gzhi zhu ba'i skabs so //
analyzed: rtsod pa'i gzhi zhu ba'i skabs so //
translated: The section on questioning the basis of a dispute.

original: rtsod pa'i gzhi rdzogs so /
analyzed: rtsod pa'i gzhi rdzogs so /
translated: The basis of a dispute is finished.

original: // / so sor thar pa'i sdom pas mchog la rab tu byung bas phyag bya'o @246a * //
analyzed: // / so sor thar pa'i sdom pas mchog la rab tu byung bas phyag bya'o @246a * //
translated: One who has gone forth should pay respect to the one who is supreme through the vows of individual liberation.

original: zhes bya ba ni so sor thar pa'i sdom pas mchog tu gyur pa dge slong gang yin pa de la rab tu byung pas phyag bya'o //🔽dge tshul gyis dge slong la phyag bya'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni so sor thar pa'i sdom pas mchog tu gyur pa dge slong gang yin pa de la rab tu byung pas phyag bya'o // dge tshul gyis dge slong la phyag bya'o //
translated: This means that one who has gone forth should pay respect to the monk who is supreme through the vows of individual liberation.🔽A novice monk should pay respect to a monk.

original: dge tshul mas dge slob ma la phyag bya'o //
analyzed: dge tshul mas dge slob ma la phyag bya'o //
translated: A novice nun should pay respect to a female trainee.🔽A female trainee should pay respect to a nun.

original: dge slob mas dge slong ma la phyag bya'o zhes bya ba de la de byed pa'o ;
analyzed: dge slob mas dge slong ma la phyag bya'o zhes bya ba de la de byed pa'o ;
translated: Here, this is what should be done.

original: / mnyam na rgan pa la'o zhes bya ba ni so sor thar pa'i sdom pas mnyam pa nyid na so sor thar pa'i sdom pa des rgan pa de la gzhon pas phyag bya'i na tshod kyis ni ma yin no //
analyzed: / mnyam na rgan pa la'o zhes bya ba ni so sor thar pa'i sdom pas mnyam pa nyid na so sor thar pa'i sdom pa des rgan pa de la gzhon pas phyag bya'i na tshod kyis ni ma yin no //
translated: If they are equal in the pratimoksha vow, then the younger monk should bow to the elder monk, but not because of age.

original: bsnyen par rdzogs pa'i sdom pa sngar blangs pa la phyis blangs pas phyag bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: bsnyen par rdzogs pa'i sdom pa sngar blangs pa la phyis blangs pas phyag bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that one who has received the upasampada vow earlier should be bowed to by one who has received it later.

original: dang bor bsnyen par rdzogs zin pa la bsnyen par rdzogs pas phyag bya'o //
analyzed: dang bor bsnyen par rdzogs zin pa la bsnyen par rdzogs pas phyag bya'o //
translated: One who has already received the upasampada vow first should be bowed to by one who has received the upasampada vow later.

original: dge slong gis dge slong la phyag bya'o //
analyzed: dge slong gis dge slong la phyag bya'o //
translated: A monk should bow to a monk.

original: dge slong mas dge slong ma la phyag bya'o //🔽dang por dge slong ma'i sdom pa dang ldan zin pa la dge slong mas phyag bya'o //
analyzed: dge slong mas dge slong ma la phyag bya'o // dang por dge slong ma'i sdom pa dang ldan zin pa la dge slong mas phyag bya'o //
translated: A nun should bow to a nun.🔽A nun should bow to one who has already received the bhiksuni vow first.

original: dang por rab tu byung ba'i sdom pa dang ldan zin pa la dge slong mas phyag bya'o //
analyzed: dang por rab tu byung ba'i sdom pa dang ldan zin pa la dge slong mas phyag bya'o //
translated: A nun should bow to one who has already received the pravrajya vow first.

original: dang por rab tu byung ba'i sdom pa dang ldan par gyur zin pa'i dge slong la dge slong la dge tshul gyis phyag bya'o //
analyzed: dang por rab tu byung ba'i sdom pa dang ldan par gyur zin pa'i dge slong la dge slong la dge tshul gyis phyag bya'o //
translated: A novice monk should pay respect to a fully ordained monk who has already taken the vows of full ordination.

original: dge tshul mas kyang dge tshul ma la phyag bya'o zhes gsungs pa de bas na de la de byed pa'o //
analyzed: dge tshul mas kyang dge tshul ma la phyag bya'o zhes gsungs pa de bas na de la de byed pa'o //
translated: A female novice should pay respect to a female novice.🔽The former sutra teaches that one who has taken the pratimoksa vows should pay respect to one who has taken higher vows, but it would follow that a novice monk should pay respect to a fully ordained nun and a fully ordained nun should pay respect to a novice monk.

original: mdo snga mas ni sa sor thar pa'i sdom pas mchog la rab tu byung bas phyag bya'o zhes bstan pa la dge tshul phas dge slong ma dang dge slong ma la phyag bya bar thal bar 'gyur ba dang / mdo 'dis ni mnyam na rgan pa la'o zhes bya stan pas dge slong dang dge slong ma yang so sor thar pa'i sdom pas mnyam pa yin pas /
analyzed: mdo snga mas ni sa sor thar pa'i sdom pas mchog la rab tu byung bas phyag bya'o zhes bstan pa la dge tshul phas dge slong ma dang dge slong ma la phyag bya bar thal bar 'gyur ba dang / mdo 'dis ni mnyam na rgan pa la'o zhes bya stan pas dge slong dang dge slong ma yang so sor thar pa'i sdom pas mnyam pa yin pas /
translated: This sutra teaches that if they are equal, one should pay respect to the elder.

original: dge slong ma la dge slong gis phyag bya bar thal bar 'gyur ba dang / dge tshul dang dge tshul ma yang so sor thar ba'i sdom pas mnyam pa yin pas dge tshul ma rgan pa la dge tshul gyis phyag bya bar thal bar 'gyur bas de bsal ba'i phyir mdo de gnyis kyi bye brag bstan par bya ste /
analyzed: dge slong ma la dge slong gis phyag bya bar thal bar 'gyur ba dang / dge tshul dang dge tshul ma yang so sor thar ba'i sdom pas mnyam pa yin pas dge tshul ma rgan pa la dge tshul gyis phyag bya bar thal bar 'gyur bas de bsal ba'i phyir mdo de gnyis kyi bye brag bstan par bya ste /
translated: To eliminate those faults, the differences between those two sutras should be explained.

original: de'i phyir / mtshan tha mi dad pa la'o zhes bya ba smos te /
analyzed: de'i phyir / mtshan tha mi dad pa la'o zhes bya ba smos te /
translated: Therefore it is said:🔽This rule applies to those of the same gender.

original: mtshan mthun pa dag la cho ga 'di yin gyi mtshan mi mthun pa dag gi ni ma yin no //
analyzed: mtshan mthun pa dag la cho ga 'di yin gyi mtshan mi mthun pa dag gi ni ma yin no //
translated: This rule applies to those of the same gender, but not to those of different gender.🔽Just as a man should not bow to a woman, so too a woman should not bow to a man.

original: ji ltar skyes pas bud med la phyag mi bya ba de bzhin du bud med kyis kyang skyes pa la phyag mi bya bar thar bar 'gyur ba de dmigs kyis bsal ba'i phyir /
analyzed: ji ltar skyes pas bud med la phyag mi bya ba de bzhin du bud med kyis kyang skyes pa la phyag mi bya bar thar bar 'gyur ba de dmigs kyis bsal ba'i phyir /
translated: To eliminate that fault, it is said:

original: @246b skyes pa mi dman pa la bud med kyis so zhes bya ba smos te /
analyzed: @246b skyes pa mi dman pa la bud med kyis so zhes bya ba smos te /
translated: A woman should bow to a man who is not inferior.

original: gang zhig so sor thar pa'i sdom pas bud med pas mi dman na gsar bu la yang bud med kyis phyag bya na dus mnyam pa 'am rgan pa la lta smos kyang ci dgos zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: gang zhig so sor thar pa'i sdom pas bud med pas mi dman na gsar bu la yang bud med kyis phyag bya na dus mnyam pa 'am rgan pa la lta smos kyang ci dgos zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: If a woman is not inferior due to the pratimoksa vow, then even a youth should bow to a woman, not to mention one who is equal in age or older.

original: cho ga de dag thams cad kyi dmigs kyis bsal ba'i phyir /
analyzed: cho ga de dag thams cad kyi dmigs kyis bsal ba'i phyir /
translated: In order to specify all those rituals, it says:

original: sa gzhan na gnas pa dang nyams pa dang dge slong ma sun phyung ba dang / chos ma yin pa'i phyogs dang mthun pa dang / tha dad par gnas pa dang / tha dad par gnas pa dang / nyal ba dang snyoms par zhugs pa dang brel ba dang sems gzhan du song ba dang rgyab kyis phyogs pa dang khyim gzhan na 'dug pa dang zas kyi gral na 'dug pa ma gtogs so zhes bya ba smos te /
analyzed: sa gzhan na gnas pa dang nyams pa dang dge slong ma sun phyung ba dang / chos ma yin pa'i phyogs dang mthun pa dang / tha dad par gnas pa dang / tha dad par gnas pa dang / nyal ba dang snyoms par zhugs pa dang brel ba dang sems gzhan du song ba dang rgyab kyis phyogs pa dang khyim gzhan na 'dug pa dang zas kyi gral na 'dug pa ma gtogs so zhes bya ba smos te /
translated: Except for one who is on another level, one who has degenerated, one who has caused a schism in the Sangha, one who is in accord with the side of non-Dharma, one who is in a separate dwelling, one who is lying down, one who is in equipoise, one who is busy, one whose mind has gone elsewhere, one who is turned away, one who is in another's house, and one who is in the row of food.

original: sa gzhan na gnas pa zhes bya ba ni yongs su gnas pa la sogs pa bslab pa byin pa dang / de'i ngo bo nyid tshol ba dang mthun pa sbyin pa la sogs pa'o ;
analyzed: sa gzhan na gnas pa zhes bya ba ni yongs su gnas pa la sogs pa bslab pa byin pa dang / de'i ngo bo nyid tshol ba dang mthun pa sbyin pa la sogs pa'o ;
translated: “Dwelling in another place” means giving the training to those who are abiding, and giving generosity that is in accord with the search for their nature.

original: / nyams pa zhes bya ba ni gnas par mi bya ba'o //
analyzed: / nyams pa zhes bya ba ni gnas par mi bya ba'o //
translated: “Degeneration” means not abiding.

original: dge slong ma sun phyung ba dang mtshams med pa byas pa zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: dge slong ma sun phyung ba dang mtshams med pa byas pa zhes bya ba ni /
translated: “Corrupting a nun and committing a heinous crime”

original: mu stegs can zhugs pa dang / rku thabs su gnas pa dang / za ma dang / ma ning dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa sdom pa'i zhing ma yin par gyur ba dag bsdus so //🔽chos ma yin pa'i phyogs dang mthun pa zhes bya ba smos pas ni tha dad pas gnas pa'i bye brag go //
analyzed: mu stegs can zhugs pa dang / rku thabs su gnas pa dang / za ma dang / ma ning dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa sdom pa'i zhing ma yin par gyur ba dag bsdus so // chos ma yin pa'i phyogs dang mthun pa zhes bya ba smos pas ni tha dad pas gnas pa'i bye brag go //
translated: includes those who have entered a tīrthika order, those who live by theft, paṇḍakas, and neuters.🔽By saying “in accord with the side of non-Dharma,” it includes the distinctions of different abodes.

original: chos ma yin pa'i phyogs dang mthun pa'i tha dad pa gnas pa gang yin pa zhes bya ba des ni chos kyi phyogs dang mthun pa gnas pa'i tha dad pa la phyag bya ba nyid yin no //
analyzed: chos ma yin pa'i phyogs dang mthun pa'i tha dad pa gnas pa gang yin pa zhes bya ba des ni chos kyi phyogs dang mthun pa gnas pa'i tha dad pa la phyag bya ba nyid yin no //
translated: By saying “the distinctions of different abodes in accord with the side of non-Dharma,” it includes the distinctions of different abodes in accord with the side of Dharma.

original: chos ma yin pa'i phyogs dang mthun pa zhes smos pas ni rang gi phyogs kyis kyang phyag mi bya bar thal bar 'gyur ba zhes bya bas 'dir tha dad par gnas par bsdus so //
analyzed: chos ma yin pa'i phyogs dang mthun pa zhes smos pas ni rang gi phyogs kyis kyang phyag mi bya bar thal bar 'gyur ba zhes bya bas 'dir tha dad par gnas par bsdus so //
translated: The phrase who is not in accord with the Dharma includes the case where one's own side does not bow down. The phrase who is not in accord with the Dharma includes the case where one's own side does not bow down. The phrase who is not in accord with the Dharma includes the case where one's own side does not bow down. The phrase who is not in accord with the Dharma includes the case where one's own side does not bow down.

original: nyal ba zhes bya ba ni glos phab ste nyal ba'o //
analyzed: nyal ba zhes bya ba ni glos phab ste nyal ba'o //
translated: Lying down means lying down on one's side.

original: snyoms par zhugs pa zhes bya ba ni ting nge 'dzin la'o //
analyzed: snyoms par zhugs pa zhes bya ba ni ting nge 'dzin la'o //
translated: Absorbed in meditation means absorbed in concentration.

original: brel ba zhes bya ba ni bya ba rjes su bsgrub pa la sems gzhol ba'o //
analyzed: brel ba zhes bya ba ni bya ba rjes su bsgrub pa la sems gzhol ba'o //
translated: Distracted means the mind is occupied with carrying out activities.

original: sems gzhan du song zhes bya ba ni phyag 'tshal ba la sems gtod pa mi sbyin pa'o //
analyzed: sems gzhan du song zhes bya ba ni phyag 'tshal ba la sems gtod pa mi sbyin pa'o //
translated: Mind elsewhere means not paying attention to the act of bowing.

original: rgyab kyis phyogs pa zhes bya ba ni mdun phar pa ltas pa'o //
analyzed: rgyab kyis phyogs pa zhes bya ba ni mdun phar pa ltas pa'o //
translated: With one's back turned means facing away.

original: khyim gzhan na @247a * //
analyzed: khyim gzhan na @247a * //
translated: In another's house means in a householder's house.

original: 'dug pa zhes bya ba'i sgra las khyim gyi nang na 'dug pa zhes bya ba dang sbyar te khyim pa'i khyim na 'dug pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: 'dug pa zhes bya ba'i sgra las khyim gyi nang na 'dug pa zhes bya ba dang sbyar te khyim pa'i khyim na 'dug pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: Sitting means sitting on a seat.

original: khyim pas rab tu byung ba la'o zhes bya ba ni ma gtogs pa'i ji skad bstan pa de dag las gzhan pa thams cad la phyag bya'o //

original: gal te sbyin bdag yod na des rjes su gnang ba na'o zhes bya ba ni gal te dge 'dun gyi gzhi de la sbyin bdag yod na des rjes su gnang na dge 'dun gyi phyir ram gang zag gi phyir /🔽gnas kyi gzhi byed pa rjes su gnad bar bya'o //
